analyzed: vuṭṭhānam vā api ussukkam gantum iti evamādinā

original: Labbhaṃ sattāhakiccena, pahitāpahitepi vā.
analyzed: labbham satta aha kiccena pahita apahite pi vā

analyzed: saṅgha kamme vaje dhamma ssavana attham nimantitaḥ

analyzed: avebhaṅgiyanti

analyzed: lohakumbhī ca

analyzed: kuṭhārī vā asi

original: Kuddālo ca nikhādanaṃ.
analyzed: kuddālaḥ ca nikhādanam

analyzed: pakiṇṇaka niddeso

original: Pakiṇṇakanti –
analyzed: pakiṇṇakam ti

original: Sitthatelodatelehi, phaṇahatthaphaṇehi vā;

original: Nidaheyya khamāpeyya, garunā ca paṇāmito.
analyzed: nidaheyya khamāpeyya garunā ca paṇāmitaḥ

original: Akkosane parammukhā, āpattīhi ca sattahi;

original: Purimassevimaṃ dinnaṃ, dehi netvāsukassati;
analyzed: purimassa iva imam dinnam dehi netvā āsukaḥ sati

original: Pacchimasseva dammīti, dinnaṃ ñatvā imaṃ vidhiṃ;
analyzed: pacchimassa iva dammi iti dinnam ñatvā imam vidhim

original: Gaṇhe vissāsagāhaṃ vādhiṭṭhe matakacīvaraṃ.
analyzed: gaṇhe vissāsa gāham vā adhiṭṭhe mataka cīvaram

original: Lohabhaṇḍe paharaṇiṃ, dārubhaṇḍe ca dārujaṃ;
analyzed: loha bhaṇḍe paharaṇim dāru bhaṇḍe ca dārujam

original: Pattaṃ pādukapallaṅkaṃ, āsandiṃ mattikāmaye;
analyzed: pattam pāduka pallaṅkam āsandim mattikāmaye

original: Ṭhapetvā kappati sabbaṃ, katakaṃ kumbhakārikanti.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā kappati sabbam katakam kumbhakārikanti

original: 42. Desanāniddeso
analyzed: desanā niddeso

original: Desanāti –
analyzed: desanāti

original: Cāgo yo bhikkhubhāvassa, sā pārājikadesanā;
analyzed: cāgaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu bhāvassa sā pārājika desanā

original: Yathāvuttena vuṭṭhānaṃ, garukāpattidesanā.

analyzed: ukkuṭikam nisīditvā paggaṇhitvāna añjalim

original: Thullaccayādiṃ deseyya, evamekassa santike.
analyzed: thullaccaya ādim deseyya evam ekassa santike

original: 384. “Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ thullaccayāpattiṃ āpajjiṃ, taṃ tumhamūle paṭidesemī”ti vatvā

analyzed: āyatim āvuso saṃvareyyāsi iti vutte sādhu suṭṭhu bhante saṃvarissāmi iti vattabbam

original: “Ahaṃ, bhante, dve thullaccayāpattiyo āpajjiṃ, ahaṃ bhante sambahulā thullaccayāpattiyo
analyzed: aham bhante dve thullaccaya āpattiyaḥ āpajjim aham bhante sambahulāḥ thullaccaya āpattiyaḥ

original: āpajjiṃ, tā tumhamūle paṭidesemī”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: āpajjim tā tumha mūle paṭidesemi iti vattabbam

original: Nissaggiyesu pana “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ dasāhātikkantaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ āyasmato
analyzed: nissaggiyesu pana idam me bhante cīvaram dasa aha atikkantam nissaggiyam imā aham āyasmataḥ

original: nissajjāmī”ti. “Imāni me, bhante, cīvarāni…pe… etaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ…pe… etāni
analyzed: nissajjāmi iti imāni me bhante etam me bhante cīvaraṃpe etāni

original: me, bhante, cīvarāni dasāhātikkantāni nissaggiyāni, etānāhaṃ āyasmato nissajjāmī”ti.
analyzed: me bhante cīvarāni dasa aha atikkantāni nissaggiyāni etān āham āyasmataḥ nissajjāmi iti

original: Nissajjitvāna deseyya, āpattiṃ tena bhikkhunā;
analyzed: nissajjitvāna deseyya āpattim tena bhikkhunā

original: Paṭiggahetvā āpattiṃ, deyyaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvaraṃ.
analyzed: paṭiggahetvā āpattim deyyam nissaṭṭha cīvaram

original: “Imaṃ, imāni, etaṃ, etāni cīvarāni āyasmato dammī”ti.
analyzed: imam imāni etam etāni cīvarāni āyasmataḥ dammi iti

original: 386. (Ka) idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ rattivippavutthaṃ aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: kaḥ idam me bhante cīvaram ratti vippavuttham aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiyam

original: (Kha) idaṃ me, bhante, akālacīvaraṃ māsātikkantaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: idam me bhante akāla cīvaram māsa atikkantam nissaggiyam

original: (Ga) idaṃ me, bhante, purāṇacīvaraṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: ga idam me bhante purāṇa cīvaram aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpitam nissaggiyam

original: (Gha) idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato paṭiggahitaṃ aññatra pārivattakā nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: gha idam me bhante cīvaram aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthataḥ paṭiggahitam aññatra pārivattakā nissaggiyam

original: (Ṅa) idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ aññatra samayā viññāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: ṅe idam me bhante cīvaram aññātakam gahapatikam aññatra samayā viññāpitam nissaggiyam

original: (Ca) idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ tatuttari viññāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: ca idam me bhante cīvaram aññātakam gahapatikam tatuttari viññāpitam nissaggiyam

original: (Cha) idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ pubbe appavārito aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: cha idam me bhante cīvaram pubbe a pavāritaḥ aññātakam gahapatikam upasaṅkamitvā vikappam āpannam nissaggiyam

original: (Ja) idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: idam me bhante cīvaram pubbe a pavāritaḥ aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā vikappam āpannam nissaggiyam

original: (Jha) idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena abhinipphāditaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: idam me bhante cīvaram atireka tikkhattum codanāya atireka chakkhattum ṭhānena abhinipphāditam nissaggiyam

original: (Ña) idaṃ me, bhante, kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: idam me bhante kosiya missakam santhatam kārāpitam nissaggiyam

original: (Ṭa) idaṃ me, bhante, suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: idam me bhante suddha kāḷakānam eḷaka lomānam santhatam kārāpitam nissaggiyam

original: (Ṭha) idaṃ me, bhante, santhataṃ anādiyitvā tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: idam me bhante santhatam an ādiyitvā tulam odātānam tulam gocariyānam kārāpitam nissaggiyam

original: (Ḍa) idaṃ me, bhante, santhataṃ ūnakachabbassāni kārāpitaṃ aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: idam me bhante santhatam ūnaka chabbassāni kārāpitam aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiyam

original: (Ḍha) idaṃ me, bhante, nisīdanasanthataṃ anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: idam me bhante nisīdana santhatam an ādiyitvā purāṇa santhatassa sāmantā sugata vidatthim kārāpitam nissaggiyam

original: (Ṇa) imāni me, bhante, eḷakalomāni tiyojanaparamaṃ atikkāmitāni nissaggiyāni.
analyzed: imāni me bhante eḷaka lomāni ti yojana paramam atikkāmitāni nissaggiyāni

original: (Ta) imāni me, bhante, eḷakalomāni aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpitāni nissaggiyāni.
analyzed: te imāni me bhante eḷaka lomāni aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpitāni nissaggiyāni

original: (Tha) ahaṃ, bhante, rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesiṃ, idaṃ me, bhante, nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmi.
analyzed: aham bhante rūpiyam paṭiggahesim idam me bhante nissaggiyam imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi

original: (Da) ahaṃ, bhante, nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjiṃ, idaṃ me, bhante, nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmīti.
analyzed: aham bhante nānappakārakam rūpiya saṃvohāram samāpajjiṃ idam me bhante nissaggiyam imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti

original: Nissajjitvāna āpattiṃ, deseyyātha gihiṃ vade;

original: “Jānāhima”nti iminā, so vadeyyāharāmi kiṃ.
analyzed: jānāhimanti saḥ vadeyī āharāmi kim

original: Avatvāmanti telādiṃ, vade bhikkhūna kappiyaṃ;

original: Yaṃ āharati so tena, parivattetvāna kappiyaṃ.
analyzed: yam āharati saḥ tena kappiyam

original: Labbhaṃ ṭhapetvā dvepete, sesehi paribhuñjituṃ;
analyzed: labbham ṭhapetvā dvepete sesehi paribhuñjitum

original: Tato aññena laddhopi, bhāgo tesaṃ na kappati.

original: 393. (Ka) ahaṃ, bhante, nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjiṃ, idaṃ me, bhante, nissaggiyaṃ.

analyzed: nissajjitvāna deseyya āpattim pattagāhakam

analyzed: ṅe idam me bhante cīvaram pubbe a pavāritaḥ aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā vikappam āpannam nissaggiyam

original: (Ca) idaṃ me, bhante, accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: ca idam me bhante acceka cīvaram cīvara kāla samayam atikkāmitam nissaggiyam

original: (Cha) idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ atirekachārattaṃ vippavutthaṃ aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ.
analyzed: cha idam me bhante cīvaram atireka chārattam vippavuttham aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiyam

original: (Ja) idaṃ me, bhante, jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ āyasmato nissajjāmīti.
analyzed: idam me bhante saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam attano pariṇāmitam nissaggiyam imā aham āyasmataḥ nissajjāmi iti

original: 396. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ yathāyogaṃ, ādimhi viya yojaye.
analyzed: sesam sabbam yathāyogam ādimhi viya yojaye

analyzed: ka aham bhante ekam pācittiya āpattim āpajjim dve sambahulāḥ pācittiya āpattiyaḥ āpajjim

original: (Kha) gārayhaṃ, bhante, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemīti. Tena “passasi, āvuso, taṃ dhamma”nti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: gārayham bhante dhammam āpajjim asappāyam pāṭidesanīyam tam paṭidesemi iti tena passasi āvuso tam dhammanti vattabbam

original: (Ga) ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ dukkaṭāpattiṃ āpajjiṃ. Dve sambahulā dukkaṭāpattiyo āpajjiṃ.
analyzed: ga aham bhante ekam dukkaṭa āpattim āpajjim dve sambahulāḥ dukkaṭa āpattiyaḥ āpajjim

original: (Gha) ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ dubbhāsitāpattiṃ āpajjiṃ. Dve sambahulā dubbhāsitāpattiyo āpajjiṃ. Tā tumhamūle paṭidesemīti.
analyzed: gha aham bhante ekam dubbhāsita āpattim āpajjim dve sambahulāḥ dubbhāsita āpattiyaḥ āpajjim tā tumha mūle paṭidesemi iti

original: (Ṅa) “ahaṃ, bhante, dve nānāvatthukā thullaccayāpattiyo āpajjiṃ. Sambahulā nānāvatthukā
analyzed: aham bhante dve nānā vatthukā thullaccaya āpattiyaḥ āpajjim sambahulāḥ nānā vatthukā

original: thullaccayāpattiyo āpajjiṃ, tā tumhamūle paṭidesemī”ti vatvā tena “passasi, āvuso,
analyzed: thullaccaya āpattiyaḥ āpajjim tā tumha mūle paṭidesemi iti vatvā tena passasi āvuso

original: vutte “sādhu suṭṭhu, bhante, saṃvarissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: vutte sādhu suṭṭhu bhante saṃvarissāmi iti vattabbam

original: Adesanāgāminiyaṃ, anāpattiñca desitaṃ;
analyzed: a desanā gāminiyam anāpattim ca desitam

original: Nānā saṃvāsanissīmaṭṭhitānaṃ catupañcahi;

original: Manasā pakatattānaṃ, nānekāti na desayeti.
analyzed: manasā na aneka ati na desaya iti

original: 43. Chandadānaniddeso
analyzed: chanda dāna niddeso

original: Chandadānādīti –
analyzed: chanda dāna ādi iti

original: Bheriṃ ghaṇṭiṃ patāḷetvā, kammappatte samāgate;
analyzed: bherim ghaṇṭim patāḷetvā kammappatte samāgate

original: Saṅghe hareyya chandaṃ vā, pārisuddhiṃ pavāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: saṅghe hareyya chandam vā pārisuddhim pavāraṇam

original: Ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upaggamma, nisīditvā ukkuṭikaṃ;
analyzed: ekam bhikkhum upaggamma nisīditvā ukkuṭikam

original: Añjaliṃ paggaṇhitvāna, dade chandaṃ vicakkhaṇo.
analyzed: añjalim paggaṇhitvāna dade chandam vicakkhaṇaḥ

original: 401. (Ka) “chandaṃ dammi, chandaṃ me hara, chandaṃ me ārocehī”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: ka chandam dammi chandam me hara chandam me ārocehi iti vattabbam

original: (Kha) pārisuddhiṃ dentena “pārisuddhiṃ dammi, pārisuddhiṃ me hara, pārisuddhiṃ me ārocehī”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: pārisuddhim dentena pārisuddhim dammi pārisuddhim me hara pārisuddhim me ārocehi iti vattabbam

original: Pārisuddhippadānena, sampādeti uposathaṃ;
analyzed: pārisuddhi padānena sampādeti uposatham

original: Saṅghassa attano cāpi, sesakammaṃ vibādhati.
analyzed: saṅghassa attano ca api sesa kammam vibādhati

original: Chandadānena saṅghassa, dvayaṃ sādheti nattano;
analyzed: chanda dānena saṅghassa dvayam sādha iti

original: Tasmā chandaṃ dadantena, dātabbā pārisuddhipi.
analyzed: tasmā chandam dadantena dātabbā pārisuddhi pi

original: Hareyyeko bahūnampi, paramparā na hāraye;
analyzed: hareyi ekaḥ bahūn ampi paramparā na hāraye

original: Paramparāhaṭā chanda-pārisuddhi na gacchati.
analyzed: paramparā haṭā chanda pārisuddhi na gacchati

original: 405. Sabbūpacāraṃ katvāna, evaṃ deyyā pavāraṇā. “Pavāraṇaṃ dammi, pavāraṇaṃ me hara, pavāraṇaṃ me ārocehi, mamatthāya pavārehī”ti.
analyzed: sabbūpacāram katvānaḥ evam deyyā pavāraṇā pavāraṇam dammi pavāraṇam me hara pavāraṇam me ārocehi mamatthāya pavārehi iti

original: 406. Ārocetvātha so saṅghaṃ, pavāreyyevamāgato. “Itthannāmo, bhante, saṅghaṃ pavāreti
analyzed: ārocetvā atha saḥ saṅgham pavāreyi evam āgataḥ itthannāmaḥ bhante saṅgham pavāreti

original: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadatu taṃ saṅgho anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto paṭikarissatī”ti.
analyzed: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā vadatu tam saṅghaḥ anukampam upādāya passantaḥ paṭikarissati iti

original: Gahetvā pārisuddhiṃ vā, chandaṃ vāpi pavāraṇaṃ;
analyzed: gahetvā pārisuddhim vā chandam vā api pavāraṇam

original: Hārako saṅghamappatvā, vibbhameyya mareyya vā.
analyzed: hārako saṅgham appatvā vibbhameyya mareyya vā

original: Sāmaṇerādibhāvaṃ vā,
analyzed: sāmaṇeḥ ādi bhāvam vā

original: Paṭijāneyya nāhaṭā;
analyzed: paṭijāneyya na āhaṭā

original: Patvā saṅghaṃ tathā heyya,
analyzed: patvā saṅgham tathā heyya

original: Āhaṭā hoti hārako.
analyzed: āhaṭā hoti hārakaḥ

original: atikkamitvā thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ ukkaṭṭhomako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ na
analyzed: atikkamitvā thūpīkatam tiṭṭhati ayam ukkaṭṭhomakaḥ nāma patto sace tam rājim na

original: sampāpuṇāti, antogatameva hoti, ayaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho nāma patto.
analyzed: sampāpuṇāti antar gatam eva hoti ayam ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhaḥ nāma patto

original: 62. “Majjhimo nāma patto nāḷikodanaṃ gaṇhātī”ti vuttattā “majjhimo tassupaḍḍho vā”ti
analyzed: majjhimaḥ nāma pattaḥ nāḷikodanam gaṇhāti iti vutta ttā majjhimaḥ vāti

original: vuttaṃ. Etthāpi vuttappakārena majjhimo majjhimomako majjhimukkaṭṭhoti pattattikaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ettha api vutta ppakārena majjhimaḥ majjhimomakaḥ majjhimukkaṭṭhaḥ ti patta ttikam

original: veditabbaṃ. “Omako nāma patto patthodanaṃ gaṇhātī”ti vacanato “tatopaḍḍho”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: veditabbam omakaḥ nāma patto patthodanam gaṇhāti iti vacanato tatopaḍḍho ti vuttam

original: Magadhanāḷiyā upaḍḍhanāḷikodanañca tadūpiyaṃ sūpaṃ byañjanañca gaṇhāti, so omako
analyzed: magadhanāḷiyāḥ upaḍḍhanāḷikā odanam ca tadūpiyam sūpam byañjanam ca gaṇhāti saḥ omakaḥ

original: nāma. Idhāpi omako omakomako omakukkaṭṭhoti pattattikaṃ veditabbaṃ. Imesu pana navasu
analyzed: nāma idha api omakaḥ omakomakaḥ omakukkaṭṭho ti patta ttikam veditabbam imesu pana navasu

original: pattesu ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho ca omakomako ca apatto. Etesu adhiṭṭhātabbakiccaṃ natthi,
analyzed: pattesu ukkaṭṭha ukkaṭṭhaḥ ca omaka umakaḥ ca a pattaḥ etesu adhiṭṭhātabba kiccam natthi

original: sesā satta pattā adhiṭṭhātabbā, vikappetabbā cāti attho.
analyzed: sesā satta pattā adhiṭṭhātabbā vikappetabbā ca ati attho

original: 63. Atirekapattoti anadhiṭṭhito avikappito. Sakoti sasantako. Kappoti kappiyo. Ayamevettha
analyzed: atireka patto ti anadhiṭṭhitaḥ avikappito sakaḥ ti sa santako kappo ti kappiyaḥ ayam eva ittha

original: saṅkhepo – yo patto kākaṇikamattassāpi mūlassa dātabbassa natthitāya sako. Ayopatto
analyzed: saṅkhepaḥ yaḥ pattaḥ kākaṇika mattassa api mūlassa dātabbassa na atthitāya sakaḥ ayopatto

original: pañcahi pākehi mattikāpatto dvīhi pākehi pakkattā kappo. So dasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ anadhiṭṭhito
analyzed: pañcahi pākehi mattikā pattaḥ dvīhi pākehi pakkattā kappo so daśa aha paramam kālam an adhiṭṭhitaḥ

original: avikappito dhāreyyoti.
analyzed: a vikappitaḥ dhāreyyaḥ iti

original: 64. Acchedādayo cīvare vuttappabhedāyeva. Chiddenāti ettha yassa pattassa mukhavaṭṭito
analyzed: accheda ādayaḥ cīvare vutta ppabhedāya iva chiddena ati ettha yassa pattassa mukha vaṭṭitaḥ

original: heṭṭhā dvaṅgulappadese yena chiddena kaṅgusitthaṃ nikkhamati, tattakena chiddena
analyzed: heṭṭhā dvaṅgula ppadese yena chiddena kaṅgu sittham nikkhamati tattakena chiddena

original: bhijjati. Tasmiṃ pana ayacuṇṇādīhi paṭipākatike kate dasāhabbhantare puna adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhijjati tasmin pana aya cuṇṇa ādīhi paṭipākatike kate puna adhiṭṭhātabbam

original: Pattādhiṭṭhānamujjhatīti patto adhiṭṭhānaṃ ujjhati.
analyzed: patta adhiṭṭhānam ujjhati iti pattaḥ adhiṭṭhānam ujjhati

original: 65. Idāni pariharaṇavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “pattaṃ na paṭisāmeyya sodaka”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni pariharaṇa vidhim dassetum pattam na paṭisāmeyya sodakam ti ādi āraddham

original: Sodakaṃ pattaṃ na paṭisāmeyya, ātape ca sodakaṃ pattaṃ na otapeti adhippāyo. Na nidaheti
analyzed: sa udakam pattam na paṭisāmeyyaḥ ātape ca sa udakam pattam na otapeti adhippāyaḥ na nidaheti

original: nirudakaṃ katvāpi atikālaṃ na nidaheti adhippāyo. Bhumyāti bhūmiyaṃ. Na ṭhapeti taṭṭikācammakhaṇḍādīsu
analyzed: nirudakam katvā api atikālam na nidaha iti adhippāyaḥ bhumyā ati na ṭhapeti taṭṭikā camma khaṇḍa ādīsu

original: yena kenaci anatthatāya paṃsusakkharamissāya bhūmiyā na ṭhapeyyāti attho. No ca laggayeti
analyzed: yena kenaci anattha tāya paṃsu sakkhara missāya bhūmiyā na ṭhapeyya ati atthaḥ no ca laggayā iti

original: etthapi nāgadantādīsu yattha katthaci laggantassa dukkaṭameva.
analyzed: ettha api nāgadanta ādīsu yattha katthaci laggantassa dukkaṭam eva

original: 66. Miḍḍhanteti miḍḍhapariyante. Sace pana parivattetvā tattheva patiṭṭhāti, evarūpāya
analyzed: miḍḍhante iti miḍḍha pariyante sace pana parivattetvā tattha eva patiṭṭhāti evarūpāya

original: vitthiṇṇāya miḍḍhiyā abbhantaraparicchede ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, na pariyante. Paribhaṇḍanteti
analyzed: vitthiṇṇāya miḍḍhiyā abbhantara paricchede ṭhapetum vaṭṭati na pariyante paribhaṇḍantā iti

original: bāhirapasse katāya tanukamiḍḍhiyā anteti attho. Aṅke vāti dvinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ majjhe.
analyzed: bāhira passe katāya tanu kamiḍḍhiyā anta iti atthaḥ aṅke vāti dvinnam ūrūnam majjhe

original: Ettha pana aṃsabaddhake aṃsakūṭe laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, na itarathā. Ātapattaketi
analyzed: ettha pana aṃsa baddhake aṃsa kūṭe laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetum vaṭṭati na itarathā ātapattaka iti

original: chatte. Ettha bhattapūropi aṃsakūṭe laggitapattopi ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: chatte ettha bhatta pūraḥ api aṃsakūṭe laggita pattaḥ api ṭhapetum na vaṭṭati

original: 67. Ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ nāma mukhavikkhālanodakaṃ, taṃ patte niṭṭhubhitvā pattena na nīhareyyāti
analyzed: ucchiṭṭhodakam nāma mukha vikkhālana udakam tam patte niṭṭhubhitvā pattena na nīhareyya ati

original: attho. Calakañca aṭṭhikañca calakaṭṭhikaṃ. Etesu yaṃ kiñci pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: calakam ca aṭṭhikam ca calakaṭṭhikam etesu yam kiñci pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭam

original: Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā hatthaṃ dhovitumpi na labhati. Hatthadhovitavatthadhovitaudakampi
analyzed: pattam paṭiggaham katvā hattham dhovitum pi na labhati hattha dhovita vattha dhovita odakam pi

original: patte ākiritvā nīharituṃ na vaṭṭati. Anucchiṭṭhapattaṃ ucchiṭṭhahatthena gahetumpi
analyzed: patte ākiritvā nīharitum na vaṭṭati an ucchiṭṭha pattam ucchiṭṭha hatthena gahetum pi

original: na vaṭṭati. Hatthaṃ pana bahi dhovitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Macchamaṃsaphalāphalādīni
analyzed: na vaṭṭati hattham pana bahi dhovitvā gahetum vaṭṭati maccha maṃsa phala aphala ādīni

original: khādanto yaṃ mukhena luñcitvā luñcitvā khādati, taṃ vā tesaṃ aṭṭhiādikaṃ vā mukhato
analyzed: khādantaḥ yam mukhena luñcitvā luñcitvā khādati tam vā tesam aṭṭhi ādikam vā mukhataḥ

original: nīhaṭaṃ puna akhāditukāmo chaḍḍetukāmo patte ṭhapetuṃ na labhati. Siṅgiveranāḷikerakhaṇḍādīni
analyzed: nīhaṭam puna a khāditu kāmaḥ chaḍḍetu kāmaḥ patte ṭhapetum na labhati siṅgivera nāḷikera khaṇḍa ādīni

original: khādantehi ḍaṃsitvā ḍaṃsitvā puna ṭhapetuṃ labhati. “Na bhikkhave pattahatthena kavāṭaṃ
analyzed: khādantehi ḍaṃsitvā ḍaṃsitvā puna ṭhapetum labhati na bhikkhave patta hatthena kavāṭam

original: paṇāmetabbaṃ, yo paṇāmeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena
analyzed: paṇāmetabbam yaḥ paṇāmeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa ati vutta ttā yena kenaci sarīra avayavena

original: pattaṃ gahetvā ṭhito yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetuṃ na labhati, tasmā
analyzed: pattam gahetvā ṭhitaḥ yena kenacid sarīra avayavena kavāṭam paṇāmetum na labhati tasmai

original: “pattahatthovā”ti vuttaṃ. Aṃsakūṭe laggitvā ṭhitassa vaṭṭati.
analyzed: patta hatthā uva iti vuttam aṃsakūṭe laggitvā ṭhitassa vaṭṭati

original: 68. Bhūmiādhāraketi ettha dantavallivettavākādīhi kate valayādhārake. Dārudaṇḍādhāreti
analyzed: bhūmi ādhāraka iti kate valaya ādhārake dāru daṇḍa ādhāra iti

original: ekadārunā kataādhārake ca bahūhi daṇḍehi kataādhārake cāti attho. Tidaṇḍe na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: eka dārunā kata ādhārake ca bahūhi daṇḍehi kata ādhārake ca ati ti daṇḍe na vaṭṭati

original: Etesu pana susajjitesu ekaṃ pattaṃ ṭhapetvāva tassupari ekaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, tayo
analyzed: etesu pana su sajjitesu ekam pattam ṭhapetvā ava tassa upari ekam ṭhapetum vaṭṭati tayo

analyzed: pana na vaṭṭanti ekam nikkujjitvā ava bhūmiyanti ettha bhūmiyam kaṭasāraka ādīsu aññataram

analyzed: pattharitvā tassa upari nikkujjitvā vā ukkujjitvā vā ekam ṭhapeyya dve ṭhapetum na

analyzed: vaṭṭati iti adhippāyaḥ dve pana ṭhapentena upari ṭhapita pattam ekena passena bhūmiyam

original: phusāpetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
analyzed: phusā petvā ṭhapetum vaṭṭati iti vadanti

original: 69-70. Idāni akappiyapatte dassetuṃ “dārurūpiyasovaṇṇā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha maṇiveḷuriyāmayāti
analyzed: idāni akappiya patte dassetum dāru rūpiya sovaṇṇā ti ādi āraddham tattha

analyzed: maṇi iti inda nīla kabarakata ādi sace gahaṭṭhā bhattagge suvaṇṇa rūpiya taṭṭaka ādīsu su upabyañjanam

original: katvā upanāmenti, āmasitumpi na vaṭṭati. Ghaṭikaṭāhajā ca tumbakaṭāhajā ca ghaṭitumbakaṭāhajā.
analyzed: katvā upanāmenti na vaṭṭati ghaṭi kaṭāha jā ca tumba kaṭāha jā ca ghaṭi tumba kaṭāha jā

original: Ettha tumbakaṭāhajānāma alābu. Pattavinicchayo.
analyzed: ettha alābu patta vinicchayaḥ

original: Pattaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: patta niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 6. Thālakaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: thālaka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 71-2. Idāni thālakesu kappiyākappiyavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “thālakā cā”ti padaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
analyzed: idāni thālakesu kappiya akappiya vidhim dassetum thālakā ca ati padam

original: Tattha akappāti dārumayādayo thālakā akappiyāti attho. Phalikathālakādayo gihisantakā
analyzed: tattha akappā ti dārumaya ādayaḥ thālakāḥ akappiyā ati attho phalika thālaka ādayaḥ gihisantakā

original: vā saṅghasantakā vā kappiyā. Ghaṭitumbakaṭāhajā tāvakālikā, tāsu bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetabbā,
analyzed: vā saṅgha santakāḥ vā kappiyāḥ ghaṭi tumba kaṭāha jā tāvakālikā tāsu bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetabbā

original: na pariharitabbāti adhippāyo. Thālakavinicchayo.
analyzed: na pariharitabbā ati adhippāyaḥ thālaka vinicchayo

original: Thālakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: thālaka niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 7. Pavāraṇāniddesavaṇṇanā
73. Idāni pavāraṇāvidhiṃ dassetuṃ “pavāraṇā”ti padaṃ uddhaṭaṃ. Tattha iriyāpathenāti
analyzed: idāni pavāraṇā vidhim dassetum pavāraṇā ati padam uddhaṭam tattha iriyāpathena ati

original: ṭhānagamanasayananisajjānaṃ aññatarena iriyāpathenāti attho. Tato iriyāpathato aññena
analyzed: ṭhāna gamana sayana nisajjānam aññatarena iriyāpathena ati tatas iriyāpathataḥ aññena

original: iriyāpathena anatirittakaṃ paribhuñjeyya ce, pācittiyanti attho. Pācittinatirittakanti
analyzed: iriyāpathena an atirittakam paribhuñjeyya ce pācittiyam ti

original: pācitti anatirittakaṃ.
analyzed: pācitti an atirittakam

original: 74. Idāni yehi aṅgehi pavāraṇā hoti, tāni aṅgāni dassetuṃ “asana”ntiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: idāni yehi aṅgehi pavāraṇā hoti tāni aṅgāni dassetum tattha

original: asananti etena avippakatabhojanatā vuttā, bhuñjamāno ca so puggalo hotīti attho.
analyzed: etena a vippakata bhojana tā vuttā bhuñjamānaḥ ca so puggalaḥ hoti iti attho

original: Bhojanañcevāti yaṃ bhuñjanto pavāreti, taṃ odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsanti imesu
analyzed: bhojanam ca iva ati yam bhuñjantaḥ pavāreti tam odanaḥ kummāsaḥ sattu macchas maṃsanti imesu

original: aññataraṃ hotīti attho. Abhihāroti dāyako tassa taṃ bhattaṃ kāyena abhiharatīti attho,
analyzed: aññataram hoti iti attho abhihāro ti dāyako tassa tam bhattam kāyena abhiharati iti attho

original: vācābhihāro pana na gahetabbo. Samīpatāti dāyako pavāraṇappahonakabhojanaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: vācā abhihāraḥ pana na gahetabbo samīpa tā ti dāyakaḥ pavāraṇa pahonaka bhojanam gahetvā

original: aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇe okāse hotīti attho. Kāyavācāpaṭikkhepoti hatthapāse ṭhitena
analyzed: aḍḍhateyya hattha ppamāṇe okāse hoti iti attho kāya vācā paṭikkhepaḥ ti hattha pāse ṭhitena

original: abhihaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipeyyāti attho. Ettha pana sace bhikkhu
analyzed: abhihaṭam bhikkham kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipeyya ati atthaḥ ettha pana sace bhikkhu

original: nisinno hoti, ānisadassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya, sace ṭhito, paṇhiantato paṭṭhāya,
analyzed: nisinno hoti ānisadassa pārimantataḥ paṭṭhāya sace ṭhito paṇhi antataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: sace nipanno, yena passena nipanno, tassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya dāyakassāpi tathāvidhassa
analyzed: sace nipannaḥ yena passena nipanno tassa pārimantataḥ paṭṭhāya dāyakassa api tathāvidhassa

original: ṭhapetvā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ tassa āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ, tassa vasena paricchedo kātabbo.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā pasārita hattham yam tassa āsannataram aṅgam tassa vasena paricchedaḥ kātabbo

original: Pañca aṅgā pavāraṇāti “asanaṃ paññāyati, bhojanaṃ paññāyati, hatthapāse ṭhito abhiharati,
analyzed: pañca aṅgā asanam paññāyati bhojanam paññāyati hattha pāse ṭhitaḥ abhiharati

original: paṭikkhepo paññāyatī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttehi imehi pañcahi aṅgehi pavāraṇā hotīti attho.
analyzed: paṭikkhepaḥ paññāyati iti pāḷiyam vuttehi imehi pañcahi aṅgehi pavāraṇā hoti iti attho

original: 75. Idāni etesu pañcasu bhojanaṃ dassetuṃ “odano”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idāni odanādayo imehi
analyzed: idāni etesu pañcasu bhojanam dassetum odana uti ādi vuttam idāni odana ādayaḥ imehi

original: nibbattāti dassetuṃ “sālī”tiādimāha. Tattha setarattakāḷabhedā sabbāpi kaṅgujātiyo
analyzed: nibbattā iti dassetum sālī iti ādim āha tattha seta ratta kāḷa bhedā sabbā api kaṅgu jātiyaḥ

original: kaṅgūti gahetabbā. Kāḷasetā kudrūsavarakā. Imesaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ odano ca bhojjayāgu
analyzed: kaṅgūti gahetabbā kāḷasetā kudrūsavarakā imesam sattannam dhaññānam odano ca bhojja yāgu

original: ca odano nāmāti attho.
analyzed: ca odanaḥ nāma ati attho

original: 76. Sāmākāditiṇaṃ kudrūsake saṅgahaṃ gatanti attho. Varakacorako varake saṅgahaṃ
analyzed: sāmāka ādi tiṇam kudrūsake saṅgaham gatanti attho varaka corakaḥ varake saṅgaham

original: gato, sāliyañceva nīvāro saṅgahaṃ gato setattāti vadanti. Imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ
analyzed: gataḥ sāliyam ca iva nīvāraḥ saṅgaham gataḥ vadanti imesam vutta ppakārānam

original: sānulomānaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ taṇḍule gahetvā “yāguṃ pacissāmā”ti vā “bhattaṃ pacissāmā”ti
analyzed: sa anulomānam sattannam dhaññānam taṇḍule gahetvā yāgum pacissāma ati vā bhattam pacissāma ati

original: vā yaṃ kiñci sandhāya pacanti, sace uṇhaṃ vā sītalaṃ vā bhuñjantānaṃ bhojanakāle
analyzed: vā yam kiñci sandhāya pacanti sace uṇham vā sītalam vā bhuñjantānam bhojana kāle

original: gahitagahitaṭṭhāne odhi paññāyati, ayaṃ odano nāma, pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Yopi pāyāso
analyzed: gahita gahita ṭṭhāne odhi paññāyati ayam odanaḥ nāma pavāraṇam janeti yaḥ api pāyāso

original: vā ambilayāgu vā uddhanato otāritamattā abbhuṇhā āvijjhitvā pivituṃ sakkā, gahitokāsepi
analyzed: vā ambila yāgu vā uddhanataḥ otārita mattā abbhuṇhā āvijjhitvā pivitum sakkā gahita ukāse pi

original: odhiṃ na dasseti, ayaṃ pavāraṇaṃ na janeti. Usumāya pana vigatāya ghanabhāvaṃ gacchati,
analyzed: odhim na dasseti ayam pavāraṇam na janeti usumāya pana vigatāya ghana bhāvam gacchati

original: odhi paññāyati, puna pavāraṇaṃ janeti, pubbe tanukabhāvo na rakkhati. Bhatte pana
analyzed: odhi paññāyati puna pavāraṇam janeti pubbe tanuka bhāvaḥ na rakkhati bhatte pana

original: udakakañjikakhīrādīni ākiritvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, kiñcāpi tanukā hoti, pavāraṇaṃ
analyzed: udaka kañjika khīra ādīni ākiritvā yāgum gaṇhatha iti vadanti kiñca api tanukāḥ pavāraṇam

original: janetiyeva tasmiṃ yāguyā natthibhāvato. Sace pana pakkuthitesu udakādīsu pakkhipitvā
analyzed: janetiyā iva tasmin yāguyā natthi bhāvato sace pana pakkuthitesu udaka ādīsu pakkhipitvā

original: pacitvā denti, yāgusaṅgahameva gacchati.
analyzed: pacitvā denti yāgu saṅgaham eva gacchati

original: 77. Bhaṭṭhadhaññamayoti sattavidhānipi dhaññāni gahetvā kharapākabhajjitānaṃ tesaṃ
analyzed: sattavidhāni api dhaññāni gahetvā khara pāka bhajjitānam tesam

original: taṇḍule koṭṭetvā katacuṇṇakuṇḍakāni sattu nāma. Samapākabhajjitānaṃ pana ātapasukkhānaṃ
analyzed: taṇḍule koṭṭetvā kata cuṇṇa kuṇḍakāni sattu nāma sama pāka bhajjitānam pana ātapa sukkhānam

original: vā taṇḍulānaṃ cuṇṇakuṇḍakāni sattusaṅkhyaṃ na gacchanti. Yavasambhavoti aññehi pana
analyzed: vā taṇḍulānam cuṇṇa kuṇḍakāni sattu saṅkhyam na gacchanti aññehi pana

original: muggādīhi katakummāso na pavāretīti adhippāyo. Udakasambhavoti iminā kakkaṭakasippikasambukādayopi
analyzed: mugga ādīhi kata kummāsaḥ na pavāreti iti adhippāyaḥ udaka sambhavaḥ ti iminā kakkaṭaka sippika sambuka ādayaḥ api

original: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Sace yāgupānakāle ekasmiṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā macchamaṃsaṃ vā khādanti,
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchanti sace yāgu pāna kāle ekasmin bhājane ṭhapetvā maccha maṃsam vā khādanti

original: te ce akhādanto aññaṃ pavāraṇappahonakaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Khāditepi sace
analyzed: te ce a khādantaḥ aññam pavāraṇa pahonakam paṭikkhipati na pavāreti khādite pi sace

original: mukhe avasiṭṭhaṃ natthi, tadā paṭikkhipantopi na pavāretiyeva. Sace patte avasiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: mukhe avasiṭṭham natthi tadā paṭikkhipantaḥ pi na pavāreti yeva sace patte avasiṭṭham

original: atthi, mukhe natthi, tañce akhāditukāmo hoti, aññattha vā gantvā khāditukāmo, tasmiṃ
analyzed: atthi mukhe na atthi tañce a khāditu kāmo hoti aññattha vā gantvā khāditu kāmo tasmiṃ

original: khaṇe paṭikkhipantopi na pavāretiyeva.
analyzed: khaṇe paṭikkhipanto pi na

original: 78. Bhojananti pañcasu bhojanesu yaṃ kiñci bhojanaṃ. Kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā bhuñjantoti
analyzed: bhojananti pañcasu bhojanesu yam kiñci bhojanam kappiyam vā akappiyam vā bhuñjanto ti

original: sambandho. Nisedhayanti kāyenābhihaṭaṃ aṅgulicalanādinā vā bhamukavikārena vā kuddhabhāvena
analyzed: sambandhaḥ nisedhayanti kāyena abhihaṭam aṅguli calana ādinā vā bhamuka vikārena vā kuddha bhāvena

original: olokena vā paṭikkhipanto kāyena vā “ala”nti vā “na gaṇhāmī”ti vā “mā ākirā”ti vā
analyzed: olokena vā paṭikkhipanto kāyena vā alanti vā na gaṇhāmi iti vā mā ākirāti vā

original: “apagacchā”ti vā ādinā nayena paṭikkhipanto vācāya vā nisedhayantoti attho. Kappanti
analyzed: apagaccha ati vā ādinā nayena paṭikkhipantaḥ vācāya vā nisedhayantaḥ ti attho kappanti

original: kappiyabhojanameva paṭikkhipanto so pavāreti, akappiyamaṃsaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā paṭikkhipanto
analyzed: kappiya bhojanam eva paṭikkhipanto saḥ pavāreti akappiya maṃsam vā bhojanam vā paṭikkhipanto

original: na pavāreti. Kasmā? Tassa paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā. Sace kappiyabhojanaṃ bhuñjamāno
analyzed: na pavāreti kasmā tassa paṭikkhipitabba ṭṭhāne ṭhita ttā sace kappiya bhojanam bhuñjamāno

original: akappiyaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Kasmā? Tassa paṭikkhipitabbato. Idāni missakanayaṃ
analyzed: akappiyam paṭikkhipati na pavāreti kasmā tassa paṭikkhipitabbataḥ idāni missaka nayam

original: dassetuṃ “tannāmenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ piṇḍattho – tannāmena vā imanti vā abhihaṭaṃ
analyzed: dassetum tad nāmena atiādi vuttam tatra ayam piṇḍa atthaḥ tad nāmena vā imanti vā abhihaṭam

original: kappiyaṃ nisedhayaṃ pavāreyyāti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yo pana macchamaṃsamissaṃ yāguṃ
analyzed: kappiyam pavāreyya iti kim vuttam hoti yaḥ pana maccha maṃsa missam yāgum

original: byañjanaṃ vā āharitvā “macchaṃ gaṇhatha, maṃsaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, taṃ paṭikkhipato
analyzed: byañjanam vā āharitvā maccham gaṇhatha maṃsam gaṇhatha iti vadati tam paṭikkhipataḥ

original: pavāraṇā hoti. Sace “yāguṃ gaṇhatha, rasabyañjanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, taṃ paṭikkhipato
analyzed: pavāraṇā hoti sace yāgum gaṇhatha rasa byañjanam gaṇhatha ati vadati tam paṭikkhipato

original: pavāraṇā na hoti. Kasmā? Tassāpi atthitāya. Sace “imaṃ gaṇhathā”ti savatthukaṃ katvā
analyzed: pavāraṇā na hoti kasmā tassa api atthitāya sace imam gaṇhatha ati savatthukam katvā

original: deti, taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti. Bhattamissakepi eseva nayo. Sace aññassa abhihaṭaṃ
analyzed: deti tam paṭikkhipataḥ pavāraṇā hoti bhattamissake pi esā iva nayaḥ sace aññassa abhihaṭam

original: paṭikkhipati, pavāraṇā natthiyeva.
analyzed: paṭikkhipati pavāraṇā natthiya iva

original: 79-80. Idāni pavāraṇaṃ ajanente dassetuṃ “lājā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha lājā taṃsattubhattānīti
analyzed: idāni pavāraṇam ajanente dassetum lāja atiādi vuttam ettha lājā tad sattu bhattāni iti

original: lājā ca lājehi katasattubhattāni cāti attho. Macchamaṃsapūvesu pana pavāraṇā hoti,
analyzed: lājā ca lājehi kata sattu bhattāni ca ati atthaḥ maccha maṃsa pūvesu pana pavāraṇā hoti

original: tasmā “suddhakhajjako”ti vuttaṃ. Bhaṭṭhapiṭṭhanti pubbe āmakaṃ pacchā bhajjitabbanti
analyzed: tasmā suddha khajjakaḥ iti vuttam bhaṭṭha piṭṭham ti pubbe āmakam pacchā bhajjitabbanti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Veḷuādīnaṃ vuttāvasesānaṃ bhattanti sambandho. Rasayāgu raso pakkayāgu.
analyzed: vuttam hoti veḷu ādīnam vutta avasesānam bhattam iti sambandhaḥ rasa yāgu rasaḥ pakka yāgu

original: Maṃsādīhi amissitā suddhayāgu. Puthukāmayaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
analyzed: maṃsa ādīhi a missitā suddha yāgu puthu kāmayam pana yam kiñci pavāraṇam na janeti

original: 81. Vuṭṭhāyāti āsanā uṭṭhāya atirittaṃ na kātabbanti sambandho. Sace pavāretvā āsanā
analyzed: vuṭṭhāya ati āsanā uṭṭhāya atirittam na kātabbanti sambandho sace pavāretvā āsanā

original: na vuṭṭhāti bhikkhu, tassāpi atirittaṃ kātuṃ labhati. Abhuttena ca bhojananti yena
analyzed: na vuṭṭhāti bhikkhu tassa api atirittam kātum labhati a bhuttena ca bhojana nti yena

original: pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ antamaso kusaggenāpi na bhuttaṃ, tenāpi atirittaṃ
analyzed: pañcannam bhojanānam aññataram bhojanam antamasaḥ kusaggena api na bhuttam tena api atirittam

original: na kātabbanti attho. Yena pana aruṇuggamepi bhuttaṃ hoti, so ce apavārito āsanā vuṭṭhitopi
analyzed: na kātabbam ti atthaḥ yena pana aruṇuggame pi bhuttam hoti saḥ ce apavāritaḥ āsanā vuṭṭhitaḥ api

original: majjhanhikasamayepi puna kiñci abhutvāpi kātuṃ labhati. Yena yaṃ vā pure katanti
analyzed: puna kiñci a bhutvā api kātum labhati yena yam vā pure

original: yena yaṃ vā pubbe kataṃ, tena tampi pacchā na kātabbaṃ. Aññena pana taṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
analyzed: yena yam vā pubbe katam tena tam pi pacchā na kātabbam aññena pana tam kātum vaṭṭati iti vadanti

original: 82. Yaṃ phalaṃ vā kandamūlaṃ vā pañcahi samaṇakappehi katakappiyaṃ aññampi kappiyabhojanaṃ
analyzed: yam phalam vā kanda mūlam vā pañcahi samaṇa kappehi kata kappiyam aññam pi kappiya bhojanam

original: vā kappiyamaṃsaṃ vā, idaṃ kappiyaṃ nāma, vuttappakāraviparītaṃ akappiyaṃ nāma, tasmiṃ
analyzed: vā kappiya maṃsam vā idam kappiyam nāma vutta ppakāra viparītam akappiyam nāma tasmin

original: atirittakaraṇaṃ na ruhati, yañca paṭiggahetvā na gahitaṃ, tasmimpi na ruhati, tena
analyzed: atiritta karaṇam na ruhati yat ca paṭiggahetvā na gahitam tasmin pi na ruhati tena

original: vuttaṃ “kappiyaṃ gahitañcevā”ti. Uccāritanti kappiyaṃ kāretuṃ āgatena bhikkhunā īsakampi
analyzed: vuttam kappiyam gahitam ca iva ati uccāritanti kappiyam kāretum āgatena bhikkhunā īsakampi

original: ukkhittaṃ vā apanamitaṃ vāti attho. Hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, tena
analyzed: ukkhittam vā apanamitam vā ati atthaḥ hattha pāsataḥ bahi ṭhitam kātum na vaṭṭati tena

original: vuttaṃ “hatthapāsaga”nti. Atirittaṃ karontevanti atirittaṃ karonto “alametaṃ sabba”nti
analyzed: vuttam hattha pāsaganti atirittam karontā iva atirittam karontaḥ alam etam sabbanti

original: vacībhedaṃ katvā evaṃ bhāsatūti attho. “Alametaṃ sabba”nti tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: vacībhedam katvā evam bhāsatu iti atthaḥ alam etam sabbam ti tikkhattum vattabbam

original: ayaṃ kira āciṇṇo. Vinayadharā kira pana “sakiṃ eva vattabba”nti vadanti. Alametaṃ
analyzed: ayam kira āciṇṇaḥ vinaya dharā kira pana sakim eva vattabbanti vadanti alam etam

original: sabbanti idampi vo adhikaṃ, ito aññaṃ na lacchasīti attho.
analyzed: sabbam ti idam pi vaḥ adhikam itas aññam na lacchasi iti attho

original: 83. Anupasampannahatthaganti kappiyaṃ karontena pana anupasampannassa hatthe ṭhitaṃyeva
analyzed: anupasampanna hatthaganti kappiyam karontena pana anupasampannassa hatthe ṭhitam yeva

original: na kātabbaṃ, taṃ pana aññena bhikkhunā paṭiggahāpetvā tassa hatthe ṭhitaṃ atirittaṃ
analyzed: na kātabbam tam pana aññena bhikkhunā paṭiggahāpetvā tassa hatthe ṭhitam atirittam

original: katvā anupasampannassa dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Attanā āgantvā aññassa hatthe ca pesayitvāpi
analyzed: katvā anupasampannassa dātum vaṭṭati attanā āgantvā aññassa hatthe ca pesayitvā api

original: kāretuṃ labbhateti attho. Taṃ pana atirittakārakaṃ ṭhapetvā añño sabbo pavāritopi
analyzed: kāretum labbhate iti attho tam pana atiritta kārakam ṭhapetvā aññaḥ sabbo pavāritaḥ api

original: appavāritopi bhuñjituṃ labhatīti attho. Sace pavārito paribhuñjati, yathā akatena
analyzed: appavāritaḥ api bhuñjitum labhati iti sace pavārito paribhuñjati yathā a katena

original: missaṃ na hoti, tathā mukhañca hatthañca suddhaṃ katvā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Gilānassa bhuttāvasesampi
analyzed: missam na hoti tathā mukham ca hatthañca suddham katvā bhuñjitabbam gilānassa bhutta avasesam pi

original: tassa “ajja vā sve vā khādissatī”ti āhaṭampi anatirittakataṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Pavāraṇāvinicchayo.
analyzed: tassa ajja vā sve vā khādissati iti āhaṭam pi an atiritta katam bhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti pavāraṇā vinicchayaḥ

original: Pavāraṇāniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pavāraṇā niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 8. Kālikaniddesavaṇṇanā
84. Idāni ye te cattāro kālikā muninā vuttā “yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ
analyzed: idāni ye te cattāro kālikāḥ muninā vuttāḥ yāva kālikam yāma kālikam sattāha kālikam

original: yāvajīvika”nti, te dassetuṃ “kālikā cā”ti padaṃ uddhaṭaṃ. Tattha katame te kālikāti
analyzed: yāvajīvikanti te dassetum kālikā ca ati padam uddhaṭam tattha katame te kālikā ati

original: ce, te dassetuṃ “yāvakālika”ntiādimāha. Tesu aruṇuggamanato yāva ṭhitamajjhanhikā
analyzed: ce te dassetum yāvakālikam ti ādim āha tesu aruṇuggamanataḥ ṭhita majjhanhikā

original: bhuñjitabbato yāvakālikaṃ. Aruṇuggamanato yāva yāmāvasānā pipāsāya sati pipāsacchedanatthaṃ
analyzed: bhuñjitabbataḥ yāva kālikam aruṇuggamanataḥ yāva yāma avasānā pipāsāya sati pipāsa chedana attham

original: pātabbato yāmo kālo assāti yāmakālikaṃ. Tena upasametabbe ābādhe sati yāva sattāhā
analyzed: pātabbataḥ yāmaḥ kālaḥ assa ati yāmakālikam tena upasametabbe ābādhe sati yāva sattāhā

original: paribhuñjitabbato sattāhakālikaṃ. Ābādhe sati yāvajīvaṃ pariharitvā bhuñjitabbato yāvajīvikaṃ.
analyzed: paribhuñjitabbataḥ satta aha kālikam ābādhe sati yāvajīvam pariharitvā bhuñjitabbataḥ yāvajīvikam

original: 85. Tesu yāvakālikaṃ dassetuṃ “piṭṭhaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ khajja”ntiādimāha. Ettha piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ
analyzed: tesu yāvakālikam dassetum piṭṭham mūlam phalam khajjanti ādim āha ettha piṭṭha khādanīyam

original: nāma sattannaṃ tāva dhaññānaṃ dhaññānulomānaṃ aparaṇṇānañca piṭṭhaṃ panasapiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: nāma sattannam tāva dhaññānam dhañña anulomānam aparaṇṇānam ca piṭṭham panasa piṭṭham

original: labujapiṭṭhaṃ ambāṭakapiṭṭhaṃ sālapiṭṭhaṃ dhotakatālapiṭṭhaṃ khīravallipiṭṭhañcāti
analyzed: labuja piṭṭham ambāṭaka piṭṭham sāla piṭṭham dhotaka tāla piṭṭham khīravalli piṭṭham ca ati

original: evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca
analyzed: evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena manussānam khādanīya attham ca bhojanīya attham ca

original: pharaṇakāni piṭṭhāni yāvakālikāni. Imināva lakkhaṇena mūlakhādanīyādīsupi yāvakālikalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: pharaṇakāni piṭṭhāni yāvakālikāni iminā nāva lakkhaṇena mūla khādanīya ādīsu pi yāvakālika lakkhaṇam

original: veditabbaṃ, ativitthārabhayena saṃkhittaṃ. Goraso nāma khīradadhitakkaraso. Dhaññabhojananti
analyzed: veditabbam ati vitthāra bhayena saṃkhittam gorasaḥ nāma khīra dadhi takka rasaḥ dhañña bhojananti

original: sānulomāni sattadhaññāni ca pañcavidhabhojanañcāti attho. Yāgusūpappabhutayoti ettha
analyzed: sa anulomāni satta dhaññāni ca pañcavidha bhojanam ca ati atthaḥ ettha

original: pabhuti-saddena kandakhādanīyaṃ muḷālakhādanīyaṃ matthakakhādanīyaṃ khandhakhādanīyaṃ
analyzed: pabhuti saddena kanda khādanīyam muḷāla khādanīyam matthaka khādanīyam khandha khādanīyam

original: tacakhādanīyaṃ pattakhādanīyaṃ pupphakhādanīyaṃ aṭṭhikhādanīyaṃ niyyāsakhādanīyanti
analyzed: taca khādanīyam patta khādanīyam puppha khādanīyam aṭṭhi khādanīyam niyyāsa khādanīyanti

original: imāni saṅgahitānīti veditabbāni.
analyzed: imāni saṅgahitāni iti veditabbāni

original: Tatridaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ – bhisasaṅkhāto padumapuṇḍarīkakando piṇḍālumasālukaādayo
analyzed: tatra idam mukha matta nidassanam bhisa saṅkhāto paduma puṇḍarīka kando piṇḍālu masāluka ādayo

original: vallikando āluvakando tālakandoti evamādi kandakhādanīyaṃ. Padumamuḷālādayo muḷālakhādanīyaṃ.
analyzed: valli kandaḥ āluva kandaḥ tāla kandaḥ iti evamādi kanda khādanīyam paduma muḷāla ādayaḥ muḷāla khādanīyam

original: Tālahintālakuntālaketakanāḷikerapūgarukkhakhajjūrīādīnaṃ kaḷīrasaṅkhātā matthakā
analyzed: tāla hintāla kuntāla ketaka nāḷikera pūga rukkha khajjūrī ādīnam kaḷīra saṅkhātā matthakā

original: matthakakhādanīyaṃ. Ucchukhandho nīluppalarattuppalakumudasogandhikānaṃ pupphadaṇḍakānīti
analyzed: matthaka khādanīyam ucchukhandhaḥ nīluppala rattuppala kumuda sogandhikānam puppha daṇḍakāni iti

original: evamādi khandhakhādanīyaṃ. Tacakhādanīyaṃ ucchutaco eva eko yāvakāliko, sopi saraso.
analyzed: evamādi khandha khādanīyam taca khādanīyam eva ekaḥ sarasaḥ

original: Mūlakaṃ khārako caccu tambuko taṇḍuleyyakoti evamādi pattakhādanīyaṃ. Mūlakapupphaṃ
analyzed: mūlakam khārako caccu tambukaḥ taṇḍuleyyakaḥ iti evamādi patta khādanīyam mūlaka puppham

original: khārakapupphaṃ caccupupphaṃ tambukapupphanti evamādi pupphakhādanīyaṃ, asokapupphaṃ
analyzed: khāraka puppham caccu puppham tambuka pupphanti evamādi puppha khādanīyam asoka puppham

original: pana yāvajīvikaṃ. Labujapanasaṭṭhiādi aṭṭhikhādanīyaṃ. Niyyāsakhādanīye yāvakālikaṃ
analyzed: pana yāvajīvikam aṭṭhi khādanīyam niyyāsa khādanīye yāva kālikam

original: natthi. Ete vuttappakārā yāvakālikā hontīti attho.
analyzed: na atthi ete vutta ppakārāḥ yāvakālikāḥ honti iti attho

original: 86. Idāni “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭha pānāni ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ
analyzed: idāni anujānāmi bhikkhave aṭṭha pānāni amba pānam jambu pānam coca pānam moca pānam

original: madhukapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ sālūkapānaṃ phārusakapāna”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānakaṃ
analyzed: madhuka pānam muddika pānam sālūka pānam phārusaka pānanti evam vuttam aṭṭhavidham pānakam

original: yāmakālikaṃ nāmāti dassetuṃ “madhū”tiādimāha. Tattha madhujaṃ muddikajaṃ sālūkajaṃ

original: tāva piṇḍāya carituṃ na vaṭṭati. Yadi antogāme sarati, kāyabandhane sati ekamante
analyzed: piṇḍāya caritum na vaṭṭati yadi antogāme sarati kāya bandhane sati ekamante

original: ṭhatvā bandhitabbaṃ, asati ce nikkhamitvā bandhitvā puna piṇḍāya pavisitabbanti vadanti.
analyzed: ṭhatvā bandhitabbam asati ce nikkhamitvā bandhitvā puna piṇḍāya pavisitabbanti vadanti

original: 236. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve kāyabandhanāni paṭṭikaṃ sūkarantaka”nti vuttattā
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave dve kāyabandhanāni paṭṭikam sūkarantakam ti vutta ttā

original: “duvidha”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha sūkarantaṃ nāma kuñcikākosakā viya ante susiraṃ katvā
analyzed: duvidham ti vuttam tattha sūkarantam nāma kuñcikā kosakāḥ viya ante su siram katvā

original: koṭṭitaṃ. Rajju ca ekāti ekavaṭṭā rajju ca. Tadanulomikāti tesaṃ dvinnaṃ anulomikā.
analyzed: koṭṭitam rajju ca ekā ati eka vaṭṭā rajju ca tad anulomikā ati tesam dvinnam anulomikā

original: 237. Macchakaṇḍakakhajjurī-pattā maṭṭhā ca paṭṭikāti ettha ete macchakaṇṭakādayo
analyzed: macchakaṇḍaka khajjurī pattā maṭṭhā ca paṭṭikā ati ettha ete macchakaṇṭaka ādayaḥ

original: maṭṭhā vikārarahitā paṭṭikā ca tadantogadhāti adhippāyo. Labbhā dasā catassoti ekāya
analyzed: maṭṭhā vikāra rahitā paṭṭikā ca tad anta gadhā ti adhippāyaḥ labbhā dasā catasso ti ekāya

original: vā dvīsu vā tīsu vā kathā eva natthīti adhippāyo, tato paraṃ na vaṭṭati. Antesūti
analyzed: vā dvīsu vā tīsu vā kathā eva natthi iti adhippāyo tato param na vaṭṭati antesu iti

original: ubhosu antesu. Guṇasuttakanti diguṇasuttakaṃ.
analyzed: ubhosu antesu guṇa suttakanti diguṇa suttakam

original: 239. Makaramukhādinti ādi-saddena deḍḍubhasīsaṃ gahitaṃ. Ubhanteti ubhosu antesu.
analyzed: makara mukha ādin ti ādi saddena deḍḍubha sīsam gahitam ubhanta iti ubhosu antesu

original: Kassāti? Vidhassa. Ghaṭakāti ghaṭakato. Lekhāti lekhāya. Ghaṭakato ca lekhāya ca
analyzed: kassa ati vidhassa ghaṭakā ati ghaṭakataḥ lekhā ati lekhāya ghaṭakataḥ ca lekhāya ca

original: aññaṃ cittakaṃ na kappatīti attho.
analyzed: aññam cittakam na kappati iti attho

original: 240. Deḍḍubhakanti udakasappasirasadisaṃ. Murajanti bahurajjuke ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā
analyzed: udaka sappa sira sadisam murajanti bahu rajjuke ekatas saṅkaḍḍhitvā

original: ekāya rajjuyā paliveṭhetvā katarajju. Maddavīṇanti pāmaṅgasadisaṃ. Kalābukanti anekavaṭṭaṃ.
analyzed: rajjuyā paliveṭhetvā kata rajju aneka vaṭṭam

original: Etāni pana sabbāni na kappanti. Dasāsu dve majjhimāti murajaṃ maddavīṇanti dve majjhimā
analyzed: etāni pana sabbāni na kappanti dasāsu dve majjhimā ati murajam dve majjhimā

original: eva. Kappareti kappantīti attho.
analyzed: eva kapparā iti kappanti iti attho

original: 241. Gaṇṭhiyo cāpīti cīvaragaṇṭhiyopi. Veḷuādimayā kappantīti pasaṅgena vuttaṃ. Kāyabandhanavinicchayo.
analyzed: ca api iti cīvara gaṇṭhiyaḥ api veḷu ādi mayā kappanti iti pasaṅgena vuttam kāya bandhana vinicchayo

original: Kāyabandhananiddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kāya bandhana niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Paṭhamabhāṇavāraṃ.
analyzed: paṭhama bhāṇa vāram

original: 34. Pathavīniddesavaṇṇanā
242. Jātā ajātāti duvidhā pathavīti attho. Idāni tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “suddhamattikapaṃsukā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: jātā ajātā ati duvidhā pathavī iti atthaḥ idāni tat ubhayam dassetum suddha mattika paṃsuka iti ādim āha

original: Tattha suddhamattikapaṃsukā ca adaḍḍhā ca bahumattikapaṃsukā ca cātumāsādhikovaṭṭhapaṃsumattikarāsi
analyzed: tattha suddha mattika paṃsukā ca adaḍḍhā ca bahu mattika paṃsukā ca

original: ca jātapathavīti sambandho. Ettha pana adaḍḍhāti uddhanapacanakumbhakārāvāpabhājanapacanādivasena
analyzed: ca jāta pathavī iti sambandhaḥ ettha pana uddhana pacana kumbhakāra āvāpa bhājana pacana ādi vasena

original: tathā tathā adaḍḍhā. Ayaṃ pana visuṃ natthi, suddhapaṃsuādīsu aññatarāva veditabbā.
analyzed: tathā tathā adaḍḍhā ayam pana visum natthi suddha paṃsu ādīsu aññatarā ava veditabbā

original: Suddhapaṃsu suddhamattikā yebhuyyenapaṃsu yebhuyyenamattikā atirekacātumāsādhikovaṭṭhamattikāpaṃsupuñjā
analyzed: suddha paṃsu suddha mattikā yebhuyyena paṃsu yebhuyyena mattikā atireka cātumāsa adhika uvaṭṭha mattikā paṃsu puñjā

original: ca adaḍḍhā cāti ayaṃ sabbāpi jātapathavīti veditabbā.
analyzed: ca a daḍḍhā ca ati ayam sabbā api jāta pathavī iti veditabbā

original: 243. Dutiyāti ajātapathavīti attho. Vuttarāsīti mattikarāsi ca paṃsurāsi ca cātumāsomavaṭṭhako ajātapathavīti attho.
analyzed: dutiyā ati ajāta pathavī iti attho vuttarā asi iti mattikarā asi ca paṃsurā asi ca cātumāsomavaṭṭhako ajāta pathavī iti attho

original: 244. Idāni yebhuyyenamattikā yebhuyyenapaṃsukā yebhuyyenasakkharāti evaṃ vuttāsu
analyzed: idāni yebhuyyena mattikā yebhuyyena paṃsukā yebhuyyena sakkharā ti evam vuttāsu

original: kittāvatā yebhuyyatā hotīti taṃ dassetuṃ “dve bhāgā”tiādimāha. Tattha tīsu bhāgesu
analyzed: kittāvatā yebhuyyatā hoti iti tam dassetum dve bhāgā ti ādim āha tattha tīsu bhāgesu

original: dve bhāgā mattikā yassā bhūmiyā, esā yebhuyyamattikāti sambandho. Upaḍḍhapaṃsuādayopi
analyzed: dve bhāgāḥ mattikā yassā bhūmiyā esā yebhuyya mattikā iti sambandhaḥ upaḍḍha paṃsu ādayaḥ api

original: kappiyā eva akappiyabhāgassa anatirekato. “Yebhuyyenamattikā yebhuyyenapaṃsukā”ti
analyzed: kappiyāḥ eva a kappiya bhāgassa anatirekataḥ yebhuyyena mattikā yebhuyyena paṃsukā ati

original: hi vuttaṃ, na “upaḍḍhamattikā, upaḍḍhapaṃsukā”ti. Sesesupīti yebhuyyapaṃsukādīsupi.
analyzed: hi vuttam na upaḍḍha mattikā upaḍḍha paṃsukā ati sesesu pi iti yebhuyya paṃsuka ādīsu pi

original: 245. Jātasaññissa pācittīti sambandho. Dveḷhassa vimatissa dukkaṭaṃ. Jāte ajātasaññissa anāpatti.
analyzed: jāta saññissa pācitti iti sambandhaḥ dveḷhassa vimatissa dukkaṭam jāte ajāta saññissa anāpatti

original: 246. Ekāyāṇattiyā ekāti sace sakiṃ āṇatto divasampi khaṇati, āṇāpakassa ekā evāti attho. Vācasoti vācāya vācāyāti attho.
analyzed: ekāya āṇattiyā ekā ati sace sakim āṇattaḥ divasam pi khaṇati āṇāpakassa ekā eva ati atthaḥ vācasaḥ iti vācāya vācāya ati atthaḥ

original: 247. Ettha “jālehi aggi”nti vā vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Aniyametvā pana “pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇa, pathaviṃ khaṇa, vāpiṃ khaṇa, āvāṭaṃ khaṇa, kandaṃ khaṇā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: ettha jālehi aggin ti vā vattum na vaṭṭati aniyametvā pana pokkharaṇim khaṇa pathavim khaṇa vāpim khaṇa āvāṭam khaṇa kandam khaṇa ati vattum vaṭṭati

original: 248. Edisanti ettha aññampi evarūpaṃ kappiyavohāravacanaṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: edisam ti ettha aññam pi evarūpam kappiya vohāra vacanam vaṭṭati iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 249. Kopetuṃ labbhanti sambandho, ghaṭādīhi gahetuṃ sakkuṇeyyakaṃ ussiñcanīyakaddamaṃ.
analyzed: kopetum labbhanti sambandhaḥ ghaṭa ādīhi gahetum sakkuṇeyyakam ussiñcanīya kaddamam

original: 251-2. Udakasantike patiteti sambandho. Udake patitaṃ pana sabbakālaṃ kappiyameva,
analyzed: udaka santike patita iti sambandhaḥ udake patitam pana sabbakālam kappiyam eva

original: tasmā akappiyaṃ dassetuṃ “udakasantike”ti vuttaṃ. Pāsāṇe lagge raje ca navasoṇḍiyā
analyzed: tasmai akappiyam dassetum udaka santikā iti vuttam pāsāṇe lagge raje ca nava soṇḍiyā

original: patite raje cāti sambandho. Abbhokāsuṭṭhite vammike ca mattikākuṭṭe cāti attho, tathā
analyzed: patite raje ca ati sambandhaḥ vammike ca mattikā kuṭṭe ca ati attho tathā

original: etepi sabbe cātumāsādhikovaṭṭhā na kopetabbāti attho.
analyzed: ete api sabbe na kopetabbā iti attho

original: 253-5. Bhūmiṃ vikopayaṃ thambhādiṃ gaṇhituṃ na ca kappatīti sambandho. Dhārāyāti passāvadhārāya. Padaṃ dassessāmīti sambandho.
analyzed: bhūmim vikopayam thambha ādim gaṇhitum na ca kappati iti sambandhaḥ dhārāya ati passa avadhārāya padam dassessāmi iti sambandhaḥ

original: 257. Sekoti siñcanaṃ. Bhūmiyā allahatthaṃ ṭhapetvāti sambandho.
analyzed: seka uti siñcanam bhūmiyāḥ allahattham ṭhapetvā iti sambandhaḥ

original: 258. Avase satīti hatthadāhādīsu āpadāsūti attho. Pathavīvinicchayo.
analyzed: avase sati iti hattha dāha ādīsu āpadāsu iti attho pathavī vinicchayo

original: Pathavīniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pathavī niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 35. Parikkhāraniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: parikkhāra niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 259-260. Girikūṭanti makaradantakaṃ. Sibbituñca chindituñca na vaṭṭatīti sabbattha yojanā. Daṇḍeti chattadaṇḍe.
analyzed: makara dantakam sibbitum ca chinditum ca na vaṭṭati iti sabbattha yojanā daṇḍe iti chatta daṇḍe

original: 261. Sibbituṃ vā pañjaraṃ vinandhituṃ vā thiratthaṃ chatte bandhituṃ daṇḍe lekhā
analyzed: sibbitum vā pañjaram vinandhitum vā thirattham chatte bandhitum daṇḍe lekhā

original: vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Sace vuttappakāraṃ akappiyachattaṃ labhati, ghaṭakampi vāḷarūpampi
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ sace vutta ppakāram akappiya chattam labhati ghaṭakam pi vāḷa rūpam pi

original: chinditvā dhāretabbaṃ, lekhāpi ghaṃsetvā apanetabbā, suttakena vā daṇḍo veṭhetabbo.
analyzed: chinditvā dhāretabbam lekhā api ghaṃsetvā apanetabbā suttakena vā daṇḍaḥ veṭhetabbaḥ

original: 262. Anuvātaṃ sandhāya “ante vā”ti vuttaṃ. Dvinnaṃ paṭṭānaṃ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: anuvātam sandhāya ante vā iti vuttam dvinnam paṭṭānam saṅghaṭita ṭṭhānam sandhāya

original: “paṭṭamukhe vāpī”ti vuttaṃ. Varakasīsākārena sibbanaṃ sandhāya “veṇikā”ti ca satapadākārena
analyzed: paṭṭa mukhe vāpī iti vuttam varaka sīsa ākārena sibbanam sandhāya veṇikā ati ca sata pada ākārena

original: sibbanaṃ sandhāya “saṅkhalikāpi vā”ti ca vuttaṃ. Satapadisadisaṃ aññaṃ vā sūcivikāraṃ
analyzed: sibbanam sandhāya saṅkhalikā api vā ti ca vuttam aññam vā sūci vikāram

original: na kappati, pakatisūcikammameva vaṭṭatīti attho. Pāḷikaṇṇikaādikaṃ cīvare na ca kappatīti sambandho.
analyzed: na kappati pakati sūci kammam eva vaṭṭati iti attho pāḷikaṇṇika ādikam cīvare na ca kappati iti sambandho

original: 263-4. Catukoṇāva kappareti sambandho. Agghikanti agghiyaṃ cetiyasadisaṃ. Etthāti
analyzed: kapparā iti sambandhaḥ agghikam ti agghiyam cetiya sadisam ettha iti

original: gaṇṭhipāsakapaṭṭe. Koṇasuttā ca pīḷakāti na kevalaṃ catukoṇā gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭāva
analyzed: gaṇṭhi pāsaka paṭṭe koṇa suttā ca pīḷakā ati na kevalam catu koṇāḥ gaṇṭhi kapāsaka paṭṭāḥ ava

original: kappanti, atha kho duviññeyyā koṇasuttapīḷakā ca kappareti attho. Gandhaṃ telaṃ vāti
analyzed: kappanti atha kho du viññeyyā koṇa sutta pīḷakā ca kapparā iti attho gandham telam vāti

original: gandhaṃ vā telaṃ vā.
analyzed: gandham vā telam vā

original: 265. Rattanti rajitaṃ. Aññena vāti muggarādinā vā. Katvāti ṭhapetvā. Pahāre na ca muṭṭhināti muṭṭhinā na pahāreyyāti attho.
analyzed: rattam ti rajitam aññena vā āti muggara ādinā vā katvā iti ṭhapetvā pahāre na ca muṭṭhinā ati muṭṭhinā na pahāreyya ati attho

original: 266-7. Chattavaṭṭiyaṃ lekhaṃ ṭhapetvā dhammakaraṇe lekhā na vaṭṭatīti sambandho.
analyzed: chatta vaṭṭiyam lekham ṭhapetvā dhamma karaṇe lekhā na vaṭṭati iti sambandho

original: Kuñcikāya ca pipphale ca maṇikā ca pīḷakā ca na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Tattha maṇikāti
analyzed: kuñcikāya ca pipphale ca maṇikā ca pīḷakā ca na vaṭṭati iti sambandho tattha maṇikā ati

original: ekā eva vaṭṭamaṇikā. Pīḷakā muttarājisadisā bahū.
analyzed: ekā eva vaṭṭa maṇikā pīḍakā mutta rāji sadisā

original: 268-9. Mālādyaraṇiyanti araṇiyaṃ mālādi vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Evaṃ
analyzed: mālā ādi araṇiyanti araṇiyam mālā ādi vaṇṇam aṭṭham na vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ evam

original: sabbattha. Tipusīsamaye pattamaṇḍale bhittikammañca na vaṭṭatīti attho. Hitvāti ṭhapetvā.
analyzed: sabbattha tipu sīsa maye patta maṇḍale bhitti kamman ca na vaṭṭati iti atthaḥ hitvā ti ṭhapetvā

original: Sūcisaṇḍāsako nāma sūciṃ ḍaṃsāpetvā ghaṃsituṃ kato dārumayo. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
analyzed: sūcisaṇḍāsakaḥ nāma sūcim ḍaṃsāpetvā ghaṃsitum kataḥ dāru mayaḥ anujānāmi bhikkhave

original: makaradantakaṃ chinditu”nti vuttattā pattamaṇḍale makaradantakaṃ vaṭṭati, aññaṃ bhittikammādivikārameva
analyzed: makara dantakam chinditun ti vutta ttā patta maṇḍale makara dantakam vaṭṭati aññam bhitti kamma ādi vikāram eva

analyzed: na vaṭṭati tasmai giri kūṭam patta maṇḍale ṭhapetvā avasese na vaṭṭati iti veditabbam

original: 272. Senāsaneti pāsādādisenāsaneti attho.
analyzed: senāsana iti pāsāda ādi senāsana iti attho

original: 273. Pumitthirūparahitanti purisarūpaitthirūparahitanti attho. Parikkhāravinicchayo.
analyzed: pum itthi rūpa rahitanti purisa rūpa aitthi rūpa rahitanti attho parikkhāra vinicchayo

original: Parikkhāraniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: parikkhāra niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 36. Bhesajjaniddesavaṇṇanā
274-5. Sahadhamminaṃ labbhaṃ bhesajjakaraṇanti sambandho. Na kevalaṃ pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃyeva
analyzed: sahadhamminam labbham bhesajja karaṇam ti sambandhaḥ na kevalam pañcannam sahadhammikānam yeva

original: bhikkhācariyaviññattisakehi bhesajjakaraṇaṃ labbhati, atha kho aparesampi pañcannaṃ

original: labbhati, te dassento “pitūna”ntiādimāha. Pitūnanti mātāpitūnanti attho. Ye mātāpitaro
analyzed: labbhati te dassentaḥ pitūnanti ādim āha pitūnanti mātā pitūnanti atthaḥ ye mātā pitaraḥ

original: jagganti upaṭṭhahanti, te tadupaṭṭhākā nāma. Bhikkhuṃ eva nissāya jīvanto bhikkhunissitako
analyzed: jagganti upaṭṭhahanti te tadupaṭṭhākāḥ nāma bhikkhum eva nissāya jīvantaḥ bhikkhunissitakaḥ

original: nāma. Pabbajjāpekkho “bhaṇḍū”ti vuccati.
analyzed: nāma pabbajja apekkho vuccati

original: 276. Aparesampi dasannaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, te dassetuṃ “mahācūḷapitā”tiādimāha. Ettha
analyzed: aparesam pi kātum vaṭṭati te dassetum mahācūḷa pitā ati ādim āha ettha

original: pana mahāpitā cūḷapitā mahāmātā cūḷamātā mahābhātā cūḷabhātā mahābhaginī cūḷabhaginīti
analyzed: pana mahā pitā cūḷa pitā mahā mātā cūḷa mātā mahā bhātā cūḷa bhātā mahā bhaginī cūḍa bhaginī iti

original: imehi aṭṭhahi ādi-saddena pitubhaginiñca mātubhātikañca gahetvā dasa. Etesaṃ pana
analyzed: imehi aṭṭhahi ādi saddena pitu bhaginiñca mātu bhātikañca gahetvā dasa etesam pana

original: sakena bhesajjena kātabbaṃ. Attaniye ca asatīti pāṭhaseso.
analyzed: sakena bhesajjena kātabbam attaniye ca asati iti pāṭha sesaḥ

original: 277. Na kevalañca etesaṃ dasannaṃ, imehi sambandhānaṃ puttanattādīnaṃ yāvasattamā
analyzed: na kevalam ca etesam dasannam imehi sambandhānam putta natta ādīnam

original: kulaparivaṭṭā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “kuladūsanā”tiādimāha. Aññopi yo āgantuko
analyzed: kula parivaṭṭā kātum vaṭṭati iti dassana ttham kula dūsanā ti ādim āha aññaḥ api yaḥ āgantukaḥ

original: vā coro vā yuddhaparājito vā issaro ñātakehi pariccatto vā gamiyamanusso vā gilāno
analyzed: vā coraḥ vā yuddha parājitaḥ vā issaraḥ ñātakehi pariccattaḥ vā gamiya manussaḥ vā gilānaḥ

original: hutvā vihāraṃ pavisati, sabbesampi apaccāsīsantena bhesajjaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: hutvā vihāram pavisati sabbesam pi a paccāsīsantena bhesajjam kātabbam

original: 278. Mātā pitā tadupaṭṭhāko bhikkhunissitako paṇḍupalāso veyyāvaccakaroti imesaṃ

original: tatiyapañcamesu pañcakesu nissaggiyaparikappāvahāravasena yojetabbaṃ.

original: Tattha sāhatthika-saddena upacārato taṃsahacaritapañcakaṃ gahetvā “sāhatthikañca

original: Lohitaṃ jayasumanapupphavaṇṇaṃ. Kaṇhakaṃ addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇaṃ. Sabba-saddo panettha paccekaṃ yojetabbo.

original: aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbitvā katā phalasadisā dasā “phalā”ti vuccanti, ketakādi pupphasadisāni
analyzed: aññam aññam saṃsibbitvā katā phala sadisā dasā phalā ti vuccanti ketaka ādi puppha sadisāni

original: “pupphānī”ti ca, phalā ca pupphā ca dasā yassa, phalasadise dase, pupphasadise dase

original: cāti attho. Veṭhaneti sīsaveṭhane. Tathāti iminā sabbanīlakādīsu dukkaṭaṃ atidisati.
analyzed: ca ati atthaḥ veṭhane iti sīsa veṭhane tathā iti iminā sabba nīlaka ādīsu dukkaṭam atidisati

analyzed: sabbanti kusa cīra ādikam sakalam acchinnam cīvaram yassa saḥ labhati iti sambandho

original: Cīvaraniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: 4. Rajananiddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: rajana niddesa vaṇṇanā

analyzed: etehi iti rajanāni mūla ādīni anujānāmi bhikkhave cha rajanāni mūla raja nanti ādinā

analyzed: bhagavatā anuññāta ttā vuttam rajanā cha pakārāni anuññātāni satthunā ati

original: 59. Mūleti mūlarajane haliddiṃ vivajjiya sabbaṃ labbhanti sambandho. Evaṃ sabbattha.

original: saṅgahito. Setaṃ tipu, kaṇhaṃ sīsaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgahitaḥ setam kaṇham sīsam

original: 70. Chavasīsamayoti chavassa matamanussassa sīsaṃ sīsakapālaṃ, tena nibbatto chavasīsamayo.
analyzed: chava sīsa mayaḥ ti chavassa mata manussassa sīsam sīsa kapālam tena nibbattaḥ chava sīsa mayaḥ

original: Ghaṭi ca tumbañca, tesaṃ kaṭāho, tehi jātāti ghaṭitumbakaṭāhajā. Tattha ghaṭīti ghaṭoyeva.
analyzed: ghaṭi ca tumbam ca tesam kaṭāhaḥ tehi jātā ati ghaṭi tumba kaṭāha jā tattha ghaṭī iti ghaṭaḥ yā iva

original: Tumbaṃ alābu. Iti ime sabbe pattā akappiyā vuttā, dukkaṭavatthukā ca vuttāti yojanā.
analyzed: tumbam alābu iti ime sabbe pattāḥ akappiyāḥ vuttāḥ dukkaṭa vatthukā ca vuttā iti yojanā

original: Tattha rūpiyādīsu catūsu sace gihī bhattaggesu suvaṇṇataṭṭakādīsu byañjanaṃ katvā
analyzed: tattha rūpiya ādīsu catūsu sace gihī bhattaggesu suvaṇṇa taṭṭaka ādīsu byañjanam katvā

original: upanāmenti, āmasituṃ na vaṭṭati. Kaṃsakācaphalikajāni pana taṭṭakādīni bhājanāni
analyzed: upanāmenti āmasitum na vaṭṭati kaṃsa kāca phalika jāni pana taṭṭaka ādīni bhājanāni

original: puggalikaparibhogeneva na vaṭṭanti, saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti.
analyzed: puggalika paribhogena iva na vaṭṭanti saṅghika paribhogena vā gihi vikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti

original: Ghaṭitumbakaṭāhajā pana labhitvā pariharituṃ na vaṭṭanti, tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭanti.
analyzed: ghaṭi tumba kaṭāha jāḥ pana labhitvā pariharitum na vaṭṭanti tāvakālikam paribhuñjitum vaṭṭanti

original: Pattaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: patta niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 6. Thālakaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: thālaka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 71-2. Dāru …pe… veḷuriyāmayā akappiyā, phalikākācakaṃsajā thālakā gihisantakā saṅghikā
analyzed: dāru veḷuriyāmayā akappiyā phalikā kāca kaṃsajā thālakā gihisantakā saṅghikā

original: ca kappiyā, tumbaghaṭijā tāvakālikā kappiyāti sambandho. Kappanti parikappanti avirodhibhāvenevāti
analyzed: ca kappiyā tumba ghaṭi jā tāvakālikā kappiyā ati sambandho kappanti parikappanti avirodhi bhāvena iva ati

original: kappā, tathā kappiyā. Na kappā akappā. Saṅghassa ime saṅghikā. Tāva-saddo avadhimhi.
analyzed: kappā tathā kappiyā na kappā akappā saṅghassa ime saṅghikā tāva saddaḥ avadhimhi

original: Tāva bhojanāvadhibhūto kālo etāsanti tāvakālikā, bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetabbā, na pariharitabbāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: tāva bhojana avadhi bhūtaḥ kālaḥ etāsanti tāvakālikāḥ bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetabbā na pariharitabbā ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Thālakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: thālaka niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 7. Pavāraṇāniddesavaṇṇanā
73. Yena iriyāpathena upalakkhito pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhojanaṃ bhuñjamāno
analyzed: yena iriyāpathena upalakkhito pañcannam bhojanānam yam kiñci bhojanam bhuñjamāno

original: ayaṃ bhikkhu kappiyānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ hatthapāsopanītānaṃ pavārito, tato iriyāpathato

original: aññena iriyāpathena anatirittakaṃ yāvakālikaṃ bhuñjeyya ce, imassa pācitti hotīti
analyzed: aññena iriyāpathena anatirittakam yāvakālikam bhuñjeyya ce imassa pācitti hoti iti

original: padatthayojanā. Bhuñjanatthāya paṭiggahaṇe pana dukkaṭaṃ. Tattha iriyāya kāyikakiriyāya
analyzed: padattha yojanā bhuñjana tthāya paṭiggahaṇe pana dukkaṭam tattha iriyāya kāyika kiriyāya

original: patho pavattanūpāyo iriyāpatho, ṭhānagamananisajjanasayanāni. Pavāreti paṭikkhipatīti
analyzed: patho pavattanūpāyaḥ iriyāpathaḥ ṭhāna gamana nisajjana sayanāni pavāreti paṭikkhipati iti

original: pavārito, atha vā pavāraṇaṃ paṭikkhipanaṃ pavāritaṃ, tamassa atthīti pavārito, katappavāraṇo

original: katappaṭikkhepoti attho, atha vā parivesakena vārīyatīti pavārito paṭikkhepito. Anatirittakanti
analyzed: kata paṭikkhepaḥ ti attho atha vā parivesakena vārīyati iti pavāritaḥ paṭikkhepitaḥ anatirittakam ti

original: yaṃ pavāretvā āsanā vuṭṭhahantassa “alametaṃ sabba”nti evaṃ atirittakaraṇādīhi sattahi
analyzed: yam pavāretvā āsanā vuṭṭhahantassa alam etam sabban ti evam atiritta karaṇa ādīhi sattahi

original: vinayakammākārehi kappiyaṃ kataṃ, tañca “ajja vā yadā vā icchati, tadā khādissatī”ti
analyzed: vinaya kamma ākārehi kappiyam katam tat ca ajja vā yadā vā icchati tadā khādissati iti

original: āhaṭaṃ, gilānātirittañca atirittaṃ adhikanti vuccati, tato aññaṃ anatirittakaṃ anadhikanti

original: attho. Kusalaṃ cittaṃ pātetīti pācitti, tasmā itthiyaṃ timhi ta-kārassa ca-kāre,
analyzed: attho kusalam cittam pāteti iti pācitti tasmai itthiyam timhi takārassa cakāre

original: dvitte ca pācitti. Yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhato

original: āpatti dukkaṭassa, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: āpatti dukkaṭassa ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: 74. Idāni yāya pavāritā, sā pañcaṅgasampannāyeva pavāraṇā nāma hotīti dassetuṃ “asana”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni yāya pavāritā sā pañcaṅga sampannāya iva pavāraṇā nāma hoti iti dassetum asananti ādim āha

original: Tattha asananti bhuñjamānassa bhuñjanaṃ. Iminā yaṃ vippakataṃ bhojanaṃ, taṃ dasseti.
analyzed: tattha bhuñjamānassa bhuñjanam iminā yam vippakatam bhojanam tam dasseti

original: Bhojanañcevāti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ bhojanañceva hotīti. Abhihāroti dāyakassa kāyena
analyzed: bhojanam ca iva ati pavāraṇa pahonakam bhojanam ca iva hoti iti abhihāro ti dāyakassa kāyena

original: pavāraṇappahonakassa abhiharaṇaṃ, na vācāya. Samīpatāti aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇasaṅkhātā

original: samīpatā ca. Ettha pana sace bhikkhu nisinno hoti, āsanassa pacchimantato paṭṭhāya,
analyzed: samīpa tā ca ettha pana sace bhikkhu nisinnaḥ hoti āsanassa pacchimantataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: sace ṭhito, paṇhiantato paṭṭhāya, sace nipanno, yena passena nipanno, tassa pārimantato

original: paṭṭhāya dāyakassa ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā nipannassa vā ṭhapetvā pasāritahatthaṃ
analyzed: paṭṭhāya dāyakassa ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā nipannassa vā ṭhapetvā pasārita hattham

original: yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ, tassa orimantena paricchinditvā aḍḍhateyyahatthapāso veditabbo.
analyzed: yam āsannataram aṅgam tassa orimantena paricchinditvā aḍḍhateyya hattha pāsaḥ veditabbo

original: Kāyavācāpaṭikkhepoti tassa abhihaṭabhojanassa aṅgulicalanādikāyavikārena vā “ala”ntiādinā

original: pañcaaṅgāti sambandho. Pañca aṅgāni yassā sā pañcaaṅgā.

original: 75. Idāni etesu odanādipañcavidhaṃ bhojanaṃ dassetvā tāni ca puna vibhajitvā dassetuṃ
analyzed: idāni etesu odana ādi pañcavidham bhojanam dassetvā tāni ca puna vibhajitvā dassetum

original: “odano”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha sālīti rattasāliādikā sabbāpi sālijāti. Vīhīti sabbāpi
analyzed: odanaḥ tiādi āraddham tattha sālī iti ratta sāli ādikā sabbā api sāli jāti vīhī iti sabbā api

original: vīhināmikā vīhijāti. Kaṅgūti setarattakāḷabhedā sabbāpi kaṅgujāti. Kudrūso nāma kāḷakodravo.
analyzed: vīhi nāmikā vīhi jāti kaṅgu iti seta ratta kāḷa bhedā sabbā api kaṅgu jāti kudrūsaḥ nāma kāḷa kodravaḥ

original: Varako nāma setavaṇṇo kodravo. Yavagodhumesu pana bhedo natthi. Evaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ
analyzed: varakaḥ nāma seta vaṇṇaḥ kodravaḥ yava godhumesu pana bhedaḥ natthi evam yathāvuttānam

original: sānulomānaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ bhojjayāgu cāti sambandho. Bhojjayāgu cāti uṇhaṃ

original: cāti kappiyoyeva maṃso “maṃso”ti vuttoti yojanā. Cāti avadhāraṇe. Akappiyo pana paṭikkhipitabbova.

original: Paṭikkhittopi na pavāreti. Udake sambhavo yassa so maccho nāma. Dvīsu panetesu sace

original: honti, mukhe sāsapamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ natthi, sacepi aññaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti.

original: 78. Idāni “kīdisaṃ bhuñjanto kinti vatvā upanītaṃ kiṃ nāma nisedhento pavāreti nāmā”ti

original: codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha “bhuñjanto”tiādi. Tattha kappaṃ vā akappaṃ vā pañcasu bhojanesu

original: yaṃ kiñci bhojanaṃ bhuñjanto bhikkhu tannāmena tesaṃ pavāraṇājanakabhojanānaṃ nāmena

original: ce akappiyamaṃsañca kuladūsanavejjakammauttarimanussadhammārocanasāditarūpiyādīhi

original: nibbattaṃ akappiyabhojanañca tathā aññañca kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā ekasitthamattampi
analyzed: nibbattam akappiya bhojanam ca tathā aññañca kappiyam vā akappiyam vā eka sittha mattam pi

original: ajjhohaṭaṃ hoti, so sace pattamukhahatthesu yattha katthaci bhojane sati sāpekkhova
analyzed: ajjhohaṭam hoti saḥ sace patta mukha hatthesu yattha katthaci bhojane sati sa apekkhaḥ uva

original: aññaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena “odanaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādinā pavāraṇappahonakasseva nāmena vā
analyzed: aññam hattha pāse ṭhitena odanam gaṇhatha atiādinā pavāraṇa pahonakassa iva nāmena vā

original: “ima”nti sāmaññavaseneva vā kāyeneva abhihaṭaṃ vuttalakkhaṇaṃ kappiyameva bhojanaṃ
analyzed: imanti sāmañña vasena iva vā kāyena iva abhihaṭam vutta lakkhaṇam kappiyam eva bhojanam

original: kevalaṃ vā missaṃ vā kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipati pavāretīti. “Ākira ākira, koṭṭetvā
analyzed: kevalam vā missam vā kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipati pavāreti iti ākira ākira koṭṭetvā

original: koṭṭetvā pūrehī”ti pana vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: koṭṭetvā pūrehi iti pana vattum vaṭṭati

original: 79-80. Idāni ye pavāraṇaṃ na janenti, te dassetuṃ “lājā”tiādimāha. Tattha lājā…pe…

original: tehi lājehi katā sattu ceva bhattāni ca. Gorasoti gunnaṃ raso khīrādi. Suddhakhajjakoti

original: pana sattumodakasaṅkhāto pavāreti. Taṇḍulāti samapākabhajjitānaṃ sāliādīnaṃ taṇḍulā,

original: bhajjitataṇḍulā eva vā. Bhaṭṭhapiṭṭhanti suddhaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhajjitaṃ piṭṭhaṃ. Puthukāti
analyzed: bhajjita taṇḍulāḥ eva vā suddham yam kiñci bhajjitam piṭṭham

original: sāliādīnaṃ puthukā. Puthukā hi tantiāgamayuttiyā visumpi gayhati, ekatopi, tasmā
analyzed: sāli ādīnam puthukā puthukā hi tanti āgama yuttiyā gayhati ekatas api tasmā

original: vuttāvasesānaṃ puthukāveḷuādīnaṃ bhattanti ca sambandho. Veḷūti tesaṃ taṇḍulā vuccanti.

original: nava mahāphalāni, sabbañca aparaṇṇaṃ sattadhaññāni anulomentīti saha anulomehīti
analyzed: nava mahāphalāni sabbañca aparaṇṇam satta dhaññāni anulomenti iti saha anulomehi iti

original: viññāyanti. Phalasutiyā “sesaphalajo”ti vattabbe gamyamānattā na vuttaṃ. Madhukapupphamaññatrāti
analyzed: viññāyanti phala sutiyā sesa phala jaḥ ti vattabbe gamyamāna ttā na vuttam madhuka puppham aññatra ati

original: Sītamudakaṃ sītodaṃ, khīrode viya sītode madditoti tappuriso. Ādicca-saddo ātape
analyzed: sītam udakam sītodam khīrode viya sītode madditaḥ iti tappurisaḥ ādicca saddaḥ ātape

original: vattati upacāratoti ādicce pāko yassāti samāso.
analyzed: vattati upacārataḥ ti ādicce pākaḥ yassa iti samāsaḥ

analyzed: sattāhakālikam dasseti sappi itiādinā tattha sattāhakālikā ti yathā vuttāni sappi ādīni

analyzed: idāni sappi ādīni vibhajati sappi iti ādinā tattha yesam go mahiṃ

original: sādīnaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati, tesaṃ sappi sappi nāmāti “sappī”tiādinā sappilakkhaṇamāha.

original: Akappiyamaṃsasappinopi kappiyasambhave tattha sattāhātikkame dukkaṭassa vakkhamānattā
analyzed: akappiya maṃsa sappino pi kappiya sambhave tattha satta aha atikkame dukkaṭassa vakkhamāna ttā

original: nissaggiyavatthumeva cettha dassetuṃ “yesaṃ maṃsamavārita”nti vuttaṃ. Khīrādīsu hi

original: tesamakappiyaṃ nāma natthi. Navanītassa sappisadisatāya navanītalakkhaṇaṃ visuṃ na

original: vuttaṃ. Upari sappipiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā sītalapāyāsaṃ denti, yaṃ pāyāsena asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ,

analyzed: tesu navanītam nāma nava uddhaṭam tena katam pana sappi

original: 90. Tilā ca vasā ca eraṇḍāni ca madhukāni ca sāsapā cāti dvando. Tehi sambhavo yassāti
analyzed: tilā ca vasā ca eraṇḍāni ca madhukāni ca sāsapā ca ati dvandaḥ tehi sambhavaḥ yassa ati

original: bāhirattho, taṃ telaṃ nāmāti attho. Khuddā khuddamadhumakkhikā ca bhamarā ca khuddabhamaraṃ,

original: khuddajantukattā napuṃsakekavacanaṃ. Madhuṃ karontīti madhukariyo, tā eva makkhikā
analyzed: napuṃsaka ikavacanam madhum karonti iti madhukariyaḥ tāḥ eva makkhikā

original: madhukarimakkhikā, khuddabhamarameva madhukarimakkhikāti kammadhārayo. Tāhi kataṃ
analyzed: madhukari makkhikā madhukari makkhikā iti kammadhārayaḥ tāhi katam

original: madhu madhu nāmāti attho. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana visuṃ madhukarī-saddaṃ vikappetvā “daṇḍakesu
analyzed: madhu madhu nāma ati attho ṭīkā ayam pana visum madhukarī saddam vikappetvā daṇḍakesu

original: madhukarā madhukarimakkhikā nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Madhupaṭalaṃ vā madhusitthakaṃ vā sace
analyzed: madhukarā madhukarimakkhikā nāma ati vuttam madhu paṭalam vā madhusitthakam vā sace

original: madhunā makkhitaṃ, madhugatikameva. Tumbalakānaṃ cīrikānañca niyyāsasadisaṃ madhu
analyzed: madhunā makkhitam madhu gatikam eva tumbalakānam cīrikānam ca niyyāsa sadisam madhu

original: pana yāvajīvikaṃ. Raso nikkasaṭo ādi yassā sā rasādi. Ādi-saddena phāṇitādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ,

original: sā ucchuvikati. Pakkāti avatthukapakkā vā, phāṇitaṃ phāṇitaṃ nāmāti attho. Sītūdakena
analyzed: sā ucchuvikā ati pakkā ati avatthuka pakkā vā phāṇitam phāṇitam nāma ati sītu udakena

original: katamadhukapupphaphāṇitaṃ pana phāṇitagatikameva. Ambaphāṇitādīni yāvakālikāni. Etāni
analyzed: kata madhuka puppha phāṇitam pana phāṇita gatikam eva amba phāṇita ādīni yāva kālikāni etāni

original: yathāvuttāni sappiādīni purebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogenāpi, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya

analyzed: pana tāni ca pacchābhattam paṭiggahitāni ca sattāham nidahitvā nirāmisa paribhogena paribhuñjitabbāni

original: 91. Idāni odissa anuññātavasāya pākato vibhāgaṃ dassetvā tato sappiādīnaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: idāni odissa anuññāta vasāya pākataḥ vibhāgam dassetvā tatas sappi ādīnam dassetum

original: “savatthū”tiādimāha. Tattha purebhattaṃ sāmaṃ vā attanā eva. Vā-saddena parehi vā.
analyzed: savatthu iti ādim āha tattha purebhattam sāmam vā attanā eva vāsaddena parehi vā

original: Amānusā manussavasārahitā. Vasā acchādīnaṃ akappiyānaṃ, sūkarādīnaṃ kappiyānañca
analyzed: amānusā manussa vasā rahitā vasā accha ādīnam a kappiyānam sūkara ādīnam kappiyānam ca

original: telaṃ parissāvitaṃ sattāhāni nirāmisaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Atha parehi kataṃ

original: purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ, purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: purebhattam paṭiggahitam purebhattam sa āmisam pi vaṭṭati pacchābhattataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: nirāmisameva, no ce, dukkaṭaṃ hotīti. Kāriye kāraṇopacārena panettha “vasā”ti telameva
analyzed: nirāmisam eva no ce dukkaṭam hoti iti kāriye kāraṇa upacārena pana ittha vasāti telam eva

original: vuttaṃ, vasā pana yāvakālikāva.
analyzed: vuttam vasā pana yāva kālikā ava

original: Ṭīkāyaṃ pana vasāya “sattāhakālike āgataṭṭhānaṃ natthīti vadantī”ti vatvā “taṃ upaparikkhitabba”nti
analyzed: pana vasāya satta aha kālike āgata ṭṭhānam natthi iti vadanti iti vatvā tam upaparikkhitabbanti

original: vasāya sattāhakālikattamāsaṃkiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Kimettha upaparikkhitabbaṃ? Bhesajjaṃ anujānatā
analyzed: vasāya vuttam kim ettha upaparikkhitabbam bhesajjam anujānatā

original: bhagavatā “yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṃ
analyzed: bhagavatā yāni kho pana tāni gilānānam bhikkhūnam paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni seyyathidam

original: – sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ, tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ
analyzed: sappi navanītam telam madhu phāṇitam tāni paṭiggahetvā satta aha paramam sannidhi kārakam

original: paribhuñjitabbānī”ti sappiādīnameva sattāhakālikattaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhesajjakkhandhakepi
analyzed: paribhuñjitabbāni iti sappi ādīnam eva satta aha kālika ttam vuttam bhesajja kkhandhake pi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjitu”nti

original: tāni pañceva “bhesajjānī”ti vatvā telaṃ niyamato “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vasāni bhesajjāni
analyzed: tāni pañca iva bhesajjāni iti vatvā telam niyamataḥ anujānāmi bhikkhave vasāni bhesajjāni

original: acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasaṃ kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle
analyzed: acchavasam macchavasam susukāvasam sūkara vasam gadrabha vasam kāle paṭiggahitam kāle

original: nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti vuttaṃ. Bhesajjasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyañca
analyzed: nippakkam kāle saṃsaṭṭham tela paribhogena paribhuñjitun ti vuttam bhesajja sikkhāpada ṭṭhakathāyañca

original: “aññesaṃ yāvakālikavatthūnaṃ vatthuṃ pacituṃ na vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vadatā aṭṭhakathācariyena
analyzed: aññesam yāvakālika vatthūnam vatthum pacitum na vaṭṭatiyā iva ati vadatā aṭṭhakathā cariyena

original: ayamettha attho dīpitoti vasā “yāvakālikāyevā”ti viññāyatīti ko ettha sukhumo nayoti.
analyzed: ayam ettha atthaḥ dīpitaḥ iti vasā yāvakālikāya iva ati viññāyati iti kaḥ ettha sukhumaḥ nayoti

original: Aññesaṃ vasātelato paresaṃ yāvakālikavatthūnaṃ yesaṃ tesaṃ yāvakālikavatthūnaṃ sappiādīnaṃ
analyzed: aññesam vasā telato paresam yāva kālika vatthūnam yesam tesam yāva kālika vatthūnam sappi ādīnam

original: na vaṭṭati. Tāni hi yadi taṃ paṭiggahetvā sayaṃ katāni, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya na

analyzed: vaṭṭanti attanā a pakkattāḥ yāvajīvikāni tu sāsapa madhuka eraṇḍa aṭṭhīni tela karaṇa ttham

original: na vaṭṭati, saṃsaggato yāvakālikampi sāmaṃpakkaṃ siyāti nirāmisaṃ pana sattāhampi vaṭṭati.

original: 92. Idāni “haliddi”ntiādinā yāvajīvikaṃ dasseti. Tattha “haliddi nāma nisā”tiādinā
analyzed: idāni haliddi iti ādinā yāvajīvikam dasseti tattha haliddi nāma nisā ti ādinā

original: vuccamānepi pariyāyavacane sammoho siyāti na taṃvacanena bhusaṃ sammohayissāma, tasmā

original: tāni upadesatova veditabbāni. Tattha “haliddi”nti binduāgamena vuttaṃ. Upacārena
analyzed: tāni upadesataḥ va veditabbāni tattha haliddin ti bindu āgamena vuttam upacārena

original: tu mūlādīni haliddādisaddena vuttāni. Tā haliddādayo keci itthiliṅgāyeva. Mūlaphale

original: gahitāni. Ādi-saddena vajakalimūle jaraṭṭhanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
analyzed: gahitāni ādi saddena vaja kali mūle evamādīnam saṅgahaḥ

original: 93-5. Goṭṭhaphalanti madanaphalanti vadantīti. Tīṇi phalāni yassaṃ saṅgahitaṃ sā
analyzed: goṭṭha phalanti madana phalanti vadanti iti tīṇi phalāni saṅgahitam sā

original: sambandho. Ādi-saddena asokādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Sūpeyyapaṇṇanti tambakataṇḍuleyyādisūpayoggapaṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ ādi saddena asoka ādīnam gahaṇam tambaka taṇḍuleyya ādi su upayogga paṇṇam

original: Ucchuniyyāsaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbo niyyāso ca sarasaṃ ucchujaṃ tacañca ṭhapetvā sabbo taco
analyzed: ucchu niyyāsam ṭhapetvā sabbaḥ niyyāso ca sarasam ucchujam tacam ca ṭhapetvā sabbaḥ taco

original: cāti sambandho. Tattha hiṅgukaṇikāraniyyāsādi sabbo niyyāso nāma. Nirasaucchutacādi
analyzed: ca ati sambandhaḥ tattha hiṅgu kaṇikāra niyyāsa ādi sabbaḥ niyyāsaḥ nāma nirasa aucchutaca ādi

original: sabbo taco nāma. Loṇaṃ sāmuddādi. Lohaṃ ayatambādi. Silā kāḷasilādi.
analyzed: sabbo tacaḥ nāma loṇam sāmudda ādi loham ayatamba ādi silā kāḷasila ādi

original: 96. Suddhasitthanti madhunā amakkhitaṃ. Madhumakkhitaṃ pana sattāhakālikaṃ. Yañca
analyzed: suddha sittham ti madhunā a makkhitam madhu makkhitam pana satta aha kālikam yat ca

original: kiñci sujhāpitanti dujjhāpitaṃ akatvā sujjhāpitaṃ yaṃ kiñci ca. Vikaṭādippabhedanti
analyzed: kiñci sujhāpitanti dujjhāpitam a katvā sujjhāpitam yam kiñci ca

original: vikaṭaṃ gūthamattikāmuttachārikāsaṅkhātaṃ ādi yassa, so pabhedo yassāti bāhirattho,
analyzed: vikaṭam gūtha mattikā mutta chārikā saṅkhātam ādi yassa saḥ pabhedaḥ yassa ati bāhirattho

original: taṃ. Yaṃ kiñci cāti sambandho. Ettha pana ādi-saddena kandakhādanīye khīrakākolādayo,
analyzed: tam yam kiñci ca ati sambandhaḥ ettha pana ādi saddena kanda khādanīye khīra kākola ādayaḥ

original: muḷālakhādanīye haliddisiṅgiveramūlādayo, matthakakhādanīye haliddisiṅgiverakaḷīrādayo,
