original: 108. Idāni paṭiggahaṇavijahanaṃ dasseti “sikkhā”tiādinā. Tattha sikkhāmaraṇaliṅgehīti
analyzed: idāni paṭiggahaṇa vijahanam dasseti sikkhā iti ādinā tattha sikkhā maraṇa liṅgehi iti

original: sikkhāpaccakkhānena ca maraṇena ca liṅgaparivattanena ca. Anapekkhavisaggatoti natthi
analyzed: sikkhā paccakkhānena ca maraṇena ca liṅga parivattanena ca an apekkha visaggato ti natthi

original: apekkho etassāti anapekkho, sova visaggo, tato ca. Acchedāti corādīhi acchinditvā
analyzed: apekkhaḥ etassa ati anapekkhaḥ saḥ uva visaggaḥ tatas ca cora ādīhi a chinditvā

original: gahaṇena. Anupasampannadānāti anupasampannassa dānena. Ca-saddo sabbattha ānetabbo.
analyzed: gahaṇena anupasampanna dānā ati anupasampannassa dānena ca saddaḥ sabbattha ānetabbaḥ

original: Gāhoti paṭiggahaṇaṃ. Upasammatīti vijahati.
analyzed: gāho ti paṭiggahaṇam vijahati

original: 109-10. Idāni appaṭiggahitaṃ paribhoge dosaṃ dassetuṃ “appaṭiggahita”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni a paṭiggahitam paribhoge dosam dassetum a paṭiggahita nti ādim āha

original: Tattha sabbanti catukālikapariyāpannaṃ sakalampi. Idāni appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ
analyzed: tattha sabbam ti catukālika pariyāpannam sakalam pi idāni a paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitabbam

original: dassetuṃ “suddha”ntiādimāha. Tattha suddhaṃ nātibahalaṃ udakañca tathā aṅgalaggaṃ
analyzed: dassetum suddha nti ādim āha tattha suddham na ati bahalam udakam ca tathā aṅga laggam

original: avicchinnaṃ danta…pe… gūthakañca loṇa…pe… karīsakañca kappateti sambandho. Tattha
analyzed: avicchinnam danta pe gūthakam ca loṇa pe karīsakam ca kappata iti sambandho tattha

original: suddhanti rajareṇūhi aññarasena ca asammissatāya parisuddhaṃ. Nātibahalanti yaṃ kasitaṭṭhāne
analyzed: suddham ti raja reṇūhi añña rasena ca a sammissa tāya parisuddham na ati bahalanti yam kasita ṭṭhāne

original: bahalamudakaṃ viya mukhe vā hatthe vā na laggaṃ, taṃ. Avicchinnanti aṅgato vicchinditvā
analyzed: bahalam udakam viya mukhe vā hatthe vā na laggam tam a vicchinnanti aṅgataḥ vicchinditvā

original: na gataṃ. Dantāni ca akkhīni ca kaṇṇañca dantakkhikaṇṇaṃ pāṇyaṅgattā, tassa gūthakanti
analyzed: na gatam dantāni ca akkhīni ca kaṇṇam ca danta kkhi kaṇṇam pāṇi aṅga ttā tassa gūthakanti

original: tappuriso. Loṇaṃ sarīruṭṭhitaṃ. Siṅghāṇīti siṅghāṇikā. Vicchinnaṃ na paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tad purisaḥ loṇam sarīra uṭṭhitam siṅghāṇī iti siṅghāṇikā vicchinnam na paṭiggahetabbam

original: 111. Idāni “gūthā”tiādinā kālodissaṃ dasseti. Tathāvidheti sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇādike
analyzed: idāni gūtha iti ādinā kāla udissam dasseti tathāvidhā iti sa pada ṭṭhakkhaṇa ādike

original: tathāvidhe kāle. Tathā tādiso vidho kālo etassāti bahubbīhi. Seveyyāti sevanaṃ kareyya,
analyzed: tathāvidhe kāle tathā tādisaḥ vidhaḥ kālaḥ etassa ati bahu bbīhi seveyya ati sevanam kareyya

original: paribhuñjeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Asante kappakāraketi ettha dubbacopi asamatthopi kappiyakārako
analyzed: paribhuñjeyya iti vuttam hoti asante kappa kārake iti ettha dubbacaḥ api asamatthaḥ api kappiya kārako

original: asantapakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti veditabbo. Kālodissattā pana chārikāya asati alladāruṃ
analyzed: asantapakkheyā iva tiṭṭhati iti veditabbaḥ kāla udissattā pana chārikāya asati alladārum

original: rukkhato chinditvā kātuṃ, mattikāya asati bhūmiṃ khaṇitvāpi mattikaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: rukkhataḥ chinditvā kātum mattikāya asati bhūmim khaṇitvā api mattikam gahetum vaṭṭati

original: 112. Durūpaciṇṇeti duṭṭhuṃ upaciṇṇaṃ āmaṭṭhaṃ durūpaciṇṇaṃ. Sace bhikkhu appaṭiggahitaṃ
analyzed: durūpaciṇṇā iti duṭṭhum upaciṇṇam āmaṭṭham durūpaciṇṇam sace bhikkhu a paṭiggahitam

original: sāmisaṃ bhājanaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato apanetvā āmasati, pidhānaṃ āmasati, upari ṭhitakacavarādiṃ
analyzed: sa āmisam bhājanam ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ apanetvā āmasati pidhānam āmasati upari ṭhita kaca vara ādim

original: chaḍḍeti, tatthajātakaphaliniyā sākhāya vā valliyā vā gahetvā vā cāleti, durūpaciṇṇaṃ
analyzed: chaḍḍa iti tattha jātaka phaliniyā sākhāya vā valliyā vā gahetvā vā cāla iti durūpaciṇṇam

original: nāma hoti. Tasmiṃ dukkaṭanti sambandho. Phalarukkhaṃ pana apassayituṃ vā tattha kaṇṭakaṃ
analyzed: nāma hoti tasmim dukkaṭam ti sambandhaḥ phala rukkham pana a passayitum vā tattha kaṇṭakam

original: vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Araññe patitaambaphalādiṃ “sāmaṇerassa dassāmī”ti āharitvā
analyzed: vā bandhitum vaṭṭati araññe patita amba phala ādim sāmaṇerassa dassāmi iti āharitvā

original: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Rajokiṇṇeti rajasā okiṇṇe, tasmiṃ pattādike yaṃ kiñci paṭiggaṇhato
analyzed: dātum vaṭṭati rajaḥ kiṇṇa iti rajasā okiṇṇe tasmin patta ādike yam kiñci paṭiggaṇhato

original: vinayadukkaṭaṃ hotīti attho. Sace piṇḍāya carantassa patte rajaṃ patati, paṭiggahetvā
analyzed: vinaya dukkaṭam hoti iti sace piṇḍāya carantassa patte rajam patati paṭiggahetvā

original: bhikkhā gaṇhitabbā. “Paṭiggahetvā dethā”ti vuttepi ākiranti, hatthato amocenteneva
analyzed: bhikkhā gaṇhitabbā paṭiggahetvā detha ati vutte pi ākiranti hatthataḥ a mocentena iva

original: paṭiggāhāpakassa santikaṃ netvā paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Sace mahāvāto tato tato rajaṃ pāteti,
analyzed: paṭiggāhāpakassa santikam netvā paṭiggahetabbam sace mahā vātaḥ tatas tatas rajam pāta iti

original: na sakkā hoti bhikkhaṃ gahetuṃ, “anupasampannassa dassāmī”ti suddhacittena ābhogaṃ
analyzed: na sakkā hoti bhikkham gahetum an upasampannassa dassāmi iti suddha cittena ābhogaṃ

original: katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Taṃ pana tena dinnaṃ vā vissāsena vā paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: katvā gaṇhitum vaṭṭati tam pana tena dinnam vā vissāsena vā paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati

original: Athāti vakkhamānārambhe. Uggahappaṭiggaheti uggahitthāti uggaho, uggahitaṃ, tassa
analyzed: atha ati vakkhamāna ārambhe uggaha paṭiggahe iti uggahittha ati uggahaḥ uggahitam tassa

original: paṭiggaho, tasmiṃ. Appaṭiggahitabhāvaṃ jānato attanā eva uggahetvā gahaṇeti adhippāyo.
analyzed: paṭiggahaḥ tasmin a paṭiggahita bhāvam jānataḥ attanā eva uggahetvā gahaṇa iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya pana appaṭiggahetvā telādīni, chāyatthāya sākhādīni vā gahetvā
analyzed: mātā pitūnam atthāya pana a paṭiggahetvā tela ādīni chāya atthāya sākhā ādīni vā gahetvā

original: pacchato bhuñjitukāmatāya paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Ucchuādīsu phālitesu
analyzed: pacchatas bhuñjitu kāma tāya paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati ucchu ādīsu phālitesu

original: malaṃ na paññāyati, mūlabhesajjādīni pisantānaṃ vā koṭṭentānaṃ vā nisadanisadapotakaudukkhalamusalāni
analyzed: malam na paññāyati mūla bhesajja ādīni pisantānam vā koṭṭentānam vā nisada nisada potaka audukkhala musalāni

original: khīyanti, dantantare laggaṃ sukhumaāmisaṃ hoti, raso na paññāyati, abbohārikaṃ. Antovuttheti
analyzed: khīyanti danta antare laggam sukhuma āmisam hoti rasaḥ na paññāyati abbohārikam

original: akappiyakuṭiyā chadanabbhantare vuttheti attho. Sayaṃpakketi attanā yattha katthaci
analyzed: akappiya kuṭiyā chadana abbhantare vuttha iti sayaṃpakkā iti attanā yattha katthaci

original: pakke. Sace vāsiādiṃ tāpetvā takkādīsu pakkhipati, ettāvatāpi sāmapākato na muccati.
analyzed: pakke sace vā asi ādim tāpetvā takka ādīsu pakkhipati ettāvatā api sāma pākataḥ na muccati

original: Purimakālikadvaye punapākañhi ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ bhikkhuno pacituṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: purima kālika dvaye punapākam hi ṭhapetvā yam kiñci āmisam bhikkhuno pacitum na vaṭṭati

original: Sacepissa uṇhayāguyā sulasipaṇṇādīni vā siṅgiveraṃ vā pakkhipanti, cāletuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: uṇha yāguyā sulasi paṇṇa ādīni vā siṅgiveram vā pakkhipanti cāletum na vaṭṭati

original: Uttaṇḍulaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā pidahituṃ na vaṭṭati. Antopakketi akappiyakuṭiyā anto
analyzed: uttaṇḍulam bhattam labhitvā pidahitum na vaṭṭati antopakkā iti akappiya kuṭiyā anto

original: pakke. Sabbattha dukkaṭanti sambandho.
analyzed: pakke sabbattha dukkaṭa nti sambandho

original: Paṭiggāhaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭiggāha niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 10. Akappiyamaṃsaniddesavaṇṇanā
113-4. Manussahatthiassānañca …pe… uragassa ca yaṃ maṃsañca, yaṃ uddissakatamaṃsañca,
analyzed: manussa hatthi assānam ca pe uragassa ca yam maṃsañca yam uddissakata maṃsañca

original: appaṭivekkhitaṃ yañca maṃsaṃ, tesu maṃsesūti evaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Tattha
analyzed: appaṭivekkhitam yat ca maṃsam tesu maṃsesu iti evam yojetvā atthaḥ veditabbo tattha

original: sīsagīvātaraṅgena carantā acchavisesāva taracchā. Uragassāti iminā sabbāpi dīghajāti
analyzed: sīsa gīvā taraṅgena carantā taracchāḥ uragassa ati iminā sabbā api dīgha jāti

original: saṅgahitā. Uddissakatamaṃsanti bhikkhuṃ uddisitvā kataṃ uddissakataṃ, tañca taṃ maṃsañca.
analyzed: saṅgahitāḥ uddissakatamaṃsanti bhikkhum uddisitvā katam uddissakatam tat ca tam maṃsam ca

original: Ettha ca maṃsa-ggahaṇena macchānampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ upalakkhaṇavasena, ca-saddena
analyzed: ettha ca maṃsa ggahaṇena macchānam pi gahaṇam veditabbam upalakkhaṇa vasena ca saddena

original: vā. Pañcasupi sahadhammikesu yaṃ kiñci uddissakataṃ sabbesampi na kappati, tampi
analyzed: vā pañcasu pi sahadhammikesu yam kiñci uddissa katam sabbesam pi na kappati tam pi

original: adiṭṭhaasutaaparisaṅkitatāya tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ vaṭṭati. Appaṭivekkhitanti anupaparikkhitaṃ,
analyzed: a diṭṭha a suta a parisaṅkita tāya ti koṭi parisuddham vaṭṭati appaṭivekkhitam ti anupaparikkhitam

original: anāpucchitanti attho. Āpattibhīrukena hi rūpaṃ sallakkhentenāpi pucchitvā paṭiggahetabbaṃ
analyzed: an āpucchitam ti atthaḥ āpatti bhīrukena hi rūpam sallakkhentena api pucchitvā paṭiggahetabbam

original: paribhuñjitabbañca. Manussānaṃ maṃsesu thullaccayanti yojanā. Thūlo accayo etthāti
analyzed: paribhuñjitabbam ca manussānam maṃsesu thullaccayanti yojanā thūlaḥ accayaḥ ettha ati

original: rasse, dvitte ca thullaccayaṃ. Pārājikasaṅghādisesehi ṭhapetvā ito adhikaṃ vajjaṃ
analyzed: rasse dvitte ca thullaccayam pārājika saṅgha ādi sesehi ṭhapetvā itas adhikam vajjam

original: natthi. Sesesūti avasesesu ekādasasu.
analyzed: natthi sesesu iti avasesesu ekādasasu

original: 115. Idāni manussādīnaṃ aṭṭhiādīnipi akappiyānīti dassetuṃ “aṭṭhipī”tiādimāha. Pi-saddo
analyzed: idāni manussa ādīnam aṭṭhi ādīni pi akappiyāni iti dassetum aṭṭhi pi iti ādim āha pi saddaḥ

original: “lohita”ntiādīsupi anuvattetabbo. Esanti manussādīnaṃ dasannaṃ. Vasāsu pana ekā manussavasā
analyzed: lohita nti ādīsu pi anuvattetabbaḥ esanti manussa ādīnam dasannam vasāsu pana ekā manussa vasā

original: na vaṭṭati. Khīrādīsu akappiyaṃ nāma natthi. Uddissakataṃyeva sacittakanti yojanā.
analyzed: na vaṭṭati khīra ādīsu akappiyam nāma natthi uddissaka tam yeva sa cittakam ti yojanā

original: Sacittakanti uddissakatabhāvajānanacittena saha vattatīti sacittakaṃ. Vatthuvītikkamavijānanacittena
analyzed: sa cittakam ti uddissa kata bhāva jānana cittena saha vattati iti sa cittakam vatthu vītikkama vijānana cittena

original: hi sacittakattaṃ. Ettha ca sacittakattaṃ āpattiyā eva, na ca maṃsassa, tathāpi maṃsasīsena
analyzed: hi sa cittakattam ettha ca sa cittakattam āpattiyāḥ eva na ca maṃsassa tathā api maṃsa sīsena

original: āpatti eva vuttāti viññātabbanti.
analyzed: āpatti eva vuttā iti viññātabbanti

original: Akappiyamaṃsaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: akappiya maṃsa niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 11. Nissaggiyaniddesavaṇṇanā
116-7. Rūpiyena arūpiyaṃ rūpiyañca itarena rūpiyañca parivatteyyāti sambandho. Tattha
analyzed: rūpiyena arūpiyam rūpiyam ca itarena rūpiyam ca sambandho tattha

original: rūpiyenāti rūpiyasaṅkhātena nissaggiyavatthunā. Arūpiyanti arūpiyasaṅkhātaṃ dukkaṭavatthuṃ
analyzed: rūpiyena ati rūpiya saṅkhātena nissaggiya vatthunā arūpiyam arūpiya saṅkhātam dukkaṭa vatthum

original: kappiyavatthuñca. Itarenāti arūpiyena. Nissaggīti nissajjanaṃ nissaggo, pubbabhāge
analyzed: kappiya vatthuñca itarena ati arūpiyena nissaggī iti nissajjanam nissaggo pubbabhāge

original: kattabbassa vinayakammassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Nissaggo assa atthīti nissaggi, kiṃ taṃ? Pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: kattabbassa vinaya kammassa etam nāmam nissaggaḥ assa atthi iti nissaggi kim tat pācittiyam

original: Rūpiyassa mūlaggahaṇe pana rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: rūpiyassa mūla ggahaṇe pana rūpiya paṭiggahaṇa sikkhāpadena nissaggiyam pācittiyam

original: Idāni rūpiyādiṃ dassetuṃ “idhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha kahā…pe… māsakaṃ idha rūpiyanti
analyzed: idāni rūpiya ādim dassetum idha ati ādi āraddham tattha kahāpe māsakam idha rūpiyanti

original: sambandho. Tattha kahāpaṇo nāma suvaṇṇamayo vā rajatamayo vā etarahi pakatikahāpaṇo
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tattha kahāpaṇaḥ nāma suvaṇṇa mayaḥ vā rajata mayaḥ vā etarahi pakati kahāpaṇaḥ

original: vā. Sajjhūti rajataṃ. Siṅgīti suvaṇṇabhedo, tathāpi cettha sāmaññena suvaṇṇamadhippetaṃ.
analyzed: vā rajatam siṅgīti suvaṇṇa bhedaḥ tathā api ca ittha sāmaññena suvaṇṇam adhippetam

original: Vohārūpagamāsakanti vohāraṃ kayavikkayaṃ upagacchatīti vohārūpagaṃ, tañca taṃ māsakañca.
analyzed: vohāra upaga māsakanti vohāram kaya vikkayam upagacchati iti vohāra upagam tam ca tam māsakam ca

original: Taṃ pana samuṭṭhāpitarūpañca asamuṭṭhāpitarūpañca lohadāruādimayaṃ vuccati. Idha
analyzed: tam pana samuṭṭhāpita rūpam ca a samuṭṭhāpita rūpam ca loha dāru ādi mayam vuccati idha

original: rūpiyanti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade rūpiyaṃ nāmāti attho. Vatthamuttādi kappaṃ dukkaṭavatthuñca
analyzed: rūpiyanti imasmim sikkhāpade rūpiyam nāma ati atthaḥ kappam dukkaṭa vatthum ca

original: itaranti yojanā. Tattha vatthañca muttā ca ādi yassāti samāso. Ādi-saddo paccekaṃ
analyzed: itaranti yojanā tattha vattham ca muttā ca ādi yassa ati samāsaḥ ādi saddo paccekam

original: yojetabbo “vatthādi muttādī”ti. Tattha paṭhamena ādi-saddena kappāsasuttāparaṇṇādikaṃ
analyzed: yojetabbaḥ vattha ādi mutta ādi iti tattha paṭhamena ādi saddena kappāsa sutta aparaṇṇa ādikam

original: yaṃ kiñci kappiyavatthuṃ, dutiyena maṇi saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ
analyzed: yam kiñci kappiya vatthum dutiyena maṇi saṅkhaḥ silā pavāḷam lohitaṅkaḥ masāra gallam

original: sattadhaññāni dāsidāsakhettavatthupupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti idaṃ dukkaṭavatthuṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: satta dhaññāni dāsi dāsa khetta vatthu puppha ārāma phala ārāma ādayo ti idam dukkaṭa vatthum saṅgaṇhāti

original: Vatthādikappiyavatthuṃ, muttādidukkaṭavatthuñca itaraṃ aññaṃ arūpiyaṃ nāmāti attho.
analyzed: vattha ādi kappiya vatthum mutta ādi dukkaṭa vatthum ca itaram aññam arūpiyam nāma ati attho

original: 118. Ettāvatā rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ dassetvā idāni kappiyabhaṇḍe kayavikkayaṃ dassetumāha
analyzed: ettāvatā rūpiya saṃvohāram dassetvā idāni kappiya bhaṇḍe kaya vikkayam dassetum āha

original: “ima”ntiādi. Tattha “imaṃ gahetvā imaṃ dehi, imaṃ kara, imaṃ ānayā”ti vā “imaṃ bhutvā
analyzed: imantiādi tattha imam gahetvā imam dehi imam kara imam ānaya ati vā imam bhutvā

original: imaṃ dehi, imaṃ kara, imaṃ ānayā”ti vā “imaṃ demi, imaṃ dehi, imaṃ kara, imaṃ ānayā”ti
analyzed: imam dehi imam karaḥ imam ānaya ati vā imam demi imam dehi imam karaḥ imam ānaya ati

original: vā kayavikkaye samāpanne nissaggīti yojanā. Tattha imanti taṇḍulādiṃ. Bhutvāti odanādiṃ
analyzed: vā kaya vikkaye samāpanne nissaggī iti yojanā tattha iman ti taṇḍula ādim bhutvā iti odana ādim

original: bhuñjitvā. Imaṃ dehīti etaṃ vatthādikaṃ dehi. Imaṃ karāti etaṃ rajanapacanādiṃ karohi.
analyzed: bhuñjitvā imam dehi iti etam vattha ādikam dehi imam etam rajana pacana ādim karohi

original: Imaṃ ānayāti etaṃ rajanakaṭṭhādiṃ ānehi. Imaṃ demīti etaṃ vatthādikaṃ tava demi.

original: vihesā. Aññavādakassa vihesakassa ca ñattidutiyakammena aññavādakavihesakakamme kate
analyzed: vihesā aññavādakassa vihesakassa ca ñatti dutiya kammena aññavādaka vihesaka kamme kate

original: puna aññavāde vihesāya pācittiyaṃ. Anāropite pana kamme dukkaṭaṃ. Kiñci vītikkamaṃ
analyzed: puna añña vāde vihesāya pācittiyam an āropite pana kamme dukkaṭam kiñci vītikkamam

original: disvā “āvuso, idaṃ nāma tayā kata”nti vutte taṃ na kathetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ
analyzed: disvā āvuso idam nāma tayā katam iti vutte tam na kathetu kāmo tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham

original: vihesetīti vihesako. Anācāraṃ ācaritvā saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā, vatthunā vā anuyuñjiyamāne
analyzed: viheseti iti vihesakaḥ anācāram ācaritvā saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā vatthunā vā anuyuñjiyamāne

original: taṃ akathetukāmo “ko āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno”tiādinā nayena aññehi vacanehi taṃ vacanaṃ
analyzed: tam a kathetu kāmo kaḥ āpanno kismin āpannaḥ iti ādinā nayena aññehi vacanehi tam vacanam

original: paṭicchādento yo aññaṃ vadati, ayaṃ aññavādako nāma.
analyzed: paṭicchādentaḥ yaḥ aññam vadati ayam aññavādakaḥ nāma

original: Duṭṭhullaṃ nāma pārājikasaṅghādisesā, idha pana saṅghādisesova. Pakāso ca chādo ca
analyzed: duṭṭhullam nāma pārājika saṅgha adisesāḥ idha pana saṅgha adisesaḥ uva pakāso ca chādo ca

original: pakāsachādo, duṭṭhullassa pakāsachādoti tappuriso. Abhiṇhāpattikassa bhikkhuno āyatiṃ
analyzed: pakāsa chādaḥ duṭṭhullassa pakāsa chādaḥ ti tappurisaḥ abhiṇhāpattikassa bhikkhuno āyatim

original: saṃvaratthāya āpattipariyantaṃ kulapariyantañca katvā vā akatvā vā tikkhattuṃ apaloketvā
analyzed: saṃvara tthāya āpatti pariyantam kula pariyantam ca katvā vā a katvā vā tikkhattum apaloketvā

original: kātabbaṃ. Bhikkhusammutiṃ ṭhapetvā anupasampannassa “ayaṃ asuciṃ mocetvā saṅghādisesaṃ
analyzed: kātabbam bhikkhu sammutim ṭhapetvā an upasampannassa ayam asucim mocetvā saṅgha ādisesam

original: āpanno”tiādinā nayena vatthunā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ ghaṭetvā tassa duṭṭhullassa pakāsane
analyzed: āpannaḥ ti ādinā nayena vatthunā saddhim āpattim ghaṭetvā tassa duṭṭhullassa pakāsane

original: ārocane ca, tasseva yena kenaci upāyena ñatvā chādane ca, aduṭṭhullārocane chādane
analyzed: ārocane ca tassa iva yena kenacid upāyena ñatvā chādane ca a duṭṭhulla ārocane chādane

original: ca, anupasampannassa pana purimapañcamasikkhāpade itarā duṭṭhullepi dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: ca anupasampannassa pana purima pañcama sikkhāpade itarā duṭṭhulle pi dukkaṭam

original: Hāsodaketi ettha hāse udaketi padavibhāgo veditabbo. Yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena hasādhippāyassa
analyzed: hāsa udaka iti ettha hāse udaka iti pada vibhāgaḥ veditabbaḥ yena kenacid sarīra avayavena hasa adhippāyassa

original: upakacchakādīsu hāse phusane. Hāsanimittañhi phusanaṃ hāso. Anupasampanne dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: upakacchaka ādīsu hāse phusane hāsa nimittam hi phusanam hāsaḥ an upasampanne dukkaṭam

original: Udake hāseti uparigopphake udake hasādhippāyassa ummujjananimujjanena kīḷāya. Kīḷā
analyzed: udake hāseti upari gopphake udake hasa adhippāyassa ummujjana nimujjanena kīḷāya kīḷā

original: hi idha hāsoti vutto. Nāvāya kīḷato, hatthādinā kaṭṭhādinā vā udakaṃ hanato antamaso
analyzed: hi idha hāsaḥ ti vuttaḥ nāvāya kīḷataḥ hattha ādinā kaṭṭha ādinā vā udakam hanataḥ antamaso

original: bhājanagatakañjikādīnipi khipanakīḷāya kīḷato dukkaṭaṃ. Ahasādhippāyassa anāpatti.
analyzed: bhājana gata kañjika ādīni pi khipana kīḷāya kīḷataḥ dukkaṭam ahasā adhippāyassa anāpatti

original: Nicchubhane vihārāti saṅghikavihārato bhikkhuno nikkaḍḍhananikkaḍḍhāpane. Ettha ca
analyzed: nicchubhane saṅghika vihārataḥ bhikkhunaḥ nikkaḍḍhana nikkaḍḍhāpane ettha ca

original: ekappayoge ekā, nānāpayoge dvāragaṇanāya āpattiyo. Puggalikanikkaḍḍhane, tassa parikkhāranikkaḍḍhane,
analyzed: eka ppayoge ekā nānā apayoge dvāra gaṇanāya āpattiyaḥ puggalika nikkaḍḍhane tassa parikkhāra nikkaḍḍhane

original: anupasampannassa pana tassa parikkhārassa vā nikkaḍḍhane dukkaṭaṃ. Na sammāvattantānaṃ
analyzed: an upasampannassa pana tassa parikkhārassa vā nikkaḍḍhane dukkaṭam na sammāvattantānam

original: antevāsikasaddhivihārikānaṃ vā nikkaḍḍhane, attano vissāsikassa vihārā nikkaḍḍhane,
analyzed: antevāsika saddhivihārikānam vā nikkaḍḍhane attanaḥ vissāsikassa vihārā nikkaḍḍhane

original: bhaṇḍanakārakassa pana sakalasaṅghārāmato nikkaḍḍhane anāpatti.
analyzed: bhaṇḍana kārakassa pana sakala saṅgha ārāmataḥ nikkaḍḍhane anāpatti

original: Anupakhajja sayaneti “vuḍḍho, gilāno, saṅghena dinno”ti jānitvā mañcapīṭhānaṃ vā
analyzed: an upakhajja sayanā iti vuḍḍhaḥ gilānaḥ saṅghena dinnaḥ iti jānitvā vā

original: tassa bhikkhuno pavisantassa vā nikkhamantassa vā upacāraṃ anupakhajja anupavisitvā
analyzed: tassa bhikkhuno pavisantassa vā nikkhamantassa vā upacāram an upakhajja an upavisitvā

original: saṅghike vihāre “yassa sambādho bhavissati, so pakkamissatī”ti adhippāyena nisīdananisajjanavasena
analyzed: saṅghike vihāre yassa sambādhaḥ bhavissati so pakkamissati iti adhippāyena nisīdana nisajjana vasena

original: sayane. Puggalike dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: sayane puggalike dukkaṭam

original: Ettha ca pācittīti uddisitvā kānici pasiddhāni dassitāni. Avuttāni pana tādisāni
analyzed: ettha ca pācitti iti uddisitvā kānici pasiddhāni dassitāni avuttāni pana tādisāni

original: imināva sāmaññavacanena saṅgahetvā veditabbāni. Kathaṃ? Acelakādiaññatitthiyānaṃ
analyzed: iminā ava sāmañña vacanena saṅgahetvā veditabbāni katham a celaka ādi añña titthiyānam

original: yassa kassaci āmisassa sahatthā dāne ca, sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitamacchamaṃsakhīradadhisaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: yassa kassaci āmisassa sahatthā dāne ca sappi navanīta tela madhu phāṇita maccha maṃsa khīra dadhi saṅkhātānam

original: paṇītabhojanānaṃ attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjane, rāgapariyuṭṭhitaitthipurisassa
analyzed: paṇīta bhojanānaṃ attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjane rāga pariyuṭṭhita etthi purisassa

original: yogge kule anupavisitvā nisajjanakappane, pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantito
analyzed: yogge kule an upavisitvā nisajjana kappane pañcannam bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantitaḥ

original: tasmiṃ bhutte vā abhutte vā santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchitvā purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ
analyzed: tasmin bhutte vā a bhutte vā santam bhikkhum an āpucchitvā purebhattam pacchābhattam

original: vā yasmiṃ kule nimantito, tato gilānacīvaradānakārasamayaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ aññakulappavesane,
analyzed: vā yasmim kule tatas gilāna cīvara dāna kāra samayam ṭhapetvā aññasmin añña kula ppavesane

original: ṭhapetvā ekadivasaṃ aññasmiṃ dine āvasathapiṇḍassa agilānena hutvā bhuñjane, rattiparicchedaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapetvā eka divasam aññasmim dine āvasatha piṇḍassa a gilānena hutvā bhuñjane ratti paricchedam

original: vā bhesajjaparicchedaṃ vā katvā pavāritato uttari aññatra puna pavāraṇāya aññatra
analyzed: vā bhesajja paricchedam vā katvā pavāritataḥ uttari aññatra puna pavāraṇāya aññatra

original: niccappavāraṇāya viññāpane, aññatra tathārūpapaccayā gāmato nikkhantasenādassanāya
analyzed: nicca ppavāraṇāya viññāpane aññatra tathārūpa paccayāḥ gāmataḥ nikkhanta senā dassanāya

original: gamane, paccayenapi gantvā tirattato uttari senāya vāse, tassa ca vasantassa yuddhaṭṭhānabalagaṇaṭṭhānasenānivesaanīkadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: gamane paccayena api gantvā tirattataḥ uttari senāya vāse tassa ca vasantassa yuddha ṭṭhāna balagaṇa ṭṭhāna senā nivesa anīka dassana ttham

original: gamane, piṭṭhādīhi katamajjasaṅkhātasurāya, pupphādīhi kataāsavasaṅkhātamerayassa
analyzed: gamane piṭṭha ādīhi kata majja saṅkhāta surāya puppha ādīhi kata āsava saṅkhāta merayassa

original: ca pāne, padīpujjalapattapacanādikāraṇaṃ vinā visibbitukāmatāya agilānassa aggino
analyzed: ca pāne padīput jala patta pacana ādi kāraṇam vinā visibbitu kāma tāya a gilānassa agginaḥ

original: jālanajālāpane, kappabinduṃ anādāya navacīvaraparibhoge, sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā
analyzed: jālana jālāpane kappa bindum an ādāya nava cīvara paribhoge sāmam cīvaram vikappetvā

original: apaccuddhāya paribhoge, bhikkhusantakapattādino antamaso hasādhippāyenapi apanidhāne
analyzed: a paccuddhāya paribhoge bhikkhu santaka patta ādinaḥ antamasaḥ hasa adhippāyena api apanidhāne

original: apanidhāpane, sañcicca tiracchānagatassa jīvitavoropane, sañcicca yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇassa
analyzed: apanidhāpane sañcit ca tiracchāna gatassa jīvita voropane sañcit ca yathādhammam nihata adhikaraṇassa

original: punakammāya ukkoṭane, sañcicca theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānagamane,
analyzed: punakammāya ukkoṭane sañcicca theyyasatthena saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna gamane

original: bhikkhūhi sikkhāpadehi vuccamānassa aññaṃ avicāretvā “na tattha sikkhissāmī”ti bhaṇane,
analyzed: bhikkhūhi sikkhāpadehi vuccamānassa aññam a vicāretvā na tattha sikkhissāmi iti bhaṇane

analyzed: sikkhāpada vivaṇṇane imesam sutvā oramissāmi iti adhippāyam vinā vivāda āpannānam upassuti ṭhāne

analyzed: dhammikānam kammānam chandam da tvā pacchā khīyana dhamma āpajjane saṅghe vinicchaye

analyzed: aññatra ajjhārāmā ajjhāvasathā vā ratanassa vā ratana sammatassa vā uggaṇhana oggahāpane pācittiyanti

original: Pācittiyaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pācittiya niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 13. Samaṇakappaniddesavaṇṇanā
125. Samaṇakappāti samaṇavohārā. Bhavanti, ahesunti vā bhūtā, vattamāne, bhūte vā
analyzed: samaṇa kappāti samaṇa vohārāḥ bhavanti vā bhūtāḥ vattamāne bhūte vā

original: tappaccayo. Viruḷhamūlādibhāvaṃ āpajjitvā vaḍḍhamānakānaṃ, vaḍḍhitvā mahantabhāvaṃ
analyzed: tad paccayaḥ viruḍha mūla ādi bhāvam āpajjitvā vaḍḍhamānakānam vaḍḍhitvā mahanta bhāvam

original: pattānañca rukkhalatādisaṅkhātānaṃ bhūtānaṃ gāmo, bhūtā eva vā gāmo samūho bhūtagāmo.
analyzed: pattānam ca rukkha latā ādi saṅkhātānam bhūtānam gāmaḥ bhūtāḥ eva vā gāmaḥ samūhaḥ bhūtagāmo

original: Tassa samārambho chedanaphālanādi, tasmiṃ. Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ, taṃhetu pācittiyaṃ
analyzed: tassa samārambhaḥ chedana phālana ādi tasmin nimitta atthe ca itam bhummam taṃhetu pācittiyam

original: hotīti attho. Katakappiyaṃ samaṇakappiyaṃ bhaveti sambandho. Tattha kataṃ kappiyaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti attho kata kappiyam samaṇa kappiyam bhava iti sambandhaḥ tattha katam kappiyam

original: yassāti bahubbīhi. Kenāti āha “nakhenā”tiādi.
analyzed: yassa ati kena ati āha nakhena atiādi

original: 126. Idāni yassa samārambho, taṃ bhūtagāmaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “sa mūlā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni yassa samārambhaḥ tam bhūta gāmam vibhajitvā dassetum sa mūla ati ādi āraddham

original: Soti bhūtagāmo. Bhavituṃ uppajjituṃ payojetīti kāritantā tappaccayo, pabhāvito uppāditoti
analyzed: saḥ iti bhūta gāmaḥ bhavitum uppajjitum payojeti iti kāri tantā tad paccayo pabhāvitaḥ uppāditaḥ ti

original: attho. Atha vā pabhavanaṃ pabhavo, uppatti, sova pabhavo, pabhāvaṃ karotīti nāmadhātuto
analyzed: attho atha vā pabhavanam pabhavaḥ uppatti saḥ uva pabhavaḥ pabhāvam karoti iti nāmadhātuto

original: kattari tappaccayo, pabhāvito uppannoti attho. Mūlañca khandho ca bījañca aggañca
analyzed: kattari tad paccayaḥ pabhāvitaḥ uppannaḥ ti atthaḥ mūlañca khandho ca bījañca aggañca

original: phaḷu ca mūla…pe… phaḷūni. Phaḷu nāma pabbaṃ. Tāniyeva bījāni, tehi pabhāvito uppādito,
analyzed: phaḷu ca mūlape phaḷūni phaḷu nāma pabbam tāniyā iva bījāni tehi pabhāvitaḥ uppāditaḥ

original: atha vā tehi avadhibhūtehi, kāraṇabhūtehi vā pabhāvito uppannoti kamena vikappadvaye
analyzed: atha vā tehi avadhi bhūtehi kāraṇa bhūtehi vā uppannaḥ ti kamena vikappa dvaye

original: samāsadvayaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha mūlabījaṃ nāma haliddisiṅgiverādi.
analyzed: samāsa dvayam veditabbam tattha mūlabījam nāma haliddi siṅgivera ādi

original: Khandhabījaṃ nāma assatthanigrodhādi. Bījabījaṃ nāma pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇādi. Aggabījaṃ
analyzed: khandha bījam nāma assattha nigrodha ādi bīja bījam nāma pubbaṇṇa aparaṇṇa ādi agga bījam

original: nāma hiriverādi. Phaḷubījaṃ nāma ucchunaḷādi. Tattha mūlabījādīni pañca bījagāmo.
analyzed: nāma hirivera ādi phaḷu bījam nāma ucchunaḷa ādi tattha mūla bīja ādīni pañca bīja gāmo

original: Tannibbatto rukkhalatādi bhūtagāmo.
analyzed: tad nibbattaḥ rukkha latā ādi bhūta gāmaḥ

original: Idāni tesu bījagāmasamārambhe dukkaṭaṃ dasseti aparaddhena. Bhūtagāmaviyojitaṃ bījaṃ
analyzed: idāni tesu bīja gāma samārambhe dukkaṭam dasseti aparaddhena bhūta gāma viyojitam bījam

original: ārambhe dukkaṭanti sambandho. Bhūtagāmato viyojitanti tappuriso. Bījanti bhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: ārambhe sambandhaḥ bhūta gāmataḥ tappurisaḥ

original: ropitamaropitampi niggatavidatthimattapattavaṭṭipi mūlabījāni. “Ārambhe”ti kitakapaccayassa
analyzed: ropitam a ropitam pi niggata vidatthi matta patta vaṭṭipi mūla bījāni ārambheti kitaka paccayassa

original: yoge avutte kammani chaṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vikappena ubhayattha dutiyā. Ārambheti samārambhe.
analyzed: yoge a vutte kammani chaṭṭhuppattiyam vikappena ubhayattha dutiyāḥ ārambhe iti samārambhe

original: Tasmā “imaṃ pupphaṃ phalaṃ vā jāna, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”tiādinā kappiyavacanena
analyzed: tasmai imam puppham phalam vā jāne imam kappiyam karohi itiādinā kappiya vacanena

original: bhūtagāmato viyojitaṃ bījajātaṃ bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ puna kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paribhuñjibhabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhūta gāmataḥ viyojitam bīja jātam bīja gāma parimocana attham puna kappiyam kārāpetvā paribhuñjibhabbam

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ aggiparijitaṃ satthaparijitaṃ
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇa kappehi phalam paribhuñjitum aggi parijitam sattha parijitam

original: nakhaparijitaṃ abījaṃ nibbattabījaññeva pañcama”nti vuttesu pañcasu nakhaparijitādīni tīṇi dassitāni.
analyzed: nakhaparijitam abījam nibbattabījam eva pañcaman ti vuttesu pañcasu nakhaparijita ādīni tīṇi dassitāni

original: 127. Idāni avasiṭṭhāni dve dassetuṃ “nibbattabīja”ntiādikaṃ paṭhamaddhaṃ āha. Tattha
analyzed: idāni avasiṭṭhāni dve dassetum nibbatta bīja nti ādikam āha tattha

original: nibbattabījanti nibbattaniyanti nibbattaṃ, nipubba vatu vattanetimasmā tappaccayo,
analyzed: nibbatta bījanti nibbatta niyanti nibbattam vatu tad paccayaḥ

original: nibbattaṃ bījaṃ yassa taṃ nibbattabījaṃ, bījaṃ nibbattetvā visuṃ katvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ
analyzed: nibbattam bījam yassa tam nibbatta bījam bījam nibbattetvā visum katvā paribhuñjitabbam

original: ambapanasādi. Nobījaṃ nāma taruṇambaphalādi. Idāni bījagāmabhūtagāmesu kappiyakaraṇappakārādivisesaṃ
analyzed: amba panasa ādi nobījam nāma taruṇamba phala ādi idāni bīja gāma bhūta gāmesu kappiya karaṇa ppakāra ādi visesam

original: dassento “kaṭāhā”tiādimāha. Tattha kaṭāhena baddhaṃ bījaṃ yesanti bāhirattho.
analyzed: dassentaḥ kaṭāha ati ādim āha tattha kaṭāhena baddham bījam bāhiratthaḥ

original: 128. Bhājane bhūmiyampi vā ekābaddhesu bījesu ekasmiñca kappiye kateti yojanā. Bījesūti bījagāmabhūtagāmesu. Bhūtagāmopi hi idha “bīja”nti ruḷhīvasena vuccati.

original: 129. Nikkhitteti ṭhapite. Kappiyaṃ puna kareyyāti jātamūlapaṇṇabhāvato bhūtagāmattā

original: nivāsanakāyabandhanasaṅghāṭidānaṃ, dhovitvā sodakapattassa dānaṃ gāmappavese vattaṃ.
analyzed: nivāsana kāya bandhana saṅghāṭi dānam dhovitvā sa udaka pattassa dānam gāma ppavese vattam

original: Yadi ākaṅkhanti, parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca nātidūranaccāsanne gamanaṃ,
analyzed: yadi ākaṅkhanti parimaṇḍalam ca ca na ati dūra nacca āsanne gamanam

original: pattapariyāpannaggahaṇañca gamane vattaṃ. Nivattente pana paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā āsanapaññāpanaṃ,
analyzed: patta pariyāpanna ggahaṇam ca gamane vattam nivattente pana paṭhamataram āgantvā āsana paññāpanam

original: pādodakādiupanikkhipanaṃ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṃ āgame āgamane vattaṃ. Bhaṇantānaṃ
analyzed: pāda udaka ādi upanikkhipanam patta cīvara paṭiggahaṇam āgame āgamane vattam bhaṇantānam

original: antarā kathāanopātanaṃ sabbattha vattaṃ. Āsanapaññāpanaṃ, uṭṭhitesu āsanauddharaṇaṃ,
analyzed: antarā kathā anopātanam sabbattha vattam āsana paññāpanam uṭṭhitesu āsana auddharaṇam

original: pādapīṭhakathalānaṃ upanikkhipanaṃ, paṭisāmanañca āsane pādapīṭhe pādakathale ca
analyzed: pāda pīṭha kathalānaṃ upanikkhipanam paṭisāmanam ca āsane pāda pīṭhe pāda kathale ca

original: vattaṃ. Dhotapādaṭṭhapanakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ. Aññaṃ kathalaṃ. Upāhanā ca cīvarañcāti dvando,
analyzed: vattam dhota pādaṭṭhapanakam pāda pīṭham aññam kathalam upāhanā ca cīvarañca ati dvandaḥ

original: tasmiṃ. Sukkhaallacoḷehi puñchanaṃ upāhanāya vattaṃ. Sinnacīvarassa muhuttaṃ otāpanaṃ,
analyzed: tasmin sukkha alla coḷehi puñchanam upāhanāya vattam sinna cīvarassa muhuttam otāpanam

original: caturaṅgulaṃ kaṇṇaṃ ussāretvā cīvarasaṃharaṇañca cīvare vattaṃ.
analyzed: catur aṅgulam kaṇṇam ussāretvā cīvara saṃharaṇam ca cīvare vattam

original: 147. Paribhojanīya…pe… passāvaṭṭhānisu ca vihārasodhane ca puna paññāpane ca vattaṃ
analyzed: paribhojanīya pe passāvaṭṭhānisu ca vihāra sodhane ca puna paññāpane ca vattam

original: tathāti sambandho. Vaccañca passāvo ca vaccapassāvā. Tiṭṭhati etthāti ṭhānī, kuṭi.
analyzed: tathā iti sambandhaḥ vaccañca passāvo ca vacca passāvā tiṭṭhati ettha ati ṭhānī kuṭi

original: Vaccapassāvānaṃ ṭhānīti tappuriso. Atha vā tiṭṭhati etthāti ṭhānaṃ, soyeva samāso,
analyzed: vacca passāvānam ṭhāni iti tappurisaḥ atha vā tiṭṭhati ettha ati ṭhānam saḥ yā iva samāsaḥ

original: vaccapassāvassa ca patanaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti iṭṭhagehādi. Paribhojanīyañca
analyzed: ca patana ṭṭhānam tat assa atthi iti iṭṭha geha ādi paribhojanīyam ca

original: pānīyañca vaccapassāvaṭṭhānī ca pari…pe… ṭṭhānī. Tāsu tesu vā. Pādodakauṇhasītanahānodakappaṭiyādāpanaṃ
analyzed: pānīyam ca ca paripe ṭṭhānī tāsu tesu vā pāda udaka oṇha sītana hāna udaka paṭiyādāpanam

original: paribhojanīye vattaṃ. Pātabbapānīyena pucchanaṃ upaṭṭhāpanañca pānīye vattaṃ. Sammajjanapānīyaupaṭṭhāpanaṃ
analyzed: paribhojanīye vattam pātabba pānīyena pucchanam upaṭṭhāpanañca pānīye vattam sammajjana pānīya upaṭṭhāpanam

original: vaccapassāvaṭṭhānīsu vattaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ pattacīvarādīni harāpetvā ekamante nikkhipanādi,
analyzed: vacca passāvaṭṭhānīsu vattam paṭhamam patta cīvara ādīni harāpetvā eka mante nikkhipana ādi

original: ullokato paṭṭhāya makkaṭasantānaṃ ohāretvā sammajjanañca vihārasodhane vattaṃ. Otāpetvā
analyzed: ullokataḥ paṭṭhāya makkaṭa santānam ohāretvā sammajjanam ca vihāra sodhane vattam otāpetvā

original: sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne bhūmattharaṇādipaññāpanaṃ puna paññāpane
analyzed: sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne bhūmattharaṇa ādi paññāpanam puna paññāpane

original: vattaṃ. Tathāti iminā “care”ti idaṃ atidisati.
analyzed: tathā iti iminā cara iti idam atidisati

original: 148. Vihāraṃ sodhento bhikkhu paṭivāte vā saṅgaṇe vā pānīyasāmantā vā sayanāsanaṃ
analyzed: vihāram sodhentaḥ bhikkhu paṭivāte vā saṅgaṇe vā pānīya sāmantā vā sayanāsanaṃ

original: na papphoṭeyyāti sambandho. Pānīya-saddena paribhojanīyañca saṅgahitaṃ. Paṭivāteti
analyzed: na papphoṭeyya ati sambandhaḥ pānīya saddena paribhojanīyañca saṅgahitam paṭivāta iti

original: uparivāte. Saṅgaṇeti bahūnaṃ samosaraṇe vivaṭappadese. Sayanāsanaṃ nāma bhūmattharaṇamañcādi.
analyzed: upari vāte saṅgaṇā iti bahūnam samosaraṇe vivaṭa ppadese sayanāsanam nāma bhūmattharaṇa mañca ādi

original: 149. Nhāne vattaṃ care, nhātassa kātabbe careti sambandhassa purisādhīnatāya sambandho
analyzed: nhāne vattam care nhātassa kātabbe cara iti sambandhassa purisa adhīna tāya sambandhaḥ

original: veditabbo. Cīvarappaṭiggahaṇagattaparikammakaraṇaṃ nahāne vattaṃ. Kātabbe careti
analyzed: veditabbaḥ cīvara paṭiggahaṇa gatta parikamma karaṇam na hāne vattam kātabbe cara iti

original: gattato udakasammajjananivāsanadānādikicce pavatteyyāti attho. “Vanappagumbe”tiādīsu
analyzed: udaka sammajjana nivāsana dāna ādi kicce pavatteyyā ti atthaḥ vana ppagumba iti ādīsu

original: viya sissa e-kārādesaṃ rūpaṃ, tasmā kātabbaṃ vattaṃ careyyāti yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: viya sissaḥ ekāra ādesam rūpam tasmā kātabbam vattam careyya iti yojetvā veditabbam

original: Budhā pana “nhāne nhātassa kātabbe vattaṃ care”ti yojetvā atthaṃ vadanti. Evaṃ sati
analyzed: budhā pana nhāne nhātassa kātabbe vattam cara iti yojetvā attham vadanti evam sati

original: kātabba-saddassa kammasādhanattā vattameva kātabbaṃ nāmāti “vatte vattaṃ care”ti
analyzed: kātabba saddassa kamma sādhana ttā vattam eva kātabbam nāma ati vatte vattam cara iti

original: vuttaṃ viya hotīti virujjhati. “Nahātena nahātassā”ti vā pāṭho, udake gattaparikammena
analyzed: vuttam viya hoti iti virujjhati nahātena nahātassa ati vā pāṭhaḥ udake gatta parikammena

original: theraṃ paṭhamaṃ nahāpetvā sayampi nahātenāti attho. Pāḷiyampi “nahātena paṭhamataraṃ
analyzed: theram paṭhamam nahāpetvā sayam pi nahātena ati attho pāḷiyam pi nahātena paṭhamataram

original: uttaritvā”ti atthi. Atha raṅgapāke dhovane sibbane ca vattaṃ careti sambandho, rajanapāke
analyzed: uttaritvā iti atthi atha raṅga pāke dhovane sibbane ca vattam cara iti sambandhaḥ rajana pāke

original: cīvaradhovane cīvarasibbane cāti attho. Rajanto cīvare theve ṭhite na vajeti sambandho.
analyzed: cīvara dhovane cīvara sibbane ca ati atthaḥ rajantaḥ cīvare theve ṭhite na vaja iti sambandho

original: Rajantoti cīvaraṃ rajanto. Theveti rajanabindumhi.
analyzed: rajantaḥ iti cīvaram

original: 150. Ekaccassāti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ verino puggalassa pattaṃ vā cīvarāni vā kiñcanaṃ
analyzed: ekaccassa ati ācariya upajjhāyānam verinaḥ puggalassa pattam vā cīvarāni vā kiñcanam

original: parikkhāraṃ vā na dadeyya na gaṇheyya vāti sambandho. Tattha na dadeyya na gaṇheyyāti
analyzed: parikkhāram vā na dadeyya na gaṇheyya vā ati sambandhaḥ tattha na dadeyya na gaṇheyya ati

original: paṭisāmanatthāyapi na dadeyya, na gaṇheyya vāti attho. “Ākiñcana”ntiādīsu viya kiñcana-saddo
analyzed: na dadeyya na gaṇheyya vā ti atthaḥ ākiñcana nti ādīsu viya kiñcana saddaḥ

original: daṭṭhabbo, tassa kiñcīti attho. Kiñcinanti vā pāṭho, kiñci naṃ parikkhāranti yojanā.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbo tassa kiñci iti attho vā pāṭhaḥ kiñci yojanā

original: Padasiddhivasenettha nanti ta-saddappayogo kato.
analyzed: pada siddhi vasena ittha na nti ta sa da ppayogaḥ kataḥ

original: 151-2. Pacchato kātunti pacchāsamaṇaṃ kātuṃ. Tassāti ekaccassa. Pacchatoti pacchāsamaṇo
analyzed: pacchatas kātunti pacchāsamaṇam kātum tassa ati ekaccassa pacchatas iti pacchāsamaṇaḥ

original: hutvā. Ninnetunti ekaccassa nīharituṃ. Sabbattha anāpucchā na vaṭṭatīti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: hutvā ninnetum ti ekaccassa nīharitum sabbattha anāpucchā na vaṭṭati iti yojetabbam

original: Kiccayaṃ vāti veyyāvaccādi yaṃ kiñci kiccaṃ vā. Kiccameva kiccayaṃ, kassa yo “seniyo”tiādīsu
analyzed: kiccayam vāti veyyāvacca ādi yam kiñci kiccam vā kiccam eva kiccayam kassa seniyo ti ādīsu

original: viya. Parikammaṃ vāti piṭṭhiparikammādiparikammaṃ. Attano kārāpetuṃ vāti ekaccena
analyzed: viya parikammam vāti piṭṭhi parikamma ādi parikammam attanaḥ kārāpetum vāti ekaccena

original: attano kārāpetuṃ vā. Kātuṃ vāti tassa attanā kātuṃ vā.
analyzed: attano kārāpetum vā kātum vā ati tassa attanā kātum vā

original: 153. Sīmato niggatā bahibhūtā nissīmā, taṃ. Ācariyupajjhāyesu avatvā dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ
analyzed: sīmataḥ niggatā bahibhūtā nissīmā tam ācariya upajjhāyesu avatvā dūram bhikkhācāram

original: gatesupi apassantena gāmo pavisitabbo. Diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya pana āpucchituṃyeva
analyzed: gatesu pi a passantena gāmaḥ pavisitabbaḥ diṭṭha ṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya pana āpucchitum yeva

original: vaṭṭati. Attano kiccayaṃ vāpīti attano sīmāyapi pattapacanacīvararajanādikaṃ sakaṃ
analyzed: vaṭṭati attano patta pacana cīvara rajana ādikam sakam

original: karaṇīyaṃ vāpi kātuṃ.
analyzed: karaṇīyam vā api kātum

original: 154. Aratinti sāsane anabhiratiṃ. Saṅghāyattesu kammesūti parivāsāditajjanīyādīsu
analyzed: sāsane an abhiratim saṅgha āyattesu kammesu iti parivāsa ādi tajjanīya ādīsu

original: saṅghappaṭibaddhesu kammesu. Ussukkaṃ vāpīti ācariyupajjhāyesu garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannesu,
analyzed: saṅgha ppaṭibaddhesu kammesu ussukkam vā api iti ācariya upajjhāyesu garu dhammaṃ ajjhāpannesu

original: kammārahesu ca “kinti nu kho saṅgho parivāsaṃ dadeyyā”tiādinā ussāhaṃ vāpi.
analyzed: kammārahesu ca kinti nu kho saṅghaḥ parivāsam dadeyya ati ādinā ussāham vā api

original: 155. Gilānesu upaṭṭheyyāti “pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko
analyzed: gilānesu upaṭṭheyya ati pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgataḥ gilāna upaṭṭhāko

original: alaṃ gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ, paṭibalo hoti bhesajjaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ, sappāyāsappāyaṃ jānāti,
analyzed: alam gilānam upaṭṭhātum paṭibalaḥ hoti bhesajjam saṃvidhātum sappāya asappāyam jānāti

original: asappāyaṃ apanāmeti, sappāyaṃ upanāmeti, mettacitto gilānaṃ upaṭṭhāti no āmisantaro,
analyzed: a sappāyam apanāmeti sappāyam upanāmeti metta cittaḥ gilānam upaṭṭhāti no āmisa antaraḥ

original: ajegucchī hoti uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā vantaṃ vā nīhātuṃ, paṭibalo hoti
analyzed: a jegucchī hoti uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā vantam vā nīhātum paṭibalaḥ hoti

original: gilānaṃ kālena kālaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṃ samādapetuṃ samuttejetuṃ sampahaṃsetu”nti
analyzed: gilānam kālena kālam dhammiyā kathāya sandassetum samādapetum samuttejetum sampahaṃsetum ti

original: evaṃ vuttapañcaṅgasamannāgatena hutvā gilānesu upaṭṭhaheyyāti attho. Iminā sabbehipi
analyzed: evam vutta pañcaṅga samannāgatena hutvā gilānesu upaṭṭhaheyya ati atthaḥ iminā sabbehi pi

original: ācaritabbaṃ gilānavattaṃ upadisati. Vuṭṭhānanti gelaññā vuṭṭhitaṃ. Āgameti āgameyya,
analyzed: ācaritabbam gilāna vattam upadisati vuṭṭhānam ti gelaññā vuṭṭhitam āgameti āgameyya

original: olokeyyāti attho. Upajjhācariyehi ca saddhivihārikaantevāsikesu yadi te gilānā honti,
analyzed: olokeyya ati atthaḥ upajjhā cariyehi ca saddhivihārika antevāsikesu yadi te gilānāḥ honti

original: ādito paṭṭhāya cīvare rajanapariyosānañca arativinodanādikañca vattaṃ, agilānesu
analyzed: āditas paṭṭhāya cīvare rajana pariyosānam ca a rati vinodana ādikam ca vattam a gilānesu

original: pana uddesaparipucchā ovādānusāsaniyā anuggahopattacīvarādidānañcāti sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: pana uddesa paripucchā ovāda anusāsaniyā anuggaha upatta cīvara ādi dānam ca ati sabbam kātabbam

original: Teneva heṭṭhā vuttaṃ “tasmā ācariyenāpi tesu sammā vattitabbaṃ, upajjhāyena saddhivihārikesu
analyzed: tena iva heṭṭhā vuttam tasmai ācariyena api tesu sammā vattitabbam upajjhāyena saddhivihārikesu

original: vattabbameva natthī”ti.
analyzed: vattabbam eva natthi iti

original: Upajjhācariyavattaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
16. Vaccapassāvaṭṭhānikaniddesavaṇṇanā
156. Vaccapassāvaṭṭhānikanti ṭhānamhi ṭhāne vā bhavaṃ vaccapassāvaṭṭhānikaṃ. Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ
analyzed: vacca passāvaṭṭhānikanti ṭhānamhi ṭhāne vā bhavam vacca passāvaṭṭhānikam yathāvuḍḍham

original: vaccaṃ na kareyyāti sambandho. Ye ye vuḍḍhā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, āgatappaṭipāṭiṃ hitvā vuḍḍhappaṭipāṭiyāti
analyzed: vaccam na kareyya ati sambandhaḥ ye ye vuḍḍhāḥ yathāvuḍḍham āgata paṭipāṭim hitvā vuḍḍha ppaṭipāṭiyā ati

original: attho. Vaccanti upalakkhaṇamattaṃ, passāvañca nahānañca na kareyyāti adhippāyo. Tadeva
analyzed: atthaḥ vaccanti upalakkhaṇa mattam passāvam ca nahānam ca na kareyya ati adhippāyaḥ tat eva

original: samattheti “yātānupubbiyā”tiādinā. Yātānupubbiyāti yātānaṃ gatānaṃ anupubbi anukkamo
analyzed: samatthā iti yāta anupubbiyā ati ādinā yātānam gatānam anupubbi anukkamaḥ

original: yātānupubbi, tāya. Vacca…pe… titthañcāti etaṃ tayaṃ labbhatīti attho, bhikkhunāti viññāyati.
analyzed: tāya vaccape tittham ca ati etam tayam labbhati iti atthaḥ bhikkhunā ati viññāyati

original: 157. Ubbhajitvā ca sahasā ca no paviseyyāti sambandho. Ubbhajitvāti cīvaraṃ dūratova ukkhipitvā. Sahasāti sīghaṃ. Ukkāsitvā paviseyyāti yojanā.
analyzed: ubbhajitvā ca sahasā ca no paviseyya ati sambandhaḥ ubbhajitvā ati cīvaram dūratas va ukkhipitvā sahasā ati sīgham ukkāsitvā paviseyya ati yojanā

original: 158. Vaccapassāvadoṇīnaṃ bahīti sambandho. Ubhayanti vaccampi passāvampi.
analyzed: vacca passāva doṇīnam bahi iti sambandhaḥ ubhayanti vaccam pi passāvam pi

original: 159. Kūpeti vaccāvāṭe. Kaṭṭhanti avalekhanakaṭṭhaṃ. Pharusenāti kharena avalekhanakaṭṭhena.
analyzed: kūpa iti vaccā vāṭe kaṭṭhanti avalekhana kaṭṭham pharusena ati kharena avalekhana kaṭṭhena

original: Uhatañcāpīti attanā vā parena vā uhatañcāpi vaccamakkhitañcāpīti attho. Dhovayeti
analyzed: uhatam ca api iti attanā vā parena vā uhatam ca api vaccamakkhitam ca api iti atthaḥ dhovaya iti

original: sati udake, udake asati kaṭṭhenapi sodheyya.
analyzed: sati udake udake asati kaṭṭhena api

original: 160. Na nikkhameti na nikkhameyya. Capu capūti anukaraṇaṃ, vicchāyaṃ dvitte capu
analyzed: na nikkhameti na nikkhameyya capu capu iti anukaraṇam vicchāyam dvitte capu

original: capu katvāti kiriyāvisesanaṃ. Nācameyyāti na dhoveyya. Sati pana udake ācamitabbaṃ,
analyzed: katvā iti kiriyā visesanam na ācameyya ati na dhoveyya sati pana udake ācamitabbam

original: asati yena kenaci puñchitvā gantabbaṃ, sabbasādhāraṇaṭṭhāne ca ācamanakumbhiyā udakaṃ
analyzed: asati yena kenacid puñchitvā gantabbam sabba sādhāraṇa ṭṭhāne ca ācamana kumbhiyā udakam

original: na sesetabbaṃ. Uklāpanti kacavaraṃ. Visodhayeti vihārasodhane viya vaccapassāvakuṭiyo,
analyzed: na sesetabbam kaca varam visodhayeti vihāra sodhane viya vacca passāva kuṭiyo

original: pariveṇakoṭṭhake ca sammajjeyya. Sabbattheva ca pana vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: pariveṇa koṭṭhake ca sammajjeyya sabbattha iva ca pana vatta bhede dukkaṭam

original: Vaccapassāvaṭṭhānikaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vacca passāvaṭṭhānika niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 17. Āpucchakaraṇaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: āpucchakaraṇa niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 161. Āpucchakaraṇanti āpucchāya karaṇaṃ. Anajjhiṭṭhovāti anāṇattova, ayācito eva
analyzed: āpuccha karaṇam ti āpucchāya karaṇam an ajjhiṭṭhaḥ uva ati an āṇattaḥ uva a yācitaḥ eva

original: vā. Na ca vissajeti pucchitapañhaṃ na vissajjeyya ca, āpucchitvā vā yācito vā yathāvuttametaṃ
analyzed: vā na ca vissaja iti pucchita pañham na vissajjeyya ca āpucchitvā vā yācitaḥ vā yathāvuttam etam

original: kātuṃ labhatīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: kātum labhati iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 162. Āpucchitvā kathentassāti attano vuḍḍhaṃ āpucchitvā dhammādikaṃ bhāsantassa.
analyzed: āpucchitvā kathentassa ati attanaḥ vuḍḍham āpucchitvā dhamma ādikam bhāsantassa

original: Puna vuḍḍhatarāgameti puna aññassa vuḍḍhatarassa āgamane satīti attho. Punaāpucchanaṃ

original: tesaṃ visuṃ gahaṇe sati punaruttidoso āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati manussalomapariccāgavibhāvanappayojanasabbhāvato.
analyzed: tesam visum gahaṇe sati punarutti doso āpajjati iti na āpajjati manussa loma pariccāga vibhāvana payojana sabbhāvato

original: Nanu ca evampi dosoyeva, “manussalomamuṇṇāya”ntiādinā bhisigabbhānaṃ upari nīyamānattā
analyzed: nanu ca evam pi dosaḥ yā iva manussa lomamuṇṇāyanti ādinā bhisi gabbhānam upari nīyamāna ttā

original: gamyate bibbohanepi ayameva bhisigabbhoti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi na doso, gamyamānatthassa
analyzed: gamyate ayam eva bhisigabbhaḥ ti saccam tathā api na dosaḥ gamyamāna atthassa

original: saddassa payogaṃ pati kāmacāroti. Masūrake tūlavajjā anuññātāti vipariṇāmetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: saddassa payogam pati kāmacāraḥ ti masūrake tūla vajjā anuññātā ati vipariṇāmetvā sambandhitabbam

original: Masūrakaṃ nāma cammachavikā bhisīti vadanti.
analyzed: masūrakam nāma camma chavikā bhisī iti vadanti

original: 194. Uṇṇāyaṃ manussalomañca paṇṇe suddhaṃ tamālakañca pupphañca appaṭivekkhitaṃ āsanañceva
analyzed: uṇṇāyam manussa lomañca paṇṇe suddham tamālakañca pupphañca appaṭivekkhitam āsanañca iva

original: na labbhanti sambandho. Manussalomanti iminā na kevalaṃ idha eḷakalomameva uṇṇā,
analyzed: na sambandhaḥ iminā na kevalam idha eḷaka lomam eva uṇṇā

original: atha kho kappiyākappiyamaṃsajātīnaṃ pakkhicatuppadānaṃ lomampīti dasseti. Pupphanti
analyzed: atha kho kappiya akappiya maṃsa jātīnam pakkhi catuppadānam dasseti pupphanti

original: piyaṅgubakulapupphādi. Tamālakasaddeneva upacārato pattaṃ gahetvā “tamālaka”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: piyaṅgu bakula puppha ādi tamālaka saddena iva upacārataḥ pattam gahetvā tamālakam iti vuttam

original: Appaṭivekkhitanti anupaparikkhitaṃ. Kīdisaṃ pana paṭivekkhitabbaṃ, kīdisaṃ na paṭivekkhitabbanti?
analyzed: appaṭivekkhitanti anupaparikkhitam kīdisam pana paṭivekkhitabbam kīdisam na paṭivekkhitabbanti

original: Yaṃ vinicchayato viññātaṃ, taṃ na paṭivekkhitabbaṃ, itaraṃ hatthena parāmasantena paṭivekkhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: yam vinicchayataḥ viññātam tam na paṭivekkhitabbam itaram hatthena parāmasantena paṭivekkhitabbam

original: Akappiyasayananiddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: akappiya sayana niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 26. Samānāsanikaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: samānāsanika niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 195. Tivassantaramekamāsanaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anuññātanti sambandho. Tattha ekasmiṃ āsane
analyzed: ti vassa antaram ekam āsanam bhikkhūnam anuññātam ti sambandhaḥ tattha ekasmin āsane

original: mañcādike dvinnaṃ āsanaṃ nisīdanaṃ ekamāsanaṃ. Ma-kāro sandhijo. Kīdisanti āha “tivassantara”nti.
analyzed: mañca ādike dvinnam āsanam nisīdanam ekam āsanam makāraḥ sandhi jaḥ āha ti vassantaranti

original: Tiṇṇaṃ vassānamantarametassāti tivassantaro, dvīhi vassehi mahantataro vā daharataro
analyzed: tiṇṇam vassānam antaram etassa ati ti vassantaraḥ dvīhi vassehi mahantataraḥ vā daharataraḥ

original: vā bhikkhu, so assa atthīti tivassantaraṃ, tivassantaravantanti attho. Yo pana ekena
analyzed: vā bhikkhu so assa atthi iti ti vassa antaram ti vassa antaravantanti atthaḥ yaḥ pana ekena

original: vassena mahantataro vā daharataro vā ekavassoyeva vā, tabbantatāya vattabbameva natthi.
analyzed: vassena mahantataraḥ vā daharataraḥ vā vā tabbantatāya vattabbam eva natthi

original: Atha vā tivassantaranti karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ, tivassantarena saddhinti attho.
analyzed: atha vā ti vassa antaranti karaṇa tthe upayoga vacanam ti vassa antarena saddhinti attho

original: Tameva samattheti “sattavasse”ccādinā.
analyzed: tam eva samattha iti

original: 196. Muni anuññāsīti sambandho. Sabbehevāti samānāsanikaasamānāsanikehi sabbeheva saddhiṃ.
analyzed: muni anuññāsi iti sambandhaḥ sabbehi iva ati samānāsanika asamānāsanikehi sabbehi iva saddhim

original: 197. Dīghāsanaṃ dasseti “anta”ntiādinā. Yaṃ tiṇṇaṃ nisīdituṃ pahoti, taṃ antaṃ dīghāsananti
analyzed: dīghāsanam dasseti anta nti ādinā yam tiṇṇam nisīditum pahoti tam antam dīghāsana nti

original: sambandho. Antanti pacchimaṃ. Adīghāsane pana samānāsanikā nisīdituṃ labbhantīti
analyzed: sambandho pacchimam a dīgha āsane pana samānāsanikāḥ nisīditum labbhanti iti

original: dassento “mañcake”tiādimāha. Sabbattha ayathākaraṇato dukkaṭanti.
analyzed: dassentaḥ mañcaka iti ādim āha sabbattha a yathā karaṇataḥ dukkaṭa nti

original: Samānāsanikaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: samānāsanika niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 27. Asaṃvāsaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: asaṃvāsa niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 198. Ukkhittoti kammanānāsaṃvāsakasaṅkhāto āpattiyā adassane, appaṭikamme, pāpikāya
analyzed: ukkhittaḥ ti kamma nānā saṃvāsaka saṅkhātaḥ āpattiyāḥ adassane appaṭikamme pāpikāya

original: diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittako. Anupasampannoti sikkhamānasāmaṇerasāmaṇerisikkhāpaccakkhātasaṅkhāto
analyzed: diṭṭhiyāḥ appaṭinissagge ukkhittakaḥ an upasampannaḥ ti sikkhamāna sāmaṇera sāmaṇeri sikkhā paccakkhāta saṅkhāto

original: anupasampanno. Chinnamūlakoti antimavatthuajjhāpanno. Ukkhittakesu “dhammavādino
analyzed: anupasampannaḥ chinnamūlako ti antima vatthu ajjhāpanno ukkhittakesu dhammavādino

original: ete”ti uppannāya laddhiyā nānābhūto saṃvāso etassāti nānāsaṃvāso, ukkhittānuvattakasaṅkhāto
analyzed: ete iti uppannāya laddhiyā nānābhūtaḥ saṃvāsaḥ etassa ati nānā saṃvāsaḥ ukkhitta anuvattaka saṅkhāto

original: laddhinānāsaṃvāsako. Sīmato niggatā nissīmā, sīmantarikā bahisīmā ca, tattha hatthapāse
analyzed: laddhi nānā saṃvāsako sīmataḥ niggatā nissīmā sīmantarikā bahi sīmā ca tattha hattha pāse

original: cepi ṭhito, sīmānānāsaṃvāsako nissīmaṭṭhito. Vehāyase ākāse ṭhito vehāyasaṇṭhito
analyzed: cepi ṭhitaḥ sīmā nānā saṃvāsakaḥ nissīma ṭhitaḥ vehāyase ākāse ṭhitaḥ vehāyasa ṭhitaḥ

original: bindāgamena. Tattha “nānāsaṃvāso cā”tiādinā samāhāradvandepi kvaci napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ
analyzed: binda āgamena tattha nānā saṃvāso ca ati ādinā samāhāra dvande pi kvaci napuṃsaka liṅgam

original: byabhicaratīti napuṃsakattābhāvo yathā “maggāmaggo”ti. Ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti
analyzed: byabhicarati iti napuṃsaka ttā abhāvaḥ yathā maggāmaggo ti eka kammam eka uddeso samasikkhata ati

original: ayaṃ tividhopi saṃvāso nāma. So yesaṃ natthi, te asaṃvāsā. Ete hatthapāsato bahikaraṇavasena
analyzed: ayam tividhaḥ api saṃvāsaḥ nāma saḥ yesam natthi te asaṃvāsāḥ ete hattha pāsataḥ bahikaraṇa vasena

original: vajjetabbā. Etesu hi tividhe ukkhittake sati uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ karontassa pācittiyaṃ, itaresu dukkaṭanti.
analyzed: vajjetabbā etesu hi tividhe ukkhittake sati uposatha ādikam kammam karontassa pācittiyam itaresu dukkaṭam ti

original: Asaṃvāsaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: asaṃvāsa niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 28. Kammaniddesavaṇṇanā
199. Vaggena adhammakammañca samaggena adhammakammañca vaggena dhammakammañca samaggena
analyzed: vaggena adhamma kammañca samaggena adhamma kammañca vaggena dhamma kammañca samaggena

original: dhammakammañcāti cattāri kammāni hontīti seso. Tattha vaggena adhammakammanti vaggena
analyzed: dhamma kamman ca ati cattāri kammāni honti iti sesaḥ tattha vaggena adhamma kamman ti vaggena

original: saṅghena karaṇīyaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Vaggoti ca samūho vuccati,
analyzed: saṅghena karaṇīyam adhamma kammam esa nayo sabbattha vaggo ti ca samūhaḥ vuccati

original: so ca catuvaggādikaraṇīyādīsu yāvatikānaṃ kammappattānaṃ asammukhībhāvena, chandārahānaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ca catuvagga ādi karaṇīya ādīsu yāvatikānam kamma ppattānam a sammukhībhāvena chanda arahānam

original: chandānāharaṇena, sammukhībhūtānañca paṭikkosanena, tesu ekenāpi vā idha adhippeto.
analyzed: chanda anāharaṇena sammukhībhūtānañca paṭikkosanena tesu ekena api vā idha adhippetaḥ

original: Adhammakammanti ettha pana dhammo nāma “uttidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya uttiyā
analyzed: adhamma kammanti ettha pana dhammaḥ nāma utti dutiye ce bhikkhave kamme ekāya uttiyā

original: kammaṃ karoti, na ca kammavācaṃ anussāveti, adhammakamma”ntiādinā ekāyeva ñattiyā,
analyzed: kammam karoti na ca kamma vācam anussāveti adhamma kamma nti ādinā ekāya iva ñattiyā

original: tathā dvīhi ñattīhi ekāyeva vā kammavācāya, tathā dvīhi kammavācāhīti āgatāya ca
analyzed: tathā dvīhi ñattīhi ekāya iva vā kamma vācāya tathā dvīhi kamma vācāhi iti āgatāya ca

original: tathā hāpanaaññathākaraṇabhāvena ñattikammaṃ ṭhapetvā ñatticatutthe ca kamme āgatāya
analyzed: tathā hāpana aññathākaraṇa bhāvena ñatti kammam ṭhapetvā ñatti catutthe ca kamme āgatāya

original: ca akammārahassa tajjanīyapabbājanīyapaṭisāraṇīyaniyassatividhaukkhepanīyānaṃ sattannaṃ
analyzed: ca a kammārahassa tajjanīya pabbājanīya paṭisāraṇīya niyassati vidhau khepanīyānam

original: kammānaṃ karaṇavasena, kammārahassa ca virādhetvā karaṇavasena āgatāya ca pāḷiyā
analyzed: kammānam karaṇa vasena ca virādhetvā karaṇa vasena āgatāya ca pāḷiyā

original: viparītā ca pāḷi, upasampadādikammavasena āgatā ca pāḷi, sammukhāvinayasativinayaamūḷhavinayapaṭiññākaraṇayebhuyyasikātassapāpi-
analyzed: viparītā ca pāḷi upasampad ādi kamma vasena āgatā ca pāḷi

original: yasikātiṇavatthārakasaṅkhātānaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ yathālābhakaraṇavasena āgatā ca
analyzed: yasikā tiṇavatthāraka saṅkhātānam kammānam yathā lābha karaṇa vasena āgatā ca

original: pāḷi, tena karaṇīyaṃ apalokanañattiñattidutiyañatticatutthasaṅkhātaṃ catubbidhaṃ
analyzed: tena karaṇīyam apalokana ñatti ñatti dutiya ñatti catuttha saṅkhātam catubbidham

original: kammaṃ dhammakammaṃ, tappaṭipakkhaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Tabbipariyāyena samaggo dhammakammañca
analyzed: kammam dhamma kammam tad paṭipakkham adhamma kammam tad vipariyāyena samaggaḥ dhamma kammañca

original: veditabbaṃ. Dhammo yathāvuttā pāḷi assa atthi, dhammena kataṃ vāti dhammikaṃ. Tabbiparītaṃ
analyzed: veditabbam dhammaḥ yathā vuttā pāḷi assa atthi dhammena katam vā ati dhammikam tad biparītam

original: adhammikaṃ. Catutthaṃyevāti tesu catūsu kammesu catunnaṃ pūraṇaṃ samaggena dhammikaṃ.
analyzed: adhammikam catuttham yeva ati tesu catūsu kammesu catunnam pūraṇam samaggena dhammikam

original: Sesakammānaṃ bhāvena bhikkhunā dukkaṭassa bhavanaṃ lakkhīyatīti sesakammesūti bhāvalakkhaṇe
analyzed: sesa kammānam bhāvena bhikkhunā dukkaṭassa bhavanam lakkhīyati iti sesa kammesu iti bhāva lakkhaṇe

original: sattamī. Dukkaṭanti kuppānaṃ adhammakammavaggakammānaṃ katattā dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: sattamī dukkaṭa nti kuppānam adhamma kamma vagga kammānam katattā dukkaṭaṃ

original: 200. Idāni yadidaṃ samaggena dhammikaṃ nāma, taṃ yehi saṅghehi kātabbaṃ, tesaṃ pabhedaṃ
analyzed: idāni yat idam samaggena dhammikam nāma tat yehi saṅghehi kātabbam tesam pabhedam

original: dassetuṃ “catuvaggo”tiādimāha. Catvādīnaṃ saṅkhyeyavuttittā catunnaṃ vaggotiādinā
analyzed: dassetum catu vagga iti ādim āha catu ādīnam catunnam vagga iti ādinā

original: viggaho. Dasavīsativaggikoti dasannaṃ vīsatiyā ca vaggabhedavasena dasavīsatīnaṃ
analyzed: viggahaḥ dasavīsativaggiko ti dasannam vīsatiyā ca vagga bheda vasena dasavīsatīnam

original: vaggoti viggaho, ṇiko sakatthe. Vīsatiyā vaggo, atirekena sahito vīsativaggoti viggaho.
analyzed: vaggaḥ iti viggahaḥ saka atthe vīsatiyā vaggaḥ atirekena sahitaḥ vīsati vaggaḥ iti viggahaḥ

original: 201-2. Pañcannaṃ kammānaṃ niyameti “catū”tiādinā. Abbhānaṃ upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ
analyzed: pañca annam kammānam niyameti catu uti ādinā upasampadam pavāraṇam

original: ṭhapetvā catuvaggo cātiādinā yojetvā sabbakammesu kammappattoti dīpitoti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā catu vaggo ca ati ādinā yojetvā sabba kammesu kamma ppatto ti dīpitaḥ iti yojetabbam

original: Tattha tattha ca-saddo catuvaggādayo kammapattikiriyāyaṃ samuccinoti. Idha pana sabba-saddo
analyzed: tattha tattha casaddo catuvagga ādayo kamma patti kiriyā ayam samuccinoti idha pana sabba saddo

original: abbhānādīnaṃ kesañci ṭhapitattā padesasabbe gayhati. Kammapattoti kammassa patto
analyzed: abbhāna ādīnam ṭhapita ttā padesa sabbe gayhati kamma patto ti kammassa patto

original: yutto anurūpo. Itaroti vīsativaggo atirekavīsativaggo. Sabbakammesūti ettha pana
analyzed: yuttaḥ anurūpaḥ itaro ti vīsati vaggo atireka vīsati vaggo sabba kammesu iti ettha pana

original: sabba-saddo sabbasabbe. Nanu ca vīsativaggassa kammappattabhāvesati atirekavīsativaggassa
analyzed: sabba saddaḥ sabba sabbe nanu ca vīsati vaggassa atireka vīsati vaggassa

original: pagevāti viññāyati. Tathā sati so kasmā vuttoti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi so catuvaggādinā
analyzed: pageva ati viññāyati tathā sati so kasmā vuttaḥ iti saccam tathā api so catu vagga ādinā

original: saṅghena kattabbakammaṃ ūnakatarena na vaṭṭati, atirekena pana vaṭṭatīti ñāpanatthaṃ vutto.
analyzed: saṅghena kattabba kammam ūnakatarena na vaṭṭati atirekena pana vaṭṭati iti ñāpana attham vuttaḥ

original: 203. Idāni catuvaggādikena chandāharaṇena pūretabboti dasseti “catū”tiādinā. Pārājikādibhāvamanāpannattā
analyzed: idāni catu vagga ādikena chanda āharaṇena pūretabbaḥ iti dassa iti catu uti ādinā pārājika ādi bhāvam an āpanna ttā

original: pakatiyā sabhāveneva ṭhito attā yesaṃ, pakato vā tatoyeva kammesu avigato attā yesaṃ
analyzed: pakatiyā sabhāvena iva ṭhitaḥ attā yesam pakataḥ vā kammesu a vigataḥ attā yesam

original: teti pakatattakā, pārājikaukkhittakaladdhinānāsaṃvāsakehi aññe. Pareti ekasīmaṭṭhā
analyzed: te iti pārājika aukkhittaka laddhi nānā saṃvāsakehi aññe pare ti eka sīmaṭṭhā

original: tādisāyeva aññe. Sesepīti avasese pañcavaggādikaraṇīyepi.
analyzed: tādisāya iva aññe sese pi iti avasese pañcavagga ādi karaṇīye pi

original: 204. Idāni vatthuñattianussāvanasīmādivipattito, kammavipattīsu parisato ca paṭikkosato
analyzed: idāni vatthu ñatti anussāvana sīmā ādi vipattitaḥ kamma vipattīsu parisataḥ ca paṭikkosataḥ

original: ca kammassa kuppākuppabhāvaṃ tattha ca āpattiādiṃ dassetuṃ “catū”tiādi māha. Catuvaggādikattabbaṃ
analyzed: ca kammassa kuppākuppa bhāvam tattha ca āpatti ādim dassetum catu uti ādi mā āha catu vagga ādi kattabbam

original: asaṃvāsagaṇapūraṃ vā kammārahagaṇapūraṃ vā kammañca garukaṭṭhagaṇapūraṃ vā parivāsādikammañcāti
analyzed: a saṃvāsa gaṇa pūram vā kamma āraha gaṇa pūram vā kammañca garu kaṭṭha gaṇa pūram vā parivāsa ādi kammañca ati

original: yojanā. Ettha ca kammāraho garukaṭṭhato añño, nikkhittavatto pana garukaṭṭho gaṇapūrako
analyzed: yojanā ettha ca kammārahaḥ garu kaṭṭhato aññaḥ nikkhitta vattaḥ pana garu kaṭṭhaḥ gaṇa pūrako

original: hotiyeva. Katanti catuvaggādinā kataṃ.
analyzed: catuvagga ādinā katam

original: 205. Vāreyyāti antarāye asati antamaso ekopi vāreyyāti attho. Antarāyeti pāpehi kariyamāne
analyzed: vāreyya ati antarāye asati antamasaḥ ekaḥ api vāreyya ati attho antarāya iti pāpehi kariyamāne

original: jīvitabrahmacariyantarāye sati. Anantarāyikā ce na vārenti, dukkaṭaṃ. Diṭṭhāvinti
analyzed: jīvita brahmacariya antarāye sati ce na vārenti dukkaṭam

original: attano attano diṭṭhiṃ laddhiṃ “adhammakammaṃ idaṃ, na metaṃ khamatī”ti aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ diṭṭhim laddhim adhamma kammaṃ idam na mā etam khamati iti aññamaññam

original: āvi kareyyunti seso. Ekodhiṭṭhānanti eko bhikkhu “na metaṃ khamatī”ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: āvi kareyyunti sesaḥ eka udhiṭṭhānam ti ekaḥ bhikkhu na mā etam khamati iti adhiṭṭhānam

original: kareyyāti seso. Tatodhikāti tīhi adhikā. Te pana saṅghattā pahonti attano kammaṃ nittharituṃ.
analyzed: kareyya ati sesaḥ tatodhikā ati tīhi adhikā te pana saṅghattā pahonti attanaḥ kammam nittharitum

original: 206. Khittacitto nāma ummattako. Dukhaṭṭitoti vedanaṭṭo. Na rūhatīti gayhattaṃ na rohatīti attho.
analyzed: khittacittaḥ nāma ummattakaḥ dukhaṭṭito ti vedanaṭṭaḥ na rūhati iti na rohati iti attho

original: 207. Antamaso anantarassāpi ārocentassa pakata…pe… bhikkhunoti sambandho. Ekasīmāyaṃ
analyzed: antamasaḥ anantarassa api ārocentassa pakatape bhikkhuno ti sambandhaḥ eka sīmāyam

original: tiṭṭhatīti ekasīmaṭṭho. Samo saṃvāso assāti samasaṃvāso. Ekasīmaṭṭho ca so samasaṃvāso

analyzed: apabhuttā iti attho patita ṭṭhāne iya iva upādānam da tvā aggim kātum vaṭṭati sukkha khāṇuka sukkha rukkha ādīsu

original: ca aggiṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana “pathaviṃ appattameva nibbāpetvā gamissāmī”ti
analyzed: ca aggim dātum na vaṭṭati sace pana pathavim appattam eva nibbāpetvā gamissāmi iti

original: deti, vaṭṭati, pacchā nibbāpetuṃ na sakkoti, avisayattā anāpatti. “Bhūmiyaṃ pātehī”ti
analyzed: deti vaṭṭati pacchā nibbāpetum na sakkoti a visaya ttā anāpatti bhūmiyam pātehi iti

original: evampi vattuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
analyzed: evam pi vattum na vaṭṭati iti

original: Pathavīniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pathavī niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 35. Parikkhāraniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: parikkhāra niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 259-60. Chatte anto bahi ca pañcavaṇṇehi suttehi sibbituñca paṇṇe girikūṭaaḍḍhacandādiṃ
analyzed: chatte antar bahi ca pañca vaṇṇehi suttehi sibbitum ca paṇṇe girikūṭa aḍḍhacanda ādim

original: chindituñca na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Chatteti tālapaṇṇe chatte. Girikūṭaṃ nāma makaradantakaṃ,
analyzed: chinditum ca na vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ chattā iti tāla paṇṇe chatte girikūṭam nāma makara dantakam

original: ādi-saddena tādisaṃ aññaṃ vikārarūpaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Ghaṭakanti gehatthambhesu viya
analyzed: ādi saddena tādisam aññam vikāra rūpam saṅgahitam ghaṭakanti geha thambhesu viya

original: kayiramānaṃ ghaṭakaṃ. Daṇḍeti chattadaṇḍe. Lekhāti tahiṃ tahiṃ dinnā lekhā. Sādisanti
analyzed: kayiramānam ghaṭakam daṇḍeti chatta daṇḍe lekhā ati tahim tahim dinnā lekhā

original: dīghena niddiṭṭhaṃ. Bundamhi mūle.
analyzed: dīghena niddiṭṭham mūle

original: 261. Thiratthaṃ chatte ekavaṇṇena sibbituṃ vā pañjaraṃ vinandhituṃ vā vaṭṭatīti sambandho.
analyzed: thirattham chatte eka vaṇṇena sibbitum vā pañjaram vinandhitum vā vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Sibbitunti anto bahi ca sibbituṃ. Ekavaṇṇenāti nīlādinā ekavaṇṇena. Pañjaranti chattadaṇḍagāhakasalākapañjaraṃ.
analyzed: sibbitum ti antar bahi ca sibbitum eka vaṇṇena ati nīla ādinā eka vaṇṇena pañjaram ti chatta daṇḍa gāhaka salāka pañjaram

original: Thiratthanti iminā na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāyāti dasseti. Bandhituṃ daṇḍe lekhā vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: thirattham ti iminā na vaṇṇam aṭṭha atthāya ati dasseti bandhitum daṇḍe lekhā vaṭṭati iti

original: sambandho. Bandhitunti vātappahārena acalanatthaṃ chattamaṇḍalikaṃ rajjukehi gahetvā
analyzed: sambandhaḥ bandhitunti vāta ppahārena acalana attham chattamaṇḍalikam rajjukehi gahetvā

original: bandhanatthāya. Lekhāvāti valayamiva ukkiritvā katā lekhā eva. Vaṭṭatīti yadipi na
analyzed: bandhana tthāya lekhā vāti valayam iva ukkiritvā katā lekhā eva vaṭṭati iti yadi pi na

original: bandhati, rajjukehi bandhituṃ yuttaṭṭhānattā vaṭṭati.
analyzed: bandhati rajjukehi bandhitum yutta ṭṭhāna ttā vaṭṭati

original: 262. Cīvare ante vāpi paṭṭamukhe vāpi veṇipi vā saṅkhalikāpi vā aññaṃ sūcivikāraṃ
analyzed: cīvare ante vā api paṭṭa mukhe vā api veṇipi vā saṅkhalikā api vā aññam sūci vikāram

original: vā pāḷikaṇṇikaādikaṃ kappabinduvikārampi vā na ca kappatīti sambandho. Anteti cīvarapariyante,
analyzed: vā pāḷi kaṇṇika ādikam kappa bindu vikāram pi vā na ca kappati iti sambandhaḥ ante iti cīvara pariyante

original: anuvāteti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭṭamukheti paṭṭakoṭiyaṃ, dvinnaṃ paṭṭānaṃ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: anuvātā iti vuttam hoti paṭṭa mukhā iti paṭṭa koṭiyam dvinnam paṭṭānam saṅghaṭita ṭṭhānam

original: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Veṇīti varakasīsākārena sibbanaṃ. Saṅkhalikāti biḷālabandhanākārena
analyzed: sandhāya itam vuttam veṇī iti varaka sīsa ākārena sibbanam saṅkhalikā ati biḷāla bandhana ākārena

original: sibbanaṃ. Aññaṃ sūcivikāraṃ vāti cīvaramaṇḍanatthāya kayiramānaṃ aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci
analyzed: sibbanam aññam sūci vikāram vāti cīvara maṇḍana tthāya aññam yam kiñci

original: sūcikammavikāraṃ vā. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “satapadisadisaṃ aññaṃ vā sūcivikāraṃ na kappatī”ti
analyzed: sūci kamma vikāram vā ṭīkāyam pana aññam vā sūci vikāram na kappati iti

original: sāmaññena vuttaṃ. “Cīvaramaṇḍanatthāya nānāsuttakehi satapadisadisaṃ sibbantā āgantukapaṭṭaṃ
analyzed: sāmaññena vuttam cīvara maṇḍana thāya nānā suttakehi sata padi sadisam sibbantāḥ āgantuka paṭṭam

original: ṭhapenti, aññampi yaṃ kiñci sūcikammavikāraṃ karonti, sabbaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapenti aññam pi yam kiñci sūci kamma vikāram karonti sabbam na vaṭṭati iti aṭṭhakathāyam

original: vuttattā pana nānāvaṇṇehi vā hotu, ekavaṇṇena vā hotu, cīvaramaṇḍanatthāya saṃsibbantānaṃ
analyzed: vutta ttā pana nānā vaṇṇehi vā hotu eka vaṇṇena vā hotu cīvara maṇḍana atthāya saṃsibbantānam

original: sibbituṃ vaṭṭatīti amhākaṃ khanti. Pāḷi-saddena, kaṇṇika-saddena ca kappa-saddalopena

original: vā upacārena vā pāḷikappādayova gahitā. Pāḷi ca kaṇṇikā ca pāḷikaṇṇikāyo, tā ādi

original: yassa aññassa tādisassāti viggaho. Tattha nīlāvaḷiādisaṇṭhānāya bindupantiyā yathā
analyzed: yassa aññassa tādisassa ati viggahaḥ tattha nīla āvaḷi ādi saṇṭhānāya bindu pantiyā yathā

original: sobhati, tathā kayiramāno pāḷikappo. Tatheva bindusamūhe katthaci dassetvā kayiramāno kaṇṇikakappo.
analyzed: sobhati tathā kayiramāno pāḷi kappo tathā iva bindu samūhe katthaci dassetvā kayiramāno kaṇṇika kappo

original: 263. Gaṇṭhipāsakapaṭṭāti gaṇṭhino ca pāsakassa ca patiṭṭhānaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbā paṭṭā.
analyzed: gaṇṭhi pāsaka paṭṭā ti gaṇṭhino ca pāsakassa ca patiṭṭhāna ṭhāne ṭhapetabbā paṭṭā

analyzed: vaṭṭati iti ettha gaṇṭhi pāsakā ati katvā vaṭṭanti iti atthataḥ vacanam vipallāsetvā

original: gaṇṭhipāsakapaṭṭesu.
analyzed: gaṇṭhi pāsaka paṭṭesu

original: 264. Koṇasuttāti napuṃsakaniddeso, gaṇṭhipāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇehi nīhaṭasuttakoṭiyo.
analyzed: koṇa suttā ti napuṃsaka niddesaḥ gaṇṭhi pāsaka paṭṭānam koṇehi nīhaṭa sutta koṭiyaḥ

original: Pīḷakāti tāniyeva nivattetvā pīḷakākārena katāni. Duviññeyyāvāti tesaṃ antesu ekavāraṃ

analyzed: gaṇṭhikaraṇena vā puna nivattetvā sibbanena vā du viññeyyā eva gandham telam vā āti

original: gandhaṃ vā telaṃ vā. Kañcikapiṭṭhakhalikaādīnipi vaṭṭanti.
analyzed: gandham vā telam vā kañcika piṭṭha khalika ādīni pi vaṭṭanti

original: 265. Maṇināti masāragallādipāsāṇena. Na ca ghaṭṭeyyāti neva ghaṭṭeyya. Aññena vāti

analyzed: na ca ghaṃseyyāti pakkara janā kiraṇa doṇiyam ṭhapetvā bhūmiyam jaṇṇukāni nihantvā itas

original: cito ca āvijjhitvā neva ghaṃseyyāti attho.
analyzed: citaḥ ca āvijjhitvā na iva ghaṃseyya ati attho

analyzed: kaṇṇakoṇaka suttāni iti cīvara rajana kāle laggana atthāya anuvāte catūsu koṇesu

original: ca pāsakaṃ katvā bandhitāni suttāni, yāni “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kaṇṇasuttaka”nti
analyzed: ca pāsakam katvā bandhitāni suttāni yāni anujānāmi bhikkhave kaṇṇa suttakan ti

original: evaṃ anuññātāni. Kaṇṇasaṅkhātā koṇā kaṇṇakoṇakā, tesu suttāni. Gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭesu

analyzed: tesam chinditabba tā natthi kaṇṇa koṇaka suttānam chinditabba tāya vuttattā

original: ṭhapetvā lekhā na vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Chattavaṭṭiyanti chattassa mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ. Lekhāti
analyzed: ṭhapetvā lekhā na vaṭṭati iti yojanā chatta vaṭṭiyanti chattassa mukha vaṭṭiyam lekhā ati

original: upari vā heṭṭhā vā kucchiyaṃ vā aññā lekhā. Kuñcikāya ca pipphale ca maṇikā ca pīḷakā
analyzed: upari vā heṭṭhā vā kucchiyam vā aññā lekhā kuñcikāya ca pipphale ca maṇikā ca pīḷakā

analyzed: ca na vaṭṭanti iti sambandhaḥ maṇikā ati ekā vaṭṭamaṇi pīḷakā ati sāsapa mattikā mutta rāji sadisā

original: bahuvaṭṭalekhā. Daṇḍamhīti pipphaladaṇḍake.
analyzed: bahu vaṭṭa lekhāḥ pipphala daṇḍake

original: 268-9. Araṇiyaṃ mālādi ca pattamaṇḍale bhittikammañca na vaṭṭatīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: araṇiyam mālā ādi ca patta maṇḍale bhitti kammam ca na vaṭṭati iti sambandhitabbam

original: Araṇiyanti uttarāraṇi adharāraṇi araṇidhanukañca sāmaññena gahitaṃ. Pattamaṇḍaleti

original: tipusīsādimaye pattamaṇḍale. Ettha pana makaradaṇḍakaṃ vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhāti kattarayaṭṭhiyā

analyzed: heṭṭhā uddhanti tassāya iva upari

analyzed: sammuñjanimhi iti sammuñjaniyā liṅga vipallāsaḥ itthi rūpam pana vāritam

original: Sovaṇṇamayampīti suvaṇṇamayampi. Visāṇanāḷi nāma visāṇamayā nāḷi. Ettha pana avuttānipi

original: yāni kānici ārakaṇḍakadantakaṭṭhachedanapānīyaghaṭapānīyauḷuṅkacuṇṇabhājanādīni vuttānaṃ
analyzed: yāni kānici ārakaṇḍaka danta kaṭṭha chedana pānīya ghaṭa pānīya oḷuṅka cuṇṇa bhājana ādīni vuttānam

original: anulomānīti veditabbāni. Yo panettha vinayaññū tādisaṃ parikkhāraṃ disvā chindeyya
analyzed: anulomāni iti veditabbāni yaḥ pana ittha vinayaññū tādisam parikkhāram disvā chindeyya

original: vā chindāpeyya vā, anupavajjo soti veditabbanti.
analyzed: vā chindāpeyya vā anupavajjaḥ saḥ ti veditabbanti

original: Parikkhāraniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: parikkhāra niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 36. Bhesajjaniddesavaṇṇanā
274-5. Janassa bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ dātuṃ vattuñca na labbhatīti sambandhiyaṃ. Labbhatīti
analyzed: janassa bhesajjam kātum dātum vattum ca na labbhati iti sambandhiyam labbhati iti

original: ettha “bhikkhunā”ti kattā “bhesajja”nti vuttakammaṃ. Nanu ca kātunti bhāvasādhanattā
analyzed: ettha bhikkhunā ati kattā bhesajjanti vutta kammam nanu ca kātum ti bhāva sādhana ttā

original: tassa avuttakammenāpi bhavitabbaṃ bhāve vihitakitakappaccayānaṃ payoge kammakārakassāpi
analyzed: tassa a vutta kammena api bhavitabbam bhāve vihita kitaka paccayānam payoge kamma kārakassa api

original: icchitabbattāti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi padhānabhūtakammasattiyā abhidhāne sati appadhānakitakakiriyābhisambandhena
analyzed: icchitabba ttā ti saccam tathā api padhāna bhūta kamma sattiyāḥ abhidhāne sati appadhāna kitaka kiriyā abhisambandhena

original: guṇībhūtā kammasatti abhihitā viya viññāyati. Tathā ca vuttaṃ amhehi yogavinicchaye
analyzed: guṇībhūtā kamma satti abhihitā viya viññāyati tathā ca vuttam amhehi yoga vinicchaye

original: “padhānānuyāyitāya janavohārāya padhānasatyābhidhāne guṇasatti abhihitā viya pakāsatī”ti.
analyzed: padhāna anuyāyitāya jana vohārāya padhāna satya abhidhāne guṇa satti abhihitā viya pakāsati iti

original: Janassāti āgatāgatajanassa. Sahadhammīnañca pitūnañca tadupaṭṭhākabhikkhunissitabhaṇḍūnañca
analyzed: janassa ati āgata āgata janassa sahadhammīnam ca pitūnam ca tad upaṭṭhāka bhikkhu nissita bhaṇḍūnam ca

original: veyyāvaccakarassa ca bhikkhācariyaviññattisakehi bhesajjakaraṇaṃ labbhanti sambandho.
analyzed: veyyāvacca karassa ca bhikkhā cariya viññatti sakehi bhesajja karaṇam labbhanti sambandhaḥ

original: Tattha sahadhamminanti saha caritabbo dhammo sīlasaddhāpaññāsaṅkhāto sahadhammo,
analyzed: tattha sahadhamminan ti saha caritabbaḥ dhammaḥ sīla saddhā paññā saṅkhāto sahadhammo

original: so etesamatthīti sahadhammino, bhikkhu bhikkhunī sikkhamānā sāmaṇero sāmaṇerīti pañca,
analyzed: saḥ etesam atthi iti sahadhamminaḥ bhikkhu bhikkhunī sikkhamānā sāmaṇeraḥ sāmaṇerī iti pañca

original: tesaṃ. Pitā ca mātā ca pitaro ekasesanayena, ubhinnaṃ sāmaññaniddeso vā, tesaṃ. Bhikkhunissito
analyzed: tesam pitā ca mātā ca pitaraḥ eka sesa nayena ubhinnam sāmañña niddesaḥ vā tesam bhikkhu nissito

original: nāma yo vihāre sabbakammāni karonto bhikkhuṃ nissāya vasati. Bhaṇḍu nāma yo pabbajjāpekkho
analyzed: nāma yaḥ vihāre sabba kammāni karontaḥ bhikkhum nissāya vasati bhaṇḍu nāma yaḥ pabbajja apekkho

original: yāva pattacīvaraṃ paṭiyādiyati, tāva vihāre vasati, so paṇḍupalāso. Veyyāvaccakarassāti
analyzed: yāva patta cīvaram tāva vihāre vasati saḥ paṇḍu palāsaḥ

original: attano upaṭṭhākassa. Etesu pana mātāpitaro sace rajjepi ṭhitā paccāsīsanti, akātuṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ upaṭṭhākassa etesu pana mātā pitaro sace rajje pi ṭhitā a kātuṃ

original: na vaṭṭati. Mātaraṃ anāmasantena sabbaṃ parikammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Pitā pana sahatthena
analyzed: na vaṭṭati mātaram an āmasantena sabbam parikammam kātabbam pitā pana sahatthena

original: nahāpanasambāhanādīni katvā upaṭṭhātabbo.
analyzed: nahāpana sambāhana ādīni katvā upaṭṭhātabbaḥ

original: 276. Pitā ca mātā ca bhātā ca bhaginī cāti dvando pitā…pe… bhaginiyo. Mahanto ca
analyzed: pitā ca mātā ca bhātā ca bhaginī ca ati pitā ape bhaginiyaḥ ca

original: cūḷo ca, mahācūḷā ca te pitā…pe… bhaginiyo cāti kammadhārayo. Tā ādi yesanteti aññapadattho.
