original: Na akallakoti agilāno.
analyzed: na a kallakoti a gilānaḥ

original: 341. Hīnukkaṭṭhehi jātiādīhi ukkaṭṭhaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā ujuṃ vā aññāpadesena vā davā vade,
analyzed: hīna ukkaṭṭhehi jāti ādīhi ukkaṭṭham vā hīnam vā ujum vā añña apadesena vā davā vade

original: dubbhāsitanti sambandho. Jātiādīhīti jātināmagottakammasippaābādhaliṅgakilesaāpattiakkosehi.
analyzed: dubbhāsitam ti sambandhaḥ jāti ādīhi iti jāti nāma gotta kamma sippa ābādha liṅga kilesa āpatti akkosehi

original: Ukkaṭṭhanti jātyādīhiyeva ukkaṭṭhaṃ upasampannaṃ anupasampannaṃ vā. Davāti keḷihasādhippāyatāya.
analyzed: ukkaṭṭhanti ukkaṭṭham upasampannam anupasampannam vā davāti keḷi hasa adhippāyatāya

original: Ujuṃ vāti “caṇḍālosī”tiādinā nayena. Aññāpadesena vāti “santi idhekacce caṇḍālā”tiādinā nayena.
analyzed: ujum vāti caṇḍāla usi iti ādinā nayena añña apadesena vāti santi idha ekacce caṇḍāla ati ādinā nayena

original: 342. Dīghe nakheti maṃsappamāṇato. Dīghe keseti dvaṅgulato. Sacepi na dīghā, dumāsato
analyzed: dīghe nakha iti maṃsa ppamāṇataḥ dīghe kesā iti du aṅgulataḥ sace pi na dīghāḥ du māsataḥ

original: ekadivasampi atikkāmetuṃ na labhati. Dīghe nāsalometi nāsato bahi nikkhante. Vīsatimaṭṭhanti
analyzed: eka divasam pi atikkāmetum na labhati dīghe nāsalomā iti nāsataḥ bahi nikkhante vīsatim aṭṭhanti

original: vīsatiyā nakhānaṃ maṭṭhañca. Sambādheti ubhosu upakacchakesu, muttakaraṇe ca lomahāraṇañca
analyzed: vīsatiyā nakhānam maṭṭham ca sambādheti ubhosu upakacchakesu mutta karaṇe ca loma hāraṇañca

original: na labbhāti sambandhanīyaṃ. Na labbhāti ete maṭṭhādayo na labbhantīti attho, nipāto
analyzed: na labbhāti sambandhanīyam na labbhāti ete maṭṭha ādayaḥ na labbhanti iti atthaḥ nipātaḥ

original: vā labbhāti. Ābādhappaccayā pana sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vā labbhāti ābādha paccayā pana sambādhe lomam saṃharitum vaṭṭati

original: 343. Saṅghuddiṭṭhaṃ vā saṅghikaṃ vā sayanāsanaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ na bādheyyāti yojanā.
analyzed: saṅghuddiṭṭham vā saṅghikam vā sayanāsanam yathāvuḍḍham na bādheyyā iti yojanā

original: Saṅghassa uddiṭṭhaṃ saṅghuddiṭṭhaṃ, saṅghaṃ uddissa katanti adhippāyo. Yo yo vuḍḍho
analyzed: saṅghassa uddiṭṭham saṅgha uddiṭṭham saṅgham uddissa katanti adhippāyaḥ yaḥ yaḥ vuḍḍhaḥ

original: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, vuḍḍhappaṭipāṭiyāti attho. Na bādheyyāti na paṭibāheyya. Allapādā nāma
analyzed: yathāvuḍḍham vuḍḍha paṭipāṭiyā ati atthaḥ na bādheyya ati na paṭibāheyya allapādā nāma

original: yehi akkantaṭṭhāne udakaṃ paññāyati. Sayanāsananti mañcapīṭhādi, iminā paribhaṇḍakatā
analyzed: yehi akkanta ṭṭhāne udakam paññāyati sayanāsanam ti mañca pīṭha ādi iminā paribhaṇḍaka tā

original: bhūmītipi upalakkhitā. Sudhotapādakaṃ vāpi saupāhano tathevāti sambandho. Sudhotapādakanti
analyzed: upalakkhitā sudhā uta pādakam vā api sa upāhanaḥ tathā iva ati sambandhaḥ sudhā uta pādakam ti

original: dhotapādeheva akkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Dhotā pādā yassa akkamanassāti kiriyāvisesanasamāso.
analyzed: dhota pādehi iva akkamitabba ṭṭhānam dhotā pādāḥ yassa akkamanassa iti kiriyā visesana samāsaḥ

original: Yadi pana tattha nevāsikā adhotapādehipi vaḷañjenti, tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: yadi pana tattha nevāsikāḥ vaḷañjenti tathā iva vaḷañjetum vaṭṭati

original: Tathevāti paribhaṇḍakataṃ bhūmiṃ senāsanaṃ vā nakkameti attho.
analyzed: tathā iva ati paribhaṇḍakatam bhūmim senāsanam vā nakkameti attho

original: 344. Saṅghāṭiyāti adhiṭṭhitasaṅghāṭiyā. Pāde pariggahetvā āsanaṃ pallattho, pallatthaṃ
analyzed: saṅghāṭiyā ati adhiṭṭhita saṅghāṭiyā pāde pariggahetvā āsanam pallatthaḥ pallattham

original: karotīti pallatthātidhātussa pallattheti rūpaṃ. Vihārepi antaragharepi pallatthikāya
analyzed: karoti iti pallattha ati dhātussa pallattha iti rūpam vihāre pi antaraghare pi pallatthikāya

original: na nisīdeyyāti adhippāyo, parikammakataṃ bhittādinti yojanā. Parikammakatanti setavaṇṇena
analyzed: na nisīdeyya ati adhippāyaḥ parikamma katam bhitta ādin ti yojanā parikamma katam ti seta vaṇṇena

original: vā cittakammena vā kataparikammaṃ. Ādi-saddo dvāravātapānādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Na apassayeti
analyzed: vā cittakammena vā kata parikammam ādi saddaḥ dvāra vāta pāna ādim saṅgaṇhāti na apassayā iti

original: cīvarādinā appaṭicchādetvā apassayanaṃ na kareyya. No na ācameti neva na ācame, ācameyyāti
analyzed: cīvara ādinā a paṭicchādetvā apassayanam na kareyya no naḥ ācama iti na iva naḥ ācame ācameyya ati

original: attho. Dve paṭisedhā pakatiyatthaṃ gamentīti. Santeti iminā udake asante anāpattīti dīpeti.
analyzed: atthaḥ dve paṭisedhā pakatiya ttham gamenti iti santā iti iminā udake asante anāpatti iti dīpeti

original: 345. Akappiyasamādāneti bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ akappiye samādāne. Davāti nipāto,
analyzed: akappiya samādāne ti bhikkhūnam sāmaṇerānam akappiye samādāne davāti nipātaḥ

original: kīḷādhippāyenāti attho. Silāpavijjhaneti antamaso hatthayantenapi sakkharikāyapi
analyzed: kīḷā adhippāyena ati attho

original: khipane. Sabhāgāya desanāya āvikamme ca dukkaṭanti yojetabbaṃ. Sabhāgāyāti vatthuvasena
analyzed: khipane sabhāgāya desanāya āvikamme ca dukkaṭam ti yojetabbam sabhāgāya ati vatthu vasena

original: samāno bhāgo etissā āpattiyāti viggaho. Ca-saddo tādisiyā paṭiggahaṇamattaṃ samuccinoti.
analyzed: samānaḥ bhāgaḥ etissā āpattiyā iti viggahaḥ ca saddaḥ tādisiyā paṭiggahaṇa mattam samuccinoti

original: 346. Paṭissavo nāma “ubhopi mayaṃ idha vassaṃ vasissāma, ekato uddisāpemā”tiādipaṭijānanaṃ,
analyzed: paṭissavaḥ nāma ubho api mayam idha vassam vasissāma ekatas

original: tassa visaṃvādo pacchā akaraṇaṃ paṭissavavisaṃvādo, tasmiṃ, nimittatthe bhummaṃ.
analyzed: tassa visaṃvādaḥ pacchā akaraṇam paṭissava visaṃvādaḥ tasmin nimitta atthe bhummam

original: Suddhacittassāti kathanasamaye “karissāmī”ti evaṃ pavattacittassa. Itarassāti aññassa asuddhacittassa.
analyzed: suddha cittassa ati kathana samaye karissāmi iti evam pavatta cittassa itarassa ati aññassa asuddha cittassa

original: 347. Kicceti sukkhakaṭṭhādiggahaṇakicce sati eva porisaṃ purisappamāṇaṃ abhiruheyyāti sambandho. Āpadāsūti vāḷamigadassanādīsu.
analyzed: kicca iti sukkha kaṭṭha ādi gahaṇa kicce sati eva porisam purisa ppamāṇam abhiruheyya ati sambandhaḥ āpadāsu iti vāḷa miga dassana ādīsu

original: 348. Parissāvanaṃ vināti sambandho. Addhānanti heṭṭhimantena addhayojanasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: parissāvanam vinā iti sambandhaḥ addhānam ti heṭṭhimantena addha yojana saṅkhātam

original: addhānaṃ. Sace na hoti parissāvanaṃ vā dhammakaraṇo vā, saṅghāṭikaṇṇopi adhiṭṭhātabbo.
analyzed: addhānam sace na hoti parissāvanam vā dhamma karaṇaḥ vā saṅghāṭi kaṇṇaḥ api adhiṭṭhātabbo

original: Yācamānassāti parissāvanaṃ yācantassa.
analyzed: yācamānassa ati parissāvanam yācantassa

original: 349. Ābādhappaccayā aññatra sesaṅge ca attaghātane ca dukkaṭanti yojanā. Sesaṅgeti aṅgajātato kaṇṇanāsādiavasese avayavacchedane. Attaghātaneti āhārupacchedādinā attano māraṇe.
analyzed: ābādha ppaccayā aññatra sesaṅge ca atta ghātane ca dukkaṭa nti yojanā sesaṅge iti aṅga jātataḥ kaṇṇa nāsā ādi avasese avayava chedane atta ghātane iti āhāra upaccheda ādinā attanaḥ māraṇe

original: 350. Tūlikāya kayiramānaṃ itthipurisādikaṃ cittañca potthakañca kaṭṭhādīsu kayiramānaṃ
analyzed: tūlikāya kayiramānam itthi purisa ādikam cittam ca potthakam ca kaṭṭha ādīsu kayiramānam

original: cittapotthakāni, tāniyeva rūpānīti samāso. Jātakādīni pana parehi kārāpetuṃ labbhanti.
analyzed: citta potthakāni rūpāni iti samāsaḥ jātaka ādīni pana parehi labbhanti

original: Mālākammādīni sayampi kātuṃ labbhanti. Ārāmāraññagehesu bhuñjantaṃ na uṭṭhāpeyyāti
analyzed: mālā kamma ādīni sayam pi kātum labbhanti ārāma arañña gehesu bhuñjantam na uṭṭhāpeyya ati

original: yojetabbaṃ. Vihārasaṅkhāto ārāmo ca araññañca antaragharasaṅkhātaṃ gehañcāti dvando.
analyzed: yojetabbam vihāra saṅkhātaḥ ārāmaḥ ca araññam ca antara ghara saṅkhātam geham ca ati dvandaḥ

original: “Ārāma…pe… gehesū”ti vattabbe e-kārassa a-kārakaraṇena gāthābandhavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ārāma pe gehesu iti vattabbe ekārassa akāra karaṇena gāthābandha vasena vuttam

original: Okāse kate pana “pavisathā”ti vutte ca pavisitabbaṃ upanisīditabbañca.
analyzed: okāse kate pana pavisatha ati vutte ca pavisitabbam upanisīditabbam ca

original: 351. Pumayuttāni yānāni ca sivikañca hatthavaṭṭakañca pāṭaṅkiñca abhiruhituṃ gilānassa
analyzed: pum ayuttāni yānāni ca sivikañca hattha vaṭṭakañca pāṭaṅkiñca abhiruhitum gilānassa

original: kappateti sambandho. Pumayuttānīti assagavādipurisayuttāni, na dhenuyuttāni, sārathi
analyzed: kappate iti sambandhaḥ pum ayuttāni iti assa gavādi purisa yuttāni na dhenu yuttāni sārathi

original: pana itthī vā hotu puriso vā, vaṭṭati. Hatthavaṭṭakepi eseva nayo, yānānīti rathasakaṭādīni,
analyzed: pana itthī vā hotu purisaḥ vā vaṭṭati hattha vaṭṭake pi esa iva nayaḥ yānāni iti ratha sakaṭa ādīni

original: sivikanti pīṭhakasivikaṃ, pīṭhakayānanti attho. Pāṭaṅkīti andolikā. Gilānassāti ettha
analyzed: sivikanti pīṭhaka sivikam pīṭhaka yānanti attho pāṭaṅkī iti andolikā gilānassa ti ettha

original: gilāno nāma na appakenapi sīsābādhādimattena veditabbo, yo pana na sakkoti vinā yānena
analyzed: gilānaḥ nāma na appakena api sīsa ābādha ādimattena veditabbo yaḥ pana na sakkoti vinā yānena

original: gantuṃ, evarūpo veditabbo. Tathā hi yānaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā kosalesu janapadesu
analyzed: gantum evarūpaḥ veditabbaḥ tathā hi yānam anujānantena bhagavatā kosalesu janapadesu

original: bhagavantaṃ dassanāya sāvatthiṃ gacchantaṃ aññataraṃ gilānaṃ bhikkhuṃ gantumasakkuṇeyyatāya
analyzed: bhagavantam dassanāya sāvatthim gacchantam aññataram gilānam bhikkhum gantum a sakkuṇeyya tāya

original: aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā manussehi taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “ehi, bhante,
analyzed: aññatarasmim rukkha mūle nisinnam disvā manussehi tam pavattim ñatvā ehi bhante

original: gamissāmā”ti vutte “nāhaṃ, āvuso, gamissāmi, gilānomhī”ti vuttavatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ,
analyzed: gamissāma ati vutte na aham āvuso gamissāmi gilānaḥ amhi iti vutta vatthusmim anuññātam

original: tathā vadanto ca so bhikkhu gamanupacchedasādhakameva gelaññaṃ sandhāyāhāti viññāyati
analyzed: tathā vadanto ca so bhikkhu gamana upaccheda sādhakam eva gelaññam sandhāya āha ati viññāyati

original: adhippetatthanipphattiyā upacchinnattā, apica yānena ekaparicchedāya upāhanāya paricchedaṃ
analyzed: adhippeta attha nipphattiyā upacchinna ttā apica yānena eka paricchedāya upāhanāya paricchedam

original: ṭhapentena aṭṭhakathācariyena “gilānena bhikkhunā saupāhanenāti ettha gilāno nāma
analyzed: ṭhapentena aṭṭhakathā cariyena gilānena bhikkhunā sa upāhanena ati ettha gilānaḥ nāma

original: yo na sakkoti anupāhanena gāmaṃ pavisitu”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā yathāvuttagilānova
analyzed: yaḥ na sakkoti an upāhanena gāmam pavisitunti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam tasmai yathā vutta gilānaḥ uva

original: gilānoti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
analyzed: gilānaḥ ti niṭṭham ettha gantabbam

original: 352. Davaṃ karaṇeti keḷiyā karaṇe. Aññassāti antamaso dussīlassāpi. Upalāḷaneti “pattaṃ dassāmi, cīvaraṃ dassāmī”tiādinā.
analyzed: davam karaṇe iti keḷiyā karaṇe aññassa ati antamasaḥ dussīlassa api upalāḷane iti pattam dassāmi cīvaram dassāmi iti ādinā

original: 353. Vivaritvā na dassayeti sambandhanīyaṃ. Tā bhikkhuniyo.
analyzed: vivaritvā na dassayā iti sambandhanīyam tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ

original: 354. Ovādanti bhikkhunīhi terasiyaṃ vā cātuddasiyaṃ vā āgantvā uposathaṃ pucchitvā
analyzed: bhikkhunīhi terasiyam vā cātuddasiyam vā āgantvā uposatham pucchitvā

original: “cātuddaso”tiādinā bhikkhunā ācikkhite puna tāhi uposathadivase samāgantvā ovādūpasaṅkamanayācanaṃ,
analyzed: cātuddaso ti ādinā bhikkhunā ācikkhite puna uposatha divase samāgantvā ovāda upasaṅkamana yācanam

original: taṃ pātimokkhuddesakassa ārocetvā tena katasanniṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pāṭipade paccāharitabbanti
analyzed: tam pātimokkha uddesakassa ārocetvā tena kata sanniṭṭhānam gahetvā pāṭipade paccāharitabbanti

original: ajānanakaṃ bālañca tathā kātuṃ asamatthaṃ gilānañca pāṭipade gantukāmaṃ gamiyañca
analyzed: a jānanakam bālam ca tathā kātum a samattham gilānam ca pāṭipade gantu kāmam gamiyan ca

original: vajjetvā aññassa gahaṇapaccāharaṇāni akātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tena vuttaṃ “na gaṇhato”tiādi.
analyzed: vajjetvā aññassa gahaṇa paccāharaṇāni a kātum na vaṭṭati tena vuttam na gaṇhato tiādi

original: 355. Lokāyatanti niratthakakāraṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ. Tiracchānavijjā
analyzed: lokāyatanti niratthaka kāraṇa paṭisaṃyuttam titthiya sattham tiracchāna vijjā

original: ca imināva upalakkhitā. Na vāceyyāti paresaṃ na vāceyya. Imināva attano pariyāpuṇanampi
analyzed: ca iminā upalakkhitā na vāceyya ati paresam na vāceyya attano pariyāpuṇanam pi

original: paṭikkhittaṃ lokāyatatiracchānavijjāti ca rāgadosamohavaḍḍhāni buddhādigarahitā saggamokkhānaṃ
analyzed: paṭikkhittam ca rāga dosa moha vaḍḍhāni buddha ādiga rahitā sagga mokkhānam

original: tiro tiriyato añcitā gatā pavattā kabbanāṭakādikā sabbāpi vijjā anulomavasena vā
analyzed: tiras tiriyataḥ añcitā gatā pavattā kabbanāṭaka ādikā sabbā api vijjā anuloma vasena vā

original: vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbanti vinayayuttitopi saṅgahitāti veditabbā. Evañca
analyzed: vinaya pariyāyam patvā garuke ṭhātabban ti vinaya yuttitaḥ pi saṅgahitā iti veditabbā evam ca

original: no garūnamupadeso. Peḷāyapīti yattha pātiṃ ṭhapetvā sukhino bhuñjanti, tambalohena
analyzed: yattha pātim ṭhapetvā sukhinaḥ bhuñjanti tamba lohena

original: rajatena vā katāya tāya āsittakūpadhānasaṅkhātāya peḷāya ṭhapetvā.
analyzed: rajatena vā katāya tāya āsittakūpadhāna saṅkhātāya peḷāya ṭhapetvā

original: 356. Pārutañca nivāsanañca, gihīnaṃ hatthisoṇḍādivasena pārutanivāsanaṃ yassa pārupanassa
analyzed: pārutam ca nivāsanam ca gihīnam hatthi soṇḍa ādi vasena pāruta nivāsanam yassa pārupanassa

original: nivāsanassāti kiriyāvisesanasamāso. Gihipārutanivāsanaṃ na pārupe na nivāseyyāti
analyzed: nivāsanassa ati kiriyā visesana samāsaḥ gihi pāruta nivāsanam na pārupe na nivāseyya ati

original: sambandho. Saṃvelliyaṃ na nivāseyyāti mallakammakarādayo viya kacchaṃ katvā na nivāseyya.
analyzed: sambandho saṃvelliyam na nivāseyya ati malla kammakara ādayaḥ viya kaccham katvā na nivāseyya

original: Evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassāpi maggappaṭipannassāpi na vaṭṭati. Yampi maggaṃ gacchantā
analyzed: evam nivāsetum gilānassa api magga ppaṭipannassa api na vaṭṭati yam pi maggam gacchantā

original: ekaṃ vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari lagganti, na vaṭṭati. Evaṃ apārupitvā
analyzed: ekam vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari lagganti na vaṭṭati evam

original: anivāsetvā ca nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: a nivāsetvā ca nibbikāram parimaṇḍalam pārupitabbam timaṇḍalam paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalam

original: nivāsetabbañca, tathā apārupitvā anivāsetvā ca ārāme vā antaraghare vā anādarena
analyzed: nivāsetabbam ca tathā a pārupitvā a nivāsetvā ca ārāme vā antaraghare vā anādarena

original: yaṃ kiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ. Dāyanti vanaṃ. Nālimpayeyyāti “sabbūpakārāni
analyzed: yam kiñci vikāram karontassa dukkaṭam dāyanti vanam na ālimpayeyya ati sabba upakārāni

original: vinassantū”ti vā khiḍḍādhippāyena vā nālimpayeyya.
analyzed: vinassantu uti vā khiḍḍa adhippāyena vā na ālimpayeyya

original: 357. Vaḍḍhiṃ no payojaye aññātakappavārite no yāceti yojanā. Aññassāti sahadhammikassāpi. Katipāhaṃ bhutvā vāti yojanīyaṃ. Punoti nipāto.
analyzed: vaḍḍhim no payojaye aññātaka pavārite no yāca iti yojanā aññassa ati sahadhammikassa api katipāham bhutvā vāti yojanīyam punoti nipātaḥ

original: 358. Daṇḍinaṃ ñatvā vā añatvā vā uddissa rakkhaṃ yācane daṇḍite daṇḍo assa gīvāti
analyzed: daṇḍinam ñatvā vā a ñatvā vā uddissa rakkham yācane daṇḍite daṇḍaḥ assa gīvā ti

analyzed: yojanā daṇḍam gaṇhati iti paccaya antassa daṇḍinam daṇḍa ggahaṇam ti atthaḥ uddissa ati

original: “Harantesu parikkhāraṃ,
analyzed: harantesu parikkhāram

original: Coro coroti bhāsite;
analyzed: coro coro iti bhāsite

original: Anatthāyesaṃ gaṇhante”ti. –
analyzed: anatthāya īsam gaṇhantā iti

analyzed: bahi vaḷañje vā api vīha ādi nāḷikera ādi ropime harite vā api

original: cāti dvando, tesaṃ ropo, tena nibbattaṃ vīhādi…pe… ropimaṃ. Hariteti haritaṭṭhāne.

original: Vighāso nāma ucchiṭṭhodakacalakādi.

analyzed: dhamma yuttampi naccañca gītañca vāditañca yojāpetuñca payojetuñca payuttāni

original: morasukamakkaṭādīnaṃ naccampi. Gītanti antamaso gītassa pubbabhāge kayiramānaṃ dantagītampi.

original: Garunāti ācariyupajjhāyena. Paṇāmitoti “mā idha pavisā”tiādinā nikkaḍḍhito.

original: 371. Sattānaṃ pakataṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulādhikaṃ mañcappaṭipādaṃ vā uccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ

original: 373. Hatthakammanti hatthena kātabbaṃ vaḍḍhakiādīnaṃ kammaṃ. Anussaraṇaṃ “kappiyattaṃ
analyzed: hattha kammam ti hatthena kātabbam vaḍḍhaki ādīnam kammam anussaraṇam kappiya ttam

original: anusāro tadanusāro, tato laddhaṃ yaṃ kiñci gahetunti yojanā. Kammato niggato nikkammo,

original: vighāsādādi. Taṃ ayācitvāpi kāretunti sambandho. Āharāpetunti araññato ānetuṃ. Aparasantakanti

analyzed: dāru tiṇa palāla ādikam apara pariggahitam

analyzed: gihīnam yattakam deti gopake dente gahetum labbham saṅgha cetiya santake yathāparicchedam

original: 376. Alajjiaññāṇatāya kāyavācāhi āpattiṃ chādayeti yojanā. Liṅgeti liṅgaparivattananimittaṃ. Liṅge saṅghe ca gaṇe ca ekasmiṃ cāti āpattivuṭṭhiti catudhā hotīti seso.

original: “Atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭha”ntiādinayappavattaṃ kammassakatāñāṇaṃ paññā, tilakkhaṇākāraparicchedakaṃ
analyzed: atthi dinnam atthi yiṭṭha nti ādi naya ppavattam kammassaka tā ñāṇam paññā ti lakkhaṇa ākāra paricchedakam

original: pana vipassanāñāṇaṃ “adhipaññā”ti vuccati. Sā hi sabbalokiyapaññānaṃ adhikā ceva
analyzed: pana vipassanā ñāṇam adhipaññā ti vuccati sā hi sabbalokiya paññānam adhikā ca iva

original: uttamā ca. Tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā, sā pana idha nādhippetā. Na hi
analyzed: uttamā ca tatas pi ca magga phala paññā āva adhipaññā sā pana idha na adhippetā na hi

original: taṃ sikkhanto methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati.
analyzed: tam sikkhantaḥ methunam dhammam paṭisevati

original: Tāsu tīsu adhisīlasikkhā cārittavārittavasena duvidhampi sīlaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānena,
analyzed: tāsu tīsu adhi sīla sikkhā cāritta vāritta vasena duvidham pi sīlam yathā anusiṭṭham paṭipajjamānena

original: tappaṭipakkhe kilese tadaṅgappahānavasena pajahantena sikkhitabbā. Adhicittasikkhā
analyzed: tad paṭipakkhe kilese tad aṅga pahāna vasena pajahantena sikkhitabbā adhicitta sikkhā

original: yathāvuttesu ārammaṇesu abhiyogavasena jhānappaṭipakkhānaṃ nīvaraṇagaṇānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ
analyzed: yathā vuttesu ārammaṇesu abhiyoga vasena jhāna ppaṭipakkhānam nīvaraṇa gaṇānam vikkhambhana ppahānam

original: kurumānena sikkhitabbā. Adhipaññāsikkhā pana yathānurūpaṃ tadaṅgappahānasamucchedavasena
analyzed: kuru mānena sikkhitabbā adhi paññā sikkhā pana yathānurūpam tad aṅga ppahāna samuccheda vasena

original: sānusaye kilese samucchindantena sikkhitabbā. Tasmā suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanaṭṭhena
analyzed: sa anusaye kilese samucchindantena sikkhitabbā tasmā suppatiṭṭhita bhāva sādhana ṭṭhena

original: mūlā ca sā sikkhitabbato sikkhā cāti mūlasikkhā, kammavacanicchāyaṃ “mūlasikkha”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: mūlā ca sā sikkhitabbato sikkhā ca ati mūla sikkhā kamma vacanicchāyam mūla sikkhanti vuttam

original: Samāsīyate saṅkhipīyateti samāso, tato samāsato. Samaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena
analyzed: samāsīyate saṅkhipīyate iti samāsaḥ tatas samāsataḥ samaggena saṅghena ñatti catutthena

original: kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampannoti bhikkhu. Tattha sabbantimena pariyāyena
analyzed: kammena akuppena ṭhāna arahena upasampanno ti bhikkhu tattha sabbantimena pariyāyena

original: pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, tesaṃ āgatattā, chandārahānaṃ
analyzed: pañcavagga karaṇīye kamme yāvatikāḥ bhikkhū kamma ppattā tesam āgata ttā chanda arahānam

original: chandassa āhaṭattā, sammukhībhūtānañca appaṭikkosanato ekasmiṃ kamme samaggabhāvaṃ
analyzed: chandassa āhaṭa ttā sammukhībhūtānam ca a paṭikkosanataḥ ekasmin kamme samagga bhāvam

original: upagatena saṅghena tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ñattiyā kātabbakammasaṅkhātena ñatticatutthena
analyzed: upagatena saṅghena tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ñattiyā kātabba kamma saṅkhātena ñatti catutthena

original: dhammikena vinayakammena vatthuñattianussāvanasīmāparisāsampattisampannattā akopetabbataṃ,
analyzed: dhammikena vinaya kammena vatthu ñatti anussāvana sīmā parisā sampatti sampanna ttā a kopetabba taṃ

original: appaṭikkositabbataṃ upagatena ṭhānārahena kāraṇārahena satthusāsanārahena upasampanno
analyzed: a paṭikkositabbatam upagatena ṭhāna arahena kāraṇa arahena satthu sāsana arahena upasampannaḥ

original: nāma, uparibhāvaṃ samāpanno pattoti attho. Bhikkhubhāvo hi uparibhāvo. Tañcesa yathāvuttena
analyzed: nāma upari bhāvam samāpannaḥ patto ti attho bhikkhu bhāvaḥ hi upari bhāvaḥ tat ca isa yathā vuttena

original: kammena samāpannattā “upasampanno”ti vuccati, tena bhikkhunā. Ūnapañcavassatāya navako,
analyzed: kammena samāpanna ttā upasampannaḥ ti vuccati tena bhikkhunā ūna pañca vassa tāya navakaḥ

original: tena navakena adhunā pabbajitena, acirapabbajitenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ādoti ādimhiyevāti
analyzed: tena navakena adhunā pabbajitena acira pabbajitena ati vuttam hoti ādo ti ādimhi eva ati

original: attho, ādito paṭṭhāyāti vā. Api ca thero “ādo”ti vacanena saddhāpabbajitānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ āditaḥ paṭṭhāya ati vā api ca theraḥ ādaḥ ti vacanena saddhā pabbajitānam kula puttānam

original: ālasiyadosena, appaṭipajjantānaṃ aññāṇadosena ca aññathā paṭipajjantānaṃ saṃvegaṃ
analyzed: ālasiya dosena appaṭipajjantānam aññāṇa dosena ca aññathā paṭipajjantānam saṃvegam

original: janeti. Kathaṃ? Atidullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ samavāyaṃ paṭilabhitvā taṅkhaṇaṃ na kusītena
analyzed: jana iti katham ati dullabham khaṇam samavāyam paṭilabhitvā tat khaṇam na kusītena

original: vā niratthakakathāpasutena vā vītināmetabbaṃ, kiṃ kātabbaṃ? Ādito paṭṭhāya nirantarameva
analyzed: vā niratthaka kathā pasutena vā vītināmetabbam kim kātabbam āditaḥ paṭṭhāya nirantaram eva

original: tīsu sikkhāsu ādaro janetabboti.
analyzed: tīsu sikkhāsu ādaraḥ janetabbo ti

original: “Sā māgadhī mūlabhāsā, narā yāyādikappikā;
analyzed: sā māgadhī mūlabhāsā narā yāyādikappikā

original: Brahmāno cassutālāpā, sambuddhā cāpi bhāsare”ti. –
analyzed: sambuddhā ca api

original: Vacanato mūlabhāsāyāti māgadhamūlāya bhāsāya, sabhāvaniruttiyā bhāsāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sikkhitunti uggaṇhituṃ.
analyzed: vacanataḥ mūla bhāsāya ati māgadha mūlāya bhāsāya sabhāva niruttiyā bhāsāya ati vuttam hoti sikkhitum ti uggaṇhitum

original: 1. Pārājikaniddesavaṇṇanā
1. Idāni sabbasikkhānaṃ pana mūlabhūtattā adhisīlasikkhāva paṭhamaṃ vuttā, tatrāpi
analyzed: idāni sabba sikkhānam pana mūla bhūta ttā adhisīla sikkhā ava paṭhamam vuttā tatra api

original: mahāsāvajjattā, mūlacchejjavasena pavattanato ca sabbapaṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ jānitabbanti
analyzed: mahā sāvajja ttā mūla chejja vasena pavattanato ca sabba paṭhamam pārājikam jānitabbanti

original: dassento “saṃ nimitta”ntyādimāha. Tattha maggattaye saṃ nimittaṃ pavesanto bhikkhu
analyzed: dassentaḥ sam nimitta ityādim āha tattha magga ttaye sam nimittam pavesantaḥ bhikkhu

original: cutoti attho. Saṃ nimittanti attano aṅgajātaṃ, sabbantimena paricchedena ekatilabījamattampi
analyzed: cuto ti attho sam nimittam ti attanaḥ aṅga jātam sabba antimena paricchedena eka tila bīja mattam pi

original: attano aṅgajātanti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhikkhūti anikkhittasikkho. Maggattayeti ettha manussāmanussatiracchānagatānaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ aṅga jātanti vuttam hoti bhikkhu iti a nikkhitta sikkhaḥ magga ttayā iti ettha manussa amanussa tiracchāna gatānam

original: vasena tisso itthiyo, tayo ubhatobyañjanakā, tayo paṇḍakā, tayo purisāti pārājikavatthubhūtānaṃ
analyzed: vasena tisso itthiyaḥ tayo ubhatobyañjanakā tayo paṇḍakā tayo purisā ati pārājika vatthu bhūtānam

original: nimittānaṃ nissayā dvādasa sattā honti. Tesaṃ vaccapassāvamukhamaggavasena tayo maggā.
analyzed: nimittānam nissayāḥ dvādasa sattāḥ honti tesam vacca passa avamukha magga vasena tayo maggāḥ

original: Tattha manussitthiyā tayo, amanussitthiyā tayo, tiracchānagatitthiyā tayoti nava,
analyzed: tattha manussitthiyā tayo amanussitthiyā tayo tiracchānaga titthiyā tayo ti nava

original: tathā manussubhatobyañjanakādīnaṃ. Manussapaṇḍakādīnaṃ pana vaccamukhamaggavasena
analyzed: tathā manussubha tobyañjanaka ādīnam manussapaṇḍaka ādīnam pana vaccamukha magga vasena

original: dve dveti cha, tathā manussapurisādīnanti sabbesaṃ vasena tiṃsa maggā honti. Te sabbe
analyzed: dve dve iti cha tathā manussa purisa ādīnam ti sabbesam vasena tiṃsa maggāḥ honti te sabbe

original: pariggahetvā idha “maggattaye”ti vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ maggattaye, dvādasannaṃ sattānaṃ
analyzed: pariggahetvā idha magga ttayā iti vuttam tasmin magga ttaye dvādasannam sattānam

original: tīsu maggesu yattha katthaci maggeti attho. Cutoti sakkattā vā brahmattā vā cutasatto
analyzed: tīsu maggesu yattha katthaci maggeti cuto ti sakkattā vā brahmattā vā cuta satto

original: viya sāsanato cuto hoti, pārājiko hotīti attho.
analyzed: viya sāsanataḥ cutaḥ hoti pārājiko hoti iti attho

original: Idāni pavesanaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ attupakkameneva hoti, parūpakkamenāpi hoti, tatthāpi
analyzed: idāni pavesanam nāma na kevalam attu pakkamena iva hoti paru upakkamena api hoti tattha api

original: sevanacitte sati pārājiko hotīti dassanatthaṃ “pavesanā”tyādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho –
analyzed: sevana citte sati pārājikaḥ hoti iti dassana attham pavesana ātyādi vuttam tassa atthaḥ

original: yo bhikkhu pavesanaṭṭhitauddharaṇapaviṭṭhakkhaṇesu aññataraṃ khaṇaṃ cepi sādiyaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu pavesana ṭṭhita auddharaṇa paviṭṭha khaṇesu aññataram khaṇam ce pi sādiyam

analyzed: sādiyanto sace pi tasmin khaṇe sevana cittam upaṭṭhāpento cutaḥ pārājikaḥ hoti yaḥ pana

original: sabbaso asādiyanto āsīvisamukhaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ paviṭṭhaṃ viya ca maññati, so nipparādho
analyzed: sabbaso a sādiyantaḥ āsīvisa mukham aṅgāraka asum paviṭṭham viya ca maññati so nipparādhaḥ

original: hoti. Ettha pana ṭhitaṃ nāma sukkavissaṭṭhisamayappattaṃ. Paṭhamapārājikaṃ.
analyzed: hoti ettha pana ṭhitam nāma sukka vissaṭṭhi samaya ppattam paṭhama pārājikam

original: 2-7. Idāni dutiyaṃ dassetuṃ “adinnaṃ mānusaṃ bhaṇḍa”ntyādimāha. Tattha yo bhikkhu
analyzed: idāni dutiyam dassetum adinnam mānusam bhaṇḍanti ādim āha tattha yaḥ bhikkhu

original: adinnaṃ mānusaṃ garukaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ pañcavīsāvahāresu yena kenaci avahārena ādiyanto
analyzed: adinnam mānusam garukam bhaṇḍam pañcavīsā avahāresu yena kenacid avahārena

original: cuto bhaveti sambandho. Adinnanti yaṃ kiñci parapariggahitaṃ sassāmikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ,
analyzed: cutaḥ bhava iti sambandhaḥ a dinnam ti yam kiñci para pariggahitam sa sāmikam bhaṇḍam

original: taṃ tehi sāmikehi kāyena vā vācāya vā na dinnanti adinnaṃ, anissaṭṭhaṃ apariccattaṃ
analyzed: tam tehi sāmikehi kāyena vā vācāya vā na dinnanti a dinnam a nissaṭṭham a pariccattam

analyzed: tulya adhikaraṇam theyyāya ekena ati theyyāya ekena ekena avahārena ati

analyzed: atthaḥ liṅga bhedam katvā vuttam theyyā kenaci iti vā pāṭho tattha theno ti coro

analyzed: thenassa bhāvaḥ theyyā karaṇa atthe ca itam paccatta vacanam tasmā kenacid theyyena avahārena ati

original: attho. Ādiyanti ādiyanto gaṇhanto. Pañcavīsāvahāresūti pañcapañcake samodhānetvā
analyzed: ādiyanti ādiyantaḥ gaṇhantaḥ pañcavīsa avahāresu iti pañca pañcake samodhānetvā

analyzed: sāhatthika pañcakam pubbappayoga pañcakam theyyāvahāra pañcakanti

original: Tattha saviññāṇakāviññāṇakamissakabhaṇḍavasena nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ, saviññāṇakabhaṇḍavasena
analyzed: tattha sa viññāṇaka aviññāṇaka missaka bhaṇḍa vasena nānā bhaṇḍa pañcakam sa viññāṇaka bhaṇḍa vasena

analyzed: eka bhaṇḍa pañcakam tattha nānā bhaṇḍa vasena tāva evam veditabbaḥ yaḥ ārāmam abhiyuñjati

analyzed: āpatti dukkaṭassa sāmikassa vimatiṃ uppādeti āpatti thullaccayassa sāmikaḥ na

original: mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, āpatti pārājikassa. Aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ haranto
analyzed: mayham bhavissati iti dhuram nikkhipati āpatti pārājikassa aññassa bhaṇḍam harantaḥ

analyzed: sīse bhāram theyya cittaḥ āmasati āpatti dukkaṭassa phandāpeti āpatti thullaccayassa

analyzed: khandham oropeti āpatti pārājikassa upanikkhittam bhaṇḍam dehi me bhaṇḍam ti vuccamāno

analyzed: na aham gaṇhāmi iti bhaṇati āpatti dukkaṭassa sāmikassa vimatim uppādeti āpatti

original: kopeti vā ṭhānā cāveti vāti. Ayamettha ekabhaṇḍavasena yojanā.
analyzed: vā ayam ettha eka bhaṇḍa vasena yojanā

original: Pañca avahārā sāhatthiko āṇattiko nissaggiyo atthasādhako dhuranikkhepoti. Tattha
analyzed: pañca avahārā sāhatthikaḥ āṇattikaḥ nissaggiyaḥ attha sādhakaḥ dhura nikkhepaḥ ti tattha

analyzed: sāhatthikaḥ nāma parassa bhaṇḍam sahatthā avaharati āṇattikaḥ nāma asukassa bhaṇḍam

analyzed: avaharāti aññam āṇāpeti nissaggiyaḥ nāma antar suṅkaghāte ṭhitaḥ bahi suṅkaghātam pāteti

original: āpatti pārājikassa. Atthasādhako nāma “asukaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā avaharā”ti
analyzed: āpatti pārājikassa atthasādhakaḥ nāma asukam bhaṇḍam yadā sakkosi tadā avaharāti

analyzed: nāma sambahulāḥ bhikkhū amukam nāma geham gantvā chadanam vā bhinditvā sandhim

original: vā chinditvā bhaṇḍaṃ harissāmā”ti saṃvidahitvā gacchanti, tesu eko bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,

original: Pattassa attano santakatā, pamāṇayuttatā, adhiṭṭhānūpagatā, atirekapattatā, dasāhātikkamoti
analyzed: pattassa attano santaka tā pamāṇa yutta tā adhiṭṭhāna upaga tā atireka patta tā dasāha atikkamo ti

original: imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Paṭhamapattasikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: imāni ettha pañca aṅgāni paṭhama patta sikkhāpadam

original: 25. Yo bhikkhu pañcabandhanato ūnapatte sati paraṃ pana navaṃ pattaṃ viññāpeti, tassapi
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu pañca bandhanataḥ ūna patte sati param pana navam pattam viññāpeti tassa api

original: bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ siyāti sambandho. Tattha paranti aññaṃ, “navaṃ patta”ntiminā
analyzed: bhikkhuno nissaggiyam siyā ti sambandho tattha param ti aññam navam

original: tulyādhikaraṇaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānūpagapattassa ūnapañcabandhanatā, attuddesikatā, kataviññatti,
analyzed: tulya adhikaraṇam adhiṭṭhāna upaga pattassa ūna pañca bandhana tā attuddesika tā kata viññatti

original: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Ūnapañcabandhanasikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: tāya ca paṭilābhaḥ ti imāni ettha cattāri aṅgāni ūna pañca bandhana sikkhāpadam

original: 26. Yo sappitelādikaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ sappi tela ādikam pana bhesajjam paṭiggahetvā satta aha paramam sannidhi kārakam

original: bhuñjanto sattāhaṃ atikkāmeti, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyāti attho. Tattha sappitelādikanti
analyzed: bhuñjantaḥ sattāham atikkāmeti tassa nissaggiyam siyāti tattha sappi tela ādikam ti

original: ettha ādi-saddo navanītamadhuphāṇitaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha sappi nāma gavādīnaṃ sappi,
analyzed: ettha ādi saddaḥ navanīta madhu phāṇitam saṅgaṇhāti tattha sappi nāma go ādīnam sappi

analyzed: nibbattam madhu nāma makkhikā madhum eva ucchu rasam upādāya pana apakkā vā avatthuka pakkā

original: vā sabbāpi ucchuvikati phāṇitanti veditabbaṃ. Bhesajjavidhānasikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: vā sabbā api phāṇitanti veditabbam bhesajja vidhāna sikkhāpadam

original: 27. Bhikkhussa cīvaraṃ datvā puna taṃ cīvaraṃ sakasaññāya acchindantassa vā acchindāpayatopi
analyzed: bhikkhussa cīvaram da tvā puna tam cīvaram saka saññāya a chindantassa vā a chindāpayataḥ pi

original: vā nissaggiyaṃ siyāti yojanā. Tattha datvāti veyyāvaccādīni paccāsīsamāno datvā.

original: Acchindantassāti veyyāvaccādīni akarontaṃ disvā balakkārena gaṇhantassa, tathā acchindāpayatoti.
analyzed: a chindantassa ati veyyāvacca ādīni a karontam disvā balakkārena gaṇhantassa tathā

original: Vikappanūpagacīvaratā, sāmaṃdinnatā, sakasaññitā, upasampannatā, kodhavasena acchindanaṃ
analyzed: vikappana upaga cīvara tā sāmaṃdinna tā saka saññi tā upasampanna tā kodha vasena acchindanam

original: vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Acchindanasikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: vā acchindāpanam vā ati imāni ettha pañca aṅgāni acchindana sikkhāpadam

original: 28. Appavāritaṃ aññātiṃ gahapatiṃ suttaṃ yācitvā ñātippavārite vajjetvā tantavāyehi

original: attuddesikatā, akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpananti imānettha tīṇi
analyzed: attuddesika tā akappiya tantavāyena akappiya viññattiyā vāyāpananti imāni ettha tīṇi

analyzed: aṅgāni sutta viññatti sikkhāpadam

original: attano pariṇāmanaṃ, paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Pariṇāmanasikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: attano pariṇāmanam paṭilābho ti imāni ettha tīṇi aṅgāni pariṇāmana sikkhāpadam

original: Nissaggiyaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nissaggiya niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 4. Pācittiyaniddesavaṇṇanā
30. Idāni pācittiyaṃ dassetuṃ “sampajānamusāvāde”tyādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha sampajānamusāvādeti
analyzed: idāni pācittiyam dassetum sampajāna musāvāda ityādi āraddham tattha sampajāna musāvāda iti

analyzed: taṃ hetu tad paccayā pācittiyam udīritanti atthaḥ bhikkhuñca oma santassa āti jāti nāma gotta kamma sippa vaya ābādha liṅga kilesa āpatti akkosesu

original: bhūtena vā abhūtena vā yena kenaci mukhasattinā bhikkhuṃ ovijjhantassa bhikkhuno
analyzed: bhūtena vā abhūtena vā yena kenacid mukhasattinā bhikkhum ovijjhantassa bhikkhuno

original: udīritanti samudāyattho.
analyzed: udīritam ti samudāya tthaḥ

original: 32. Anupasampannenevāti bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena tiracchānagatenāpi
analyzed: an upasampannena iva ati bhikkhum ṭhapetvā antamasaḥ pārājika vatthu bhūtena tiracchāna gatena api

analyzed: saha tirattiyam sayitvā catuttha divase atthaṅgate sūriye puna sahaseyyāya pācitti

analyzed: siyā ati sambandhaḥ tattha sahaseyyāya ati sabba channa paricchinne yebhuyyena channa paricchinne

analyzed: vā senāsane pubbāpariyena vā eka khaṇe vā ekatas nisajjanāya tattha chadanam an āhat ca

analyzed: pākāra ādinā paricchinnam pi sabba paricchinnam icca iva veditabbam

original: 33. Ekarattampi itthiyā saddhiṃ seyyaṃ kappayato tassa bhikkhunopi pācitti siyāti
analyzed: eka rattam pi itthiyā saddhim seyyam kappayataḥ tassa bhikkhuno pi pācitti siyāti

original: attho. Tattha itthiyāti antamaso tadahujātāyapi manussitthiyā. Desentassa vinā viññuṃ,
analyzed: attho tattha itthiyā ati manussitthiyā desentassa vinā

original: dhammañca chappaduttarinti viññuṃ purisaṃ vinā itthiyā chappadato uttariṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: dhammañca chappada uttarin ti viññum purisam vinā itthiyā chappadataḥ uttarim dhammam

original: Abhikkhunoti anupasampannassa. Vadantassāti ārocentassa.
analyzed: a bhikkhuno ti an upasampannassa vadantassa ati ārocentassa

original: 35. Yo akappiyaṃ pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā. Tattha
analyzed: yaḥ akappiyam pathavim khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā tassa pācittiyam siyā tattha

analyzed: uddhana pacana ādi vasena vā tathā tathā adaḍḍhā vā jāta pathavī vuccati

original: Sā tividhā suddhamissapuñjavasena. Tattha suddhapathavī nāma pakatiyā suddhapaṃsu
analyzed: sā tividhā suddha missa puñja vasena tattha suddha pathavī nāma pakatiyā suddha paṃsu

analyzed: vā suddha mattikā vā missapathavī nāma yattha paṃsutaḥ vā mattikataḥ vā pāsāṇa sakkharaka thala marumba vālukāsu

analyzed: aññatarassa tatiya bhāgaḥ hoti puñjapathavī nāma atireka cātumāsam ovaṭṭhaḥ paṃsupuñjo

analyzed: vā mattikā puñjaḥ vā hoti vutta lakkhaṇena pana missaka puñjaḥ api piṭṭhi pāsāṇe ṭhita sukhuma rajam pi

original: ca deve phusayante sakiṃ ce tintaṃ, cātumāsaccayena tintokāso puñjapathavīsaṅkhameva
analyzed: ca deve phusayante sakim ce tintam cātumāsaccayena puñja pathavī saṅkham eva

original: gacchati. Yo bhikkhu bhūtagāmaṃ vikopeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyāti sambandho. Tattha
analyzed: gacchati yaḥ bhikkhu bhūtagāmam vikopeyya tassa pācittiyam siyā ti sambandhaḥ tattha

analyzed: gāmo ti rāsi bhūtānam gāmaḥ bhūtāḥ eva vā gāmaḥ iti bhūta gāmo patiṭṭhita harita tiṇa rukkha ādīnam etam

analyzed: adhivacanam tam bhūta gāmam vikopeyya ati chedana bhedana ādīni kareyya

original: 36. Yo bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ mañcādiṃ ajjhokāse santharaṇādikaṃ katvā āpucchanādikaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu saṅghikam mañca ādim ajjhokāse santharaṇa ādikam katvā āpucchana ādikam

analyzed: a katvā yāti tassa pācitti siyā ti attho tattha saṅghikam ti saṅghassa santakam mañca ādin ti

analyzed: ettha ādi saddena pīṭha bhisikā ucchādim saṅgaṇhāti santharaṇa ādikam ti santharaṇa ādim

original: vāti attho. Yātīti gacchati.
analyzed: vāti atthaḥ yāti iti gacchati

original: 37. Yo bhikkhu saṅghikāvasathe seyyaṃ santharaṇādikaṃ katvā āpucchanādikaṃ akatvā

analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam sappāṇakam toyam paribhuñjaye tassa bhikkhuno pācittiyaḥ

original: ekameva pācitti, āṇattassa payogagaṇanāya pācitti hoti. Pavāretvāna atirittaṃ akāretvā
analyzed: ekam eva pācitti āṇattassa payoga gaṇanāya pācitti hoti pavāretvāna atirittam a kāretvā

original: bhuñjato pācitti siyāti attho. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – odano sattu kummāso maccho maṃsanti
analyzed: bhuñjataḥ pācitti siyā ati atthaḥ tatra ayam vinicchayaḥ odanaḥ sattu kummāsaḥ macchaḥ maṃsanti

original: pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ sāsapamattampi ajjhoharitvā bhojanaṃ paṭikkhepaṃ katvā
analyzed: pañcannam bhojanānam aññataram sāsapa mattam pi ajjhoharitvā bhojanam paṭikkhepam katvā

original: aññena iriyāpathena “alametaṃ sabba”nti atirittaṃ akāretvā paribhuñjato pācitti hotīti.
analyzed: aññena iriyāpathena alam etam sabbanti atirittam a kāretvā paribhuñjataḥ pācitti hoti iti

original: 40. Yo bhikkhu āsādanāpekkho bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ bhikkhuṃ “handa, bhikkhu, khāda
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu āsādana apekkhaḥ bhuttāvim pavāritam bhikkhum handa bhikkhu khāda

original: vā bhuñja vā”ti anatirittena pavāreti, bhojane bhutte tassa pācittiyaṃ udīritanti
analyzed: vā bhuñja vā ati an atirittena pavāreti bhojane bhutte tassa pācittiyam udīritanti

original: attho. Tattha āsādanāpekkhoti āsādanaṃ codanaṃ maṅkukaraṇabhāvaṃ apekkhamāno.
analyzed: attho tattha āsādana apekkho ti āsādanam codanam maṅku karaṇa bhāvam apekkhamāno

original: 41-2. Yo bhikkhu sannidhibhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya, tassa bhikkhuno pācitti siyāti attho.
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu sannidhi bhojanam bhuñjeyya tassa bhikkhuno pācitti siyā ti attho

original: Tattha sannidhibhojananti paṭiggahetvā ekarattaṃ vītināmitabhojanaṃ. Vikāle yāvakālikaṃ
analyzed: tattha sannidhi bhojanam ti paṭiggahetvā eka rattam vītināmita bhojanam vikāle yāvakālikam

original: bhuñjato vāpi pācitti siyāti yojanā. Tattha vikāleti vigatakāle, majjhanhikātikkamato
analyzed: bhuñjataḥ vā api pācitti siyā ti yojanā tattha vikāla iti vigata kāle majjhanhika atikkamato

original: paṭṭhāya yāva aruṇuggamanāti attho. Yāvakālikanti vanamūlaphalādikaṃ āmisabhojanaṃ.
analyzed: paṭṭhāya aruṇuggamanā ti attho yāvakālikam ti vana mūla phala ādikam āmisa bhojanam

original: Agilāno bhikkhu paṇītakaṃ sappibhattādikampi viññāpetvāna bhuñjeyya, tassa bhikkhuno
analyzed: a gilānaḥ bhikkhu paṇītakam sappi bhatta ādikam pi viññāpetvāna bhuñjeyya tassa bhikkhuno

original: pācitti siyāti yojanā. Tattha agilānoti kallako. Paṇītakanti sappitelamadhuphāṇitamacchamaṃsakhīradadhisaṅkhātehi
analyzed: pācitti siyā ti yojanā tattha agilānaḥ ti kallako paṇītakam ti sappi tela madhu phāṇita maccha maṃsa khīra dadhi saṅkhātehi

original: saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sattadhaññanibbattaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ. Yo bhikkhu dantakaṭṭhodakaṃ vajjetvā
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭham satta dhañña nibbattam paṇīta bhojanam yaḥ bhikkhu danta kaṭṭhodakam vajjetvā

original: appaṭiggahitakaṃ bhuñjeyya, pācitti siyāti attho. Tattha appaṭiggahitanti kāyena
analyzed: a paṭiggahitakam bhuñjeyya pācitti siyā ti attho tattha a paṭiggahitam ti kāyena

original: vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā gaṇhantassa hatthapāse ṭhatvā kāyakāyappaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ
analyzed: vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā gaṇhantassa hattha pāse ṭhatvā kāya kāya ppaṭibaddha nissaggi yānam

original: aññatarena na dinnaṃ appaṭiggahitaṃ nāma.
analyzed: aññatarena na dinnam a paṭiggahitam nāma

original: 43. Yo bhikkhu titthiyassa sahatthato kiñci bhuñjitabbaṃ dadeyya, tassa pācitti siyāti
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu titthiyassa sahatthataḥ kiñci bhuñjitabbam dadeyya tassa pācitti siyāti

original: sambandho. Tattha titthiyassāti aññatitthiyassa. Kiñci bhuñjitabbanti yaṃ kiñci bhojanīyaṃ.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tattha titthiyassa ati añña titthiyassa kiñci bhuñjitabbanti yam kiñci bhojanīyam

original: Sahatthatoti sahatthā. Yo bhikkhu mātugāmena ekato raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, tassa
analyzed: sahatthato ti sahatthā yaḥ bhikkhu mātugāmena ekatas rahaḥ nisajjam kappeyya tassa

original: pācitti siyāti sambandho. Tattha rahoti paṭicchanne. Kappeti kappeyya. Ekatoti saddhiṃ.
analyzed: pācitti siyā ti sambandhaḥ tattha rahoti paṭicchanne kappeti kappeyya ekatas ti saddhiṃ

original: 44. Surāmerayapānepīti ettha piṭṭhādīhi kataṃ majjaṃ surā. Pupphādīhi kato āsavo
analyzed: surā meraya pāne pi iti ettha piṭṭha ādīhi katam majjam surā puppha ādīhi kataḥ āsavaḥ

original: merayaṃ. Yo bhikkhu tadubhayampi bījato paṭṭhāya kusaggenāpi pivati, tassa tappānapaccayā
analyzed: merayam yaḥ bhikkhu tat ubhayam pi bījataḥ paṭṭhāya kusaggena api pivati tassa tad pāna paccayā

original: pācittiyaṃ udīritanti attho. Aṅgulipatodake cāpīti aṅgulīhi upakacchakādīnaṃ ghaṭṭanapaccayā
analyzed: pācittiyam udīritanti attho aṅguli patā udake ca api iti aṅgulīhi upakacchaka ādīnam ghaṭṭana paccayā

original: pācitti siyāti attho. Hasadhammepi codaketi uparigopphake udake hasadhamme kīḷānimittaṃ
analyzed: pācitti siyā ti atthaḥ hasa dhamme pi ca udaka iti upari gopphake udake hasa dhamme kīḷā nimittam

original: tassa pācitti siyāti attho.
analyzed: tassa pācitti siyā ti attho

original: 45. Anādarepi pācittīti puggalassa vā dhammassa vā anādarakaraṇepi pācitti siyāti
analyzed: anādare pi pācitti iti puggalassa vā dhammassa vā anādara karaṇe pi pācitti siyā ti

original: attho. Yo bhikkhu upasampannena paññattena vuccamāno tassa vā vacanaṃ akattukāmatāya,
analyzed: atthaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu upasampannena paññattena vuccamāno tassa vā vacanam a kattu kāma tāya

original: taṃ vā dhammaṃ asikkhitukāmatāya anādariyaṃ karoti, tassa tasmiṃ anādariye pācitti
analyzed: tam vā dhammam a sikkhitu kāma tāya anādariyam karoti tassa tasmin anādariye pācittiyam

original: siyāti attho. Bhayānakaṃ kathaṃ katvā vā bhayānakaṃ rūpaṃ dassetvā vā bhikkhuṃ bhīsayatopi
analyzed: siyā ti atthaḥ bhayānakam katham katvā vā bhayānakam rūpam dassetvā vā bhikkhum bhīsayataḥ pi

original: pācitti siyāti attho.
analyzed: pācitti siyā ti atthaḥ

original: 46. Yo bhikkhu agilāno kiñci paccayaṃ ṭhapetvā jotiṃ jaleyya vā jalāpeyya vā, tassa
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu a gilānaḥ kiñci paccayam ṭhapetvā jotim jaleyya vā jalāpeyya vā tassa

original: pācittiyaṃ siyāti sambandho. Tattha kiñci paccayanti padīpujjalanaṃ vā pattapacanādīsu
analyzed: pācittiyam siyā ti sambandhaḥ tattha kiñci vā patta pacana ādīsu

original: jotikaraṇaṃ vāti evarūpaṃ paccayaṃ ṭhapetvā. Jotinti aggiṃ.
analyzed: joti karaṇam vāti evarūpam paccayam ṭhapetvā jotinti aggim

original: 47-8. Kappabinduṃ anādāya navacīvarabhogino navaṃ cīvaraṃ bhuñjantassa pācitti siyāti
analyzed: kappabindum an ādāya nava cīvara bhoginaḥ navam cīvaram bhuñjantassa pācitti siyā ti

original: attho. Kappabindunti morakkhimaṇḍalamaṅgulapiṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarappamāṇaṃ kappabinduṃ.
analyzed: kappa bindum ti morakkhi maṇḍalam aṅgula piṭṭhīnam aññatara ppamāṇam kappa bindum

original: Anādāyāti anādiyitvā. Bhikkhuno cīvarādikaṃ parikkhāraṃ apanetvā nidhentassa vā nidhāpentassa
analyzed: an ādāya ati an ādiyitvā bhikkhuno cīvara ādikam parikkhāram apanetvā nidhentassa vā nidhāpentassa

original: vā hasāpekkhassa bhikkhuno pācitti siyāti attho. Cīvarādikanti ādi-saddena pattanisīdanasūcigharakāyabandhanādiṃ

analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti nidhentassa ati nidahantassa hasa apekkhassa ati hasa adhippāyassa jānam pāṇam

analyzed: bhikkhu tiracchānagatam pi ca ati yaḥ bhikkhu pāṇo ti jānantaḥ tiracchānagatam

original: pāṇaṃ khuddakampi mahantampi haneyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: pāṇam khuddakam pi mahantam pi haneyya tassa pācittiyam siyā ti attho

original: 49. Chādetukāmo chādeti, duṭṭhullaṃ bhikkhunopi cāti yo bhikkhu bhikkhuno duṭṭhullasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: chādetu kāmo chādeti duṭṭhullam bhikkhuno pi ca ati yaḥ bhikkhu bhikkhuno duṭṭhulla saṅkhātam

analyzed: saṅgha ādisesam chādetu kāmaḥ hutvā chādeti tassa pācittiyam siyāti attho itthiyā saha

original: saṃvidhāya gāmantaragatassa bhikkhuno pācittiyaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: saṃvidhāya gām antara gatassa bhikkhuno pācittiyam siyā iti yojanā

original: 50. Bhikkhuṃ vā pahareyyāthāti yo bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ pahareyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyāti
analyzed: bhikkhum vā pahareyyātha ati yaḥ bhikkhu bhikkhum pahareyya tassa pācittiyam siyāti

analyzed: yojanā talasattikamuggira iti yaḥ bhikkhu paharaṇa ākāram dassento kāyam vā kāya ppaṭibaddham

analyzed: vā uggireyya tassa pācittiyam siyā ati codeyya vā codāpeyya bhikkhum a mūlakena

original: cāti yo bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṅghādisesena codeyya vā codāpeyya vā, tassa
analyzed: ca ati yaḥ bhikkhu bhikkhum amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena codeyya vā codāpeyya vā tassa

original: pācittiyaṃ siyāti attho. Tattha amūlakenāti diṭṭhādimūlavirahitena.
analyzed: pācittiyam siyāti attho tattha amūlakena ati diṭṭha ādi mūla virahitena

original: 51. Kukkuccuppādane cāpīti “ūnavīsativasso tvaṃ maññe”tiādīni bhaṇanto kukkuccaṃ
analyzed: kukkucca uppādane ca api iti ūnavīsati vassaḥ tvam mañña iti ādīni bhaṇanto kukkuccam

analyzed: uppādeyya tassa kukkucca uppādana paccayā pācittiyam hoti yaḥ bhikkhu bhaṇḍana tthāya

analyzed: bhaṇḍana jātānam vacanam sotum upassutim yāti tassa pācittiyam siyā ti sambandho

original: Tattha bhaṇḍanatthāyāti kalahatthāya. Bhaṇḍanajātānanti kalahajātānaṃ. Upassutinti sutisamīpaṃ.
analyzed: tattha bhaṇḍana atthāya ati kalaha atthāya bhaṇḍana jātānam ti kalaha jātānam upassutim ti suti samīpam

analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu saṅghassa pariṇāmitam yam lābham tam para puggalassa nāma iti tassa

original: pācittiyaṃ siyāti sambandho. Tattha nāmetīti pariṇāmeti. Pucchaṃ akatvāti “vikāle
analyzed: pācittiyam siyā ti sambandhaḥ tattha nāma iti iti pariṇāme iti puccham a katvā ati vikāle

original: gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchāmī”ti vā “gāmaṃ pavisissāmī”ti vā anāpucchitvā. Santabhikkhunti
analyzed: gāma pavesanam āpucchāmi iti vā gāmam pavisissāmi iti vā an āpucchitvā santa bhikkhunti

analyzed: antar upacāra sīmāya dassana upacāre bhikkhum disvā yam sakkā hoti pakativacanena āpucchitum

analyzed: tādisam vijjamānam bhikkhum gāmassa ati gāmam kamma atthe sāmi vacanam gata iti sampadāna atthe

original: bhummavacanaṃ, gatassāti attho. Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchitvā vikāle gāmaṃ gatassa
analyzed: bhumma vacanam gatassa ati atthaḥ santam bhikkhum an āpucchitvā vikāle gāmam gatassa

original: bhikkhuno pācittiyaṃ siyāti attho. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
analyzed: bhikkhuno pācittiyam siyāti attho sesam uttānam eva ati

original: Pācittiyaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pācittiya niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 5. Pakiṇṇakaniddesavaṇṇanā
53. Idāni pakiṇṇakaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅghika”ntyādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha yo bhikkhu issaro
analyzed: idāni pakiṇṇakam dassetum saṅghika ntyādi āraddham tattha yaḥ bhikkhu issaraḥ

original: hutvā saṅghikaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ aññassa deti, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā. Theyyāya aññassa

analyzed: deti yathāvatthu pārājika ādi siyā dukkaṭa vatthu dukkaṭam thullaccaya vatthu thullaccayam

original: pārājikavatthu pārājikaṃ siyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pārājika vatthu pārājikam siyā iti vuttam hoti

original: 54. Kusādimayacīrānīti ettha ādi-saddo vākaphalakaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, kusamayacīraṃ vākamayacīraṃ
analyzed: kusa ādi maya cīrāni iti ettha ādi saddaḥ vāka phalakam saṅgaṇhāti kusa maya cīram vāka maya cīram

original: phalakamayacīranti. Tattha kuse ganthetvā katacīraṃ kusamayacīraṃ. Vākamayacīraṃ
analyzed: phalaka maya cīranti tattha kuse ganthetvā kata cīram kusa maya cīram vāka maya cīram

original: nāma tāpasānaṃ vakkalaṃ. Phalakamayacīraṃ nāma phalakasaṇṭhānāni phalakāni sibbetvā
analyzed: nāma tāpasānam vakkalam phalaka maya cīram nāma phalaka saṇṭhānāni phalakāni sibbetvā

original: katacīraṃ. Kambalaṃ kesavālajanti kesajaṃ kambalaṃ vālajaṃ kambalaṃ, kesakambalaṃ
analyzed: kata cīram kambalam kesavālajanti kesa jam kambalam vāla jam kambalam kesakambalam

original: vālakambalanti attho. Kesehi tante vāyitvā katakambalaṃ kesakambalaṃ. Camarivālehi
analyzed: vāla kambalanti attho kesehi tante vāyitvā kata kambalam kesa kambalam camari vālehi

original: vāyitvā katakambalaṃ vālakambalaṃ. Samayaṃ vināti naṭṭhacīvarakālaṃ ṭhapetvā. Dhārayato

original: dhārayantassa. Lūkapakkhājinakkhipanti ulūkapakkhiajinakkhipaṃ. Tattha ulūkapakkhīti
analyzed: dhārayantassa lūka pakkha ajina khipanti ulūka pakkhi ajina khipam tattha ulūka pakkhī iti

original: ulūkasakuṇapakkhehi katanivāsanaṃ. Ajinakkhipanti salomaṃ sakhuraṃ ajinamigacammaṃ.
analyzed: ulūka sakuṇa pakkhehi kata nivāsanam ajina khipanti sa lomam sa khuram ajina miga cammam

original: Naṭṭhacīvarakālaṃ ṭhapetvā imesu sattasu vatthūsu yaṃ kiñci dhārayato thullaccayaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: naṭṭha cīvara kālam ṭhapetvā imesu sattasu vatthūsu yam kiñci dhārayato thullaccayam siyāti attho

original: 55. Satthakena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ satthakammaṃ, tasmiṃ satthakamme. Vatthimhi kattabbaṃ
analyzed: satthakena kattabbam kammam sattha kammam tasmim sattha kamme vatthimhi kattabbam

original: kammaṃ vatthikammaṃ, tasmiṃ vatthikamme. Saṃ nimittanti attano aṅgajātaṃ. Taṃ chindato
analyzed: kammam vatthi kammam tasmim vatthi kamme sam nimittanti attanaḥ aṅga jātam tam chindataḥ

original: thullaccayaṃ siyāti sambandho. Maṃsādibhojaneti ettha ādi-saddo aṭṭhilohitacammalomāni
analyzed: thullaccayam siyā iti sambandhaḥ maṃsa ādi bhojana iti ettha ādi saddaḥ aṭṭhi lohita camma lomāni

analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti tasmai manussānam maṃsa aṭṭhi lohita camma loma bhojana paccayā thullaccayam siyāti attho

original: 56. Kadalerakakkadussānīti ettha kadalierakaakkavākehi katāni vatthāni dhārayantassa
analyzed: kadala iraka kakka dussāni iti ettha kadali eraka akkavākehi katāni vatthāni dhārayantassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ. Potthakanti makacivākehi kataṃ potthakadussaṃ. Sabbapītādikanti ettha ādi-saddena
analyzed: dukkaṭam potthakanti maka civākehi katam potthaka dussam sabba pīta ādikam ti ettha ādi saddena

original: sabbalohitakasabbakaṇhakasabbamañjeṭṭhikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha sabbameva nīlakaṃ sabbanīlakaṃ.
analyzed: sabba lohitaka sabba kaṇhaka sabba mañjeṭṭhikam saṅgaṇhāti tattha sabbam eva nīlakam sabba nīlakam

original: Evaṃ sesesupi. Nīlaṃ ummārapupphavaṇṇaṃ. Pītaṃ kaṇikārapupphavaṇṇaṃ. Lohitaṃ jayasumanapupphavaṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: evam sesesu pi nīlam ummāra puppha vaṇṇam pītam kaṇikāra puppha vaṇṇam lohitam jayasumana puppha vaṇṇam

original: Kaṇhakaṃ addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇaṃ. Mañjeṭṭhikaṃ lākhārasavaṇṇaṃ. Imesu aṭṭhasu vatthūsu
analyzed: kaṇhakam addāriṭṭhaka vaṇṇam mañjeṭṭhikam lākhā rasa vaṇṇam imesu aṭṭhasu vatthūsu

original: yaṃ kiñci dhārayantassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: yam kiñci dhārayantassa dukkaṭam siyā ti attho

original: 57-8. Hatthissuragasoṇānanti hatthiassauragasoṇānaṃ maṃsaṃ aṭṭhirudhiracammalomāni.
analyzed: maṃsam aṭṭhi rudhira camma lomāni

original: Sīhabyagghacchadīpinanti sīhabyagghaacchadīpīnaṃ maṃsādīni. Taracchassa ca maṃsādiṃ
analyzed: maṃsa ādīni taracchassa ca maṃsa ādim

original: uddissakatamaṃsañca anāpucchitamaṃsañca bhuñjato dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Dakatitthādikanti
analyzed: uddissakata maṃsam ca an āpucchita maṃsam ca bhuñjataḥ dukkaṭam siyā daka tittha ādikan ti

original: ettha ādi-saddo vaccapassāvakuṭiyo saṅgaṇhāti. Tena yātānupubbaṃ āgatappaṭipāṭiṃ
analyzed: ettha ādi saddaḥ vacca passāva kuṭiyaḥ saṅgaṇhāti tena yāta anupubbam āgata ppaṭipāṭim

original: hitvāna vajjetvā nahānatitthañca vaccakuṭiñca passāvakuṭiñca vaje vajeyya gaccheyya,
analyzed: hitvāna vajjetvā nahāna tittham ca vacca kuṭiñca passāva kuṭiñca vaje vajeyya gaccheyya

original: dukkaṭaṃ tassa siyāti attho.
analyzed: dukkaṭam tassa siyā ti attho

original: 59. Sahasāti vegasā vegena. Vubbhajitvānāti antaravāsakaṃ dūratova ukkhipitvā, va-kāro
analyzed: sahasā ati vegasā vegena antaravāsakam dūratas va ukkhipitvā vakāraḥ

original: sandhivasenāgato. Paviseti paviseyya. Vaccapassāvakuṭikanti vaccakuṭikaṃ passāvakuṭikaṃ.
analyzed: sandhi vasena āgataḥ paviseti paviseyya vacca passāva kuṭikam ti vacca kuṭikam passāva kuṭikam

original: Viseti paviseyya. Yo bhikkhu vaccapassāvakuṭikaṃ sahasā paviseyya vā nikkhameyya
analyzed: viseti paviseyya yaḥ bhikkhu vacca passāva kuṭikam sahasā paviseyya vā nikkhameyya

original: vā, ubbhajitvā vā paviseyya vā nikkhameyya vā, ukkāsikaṃ vajjetvā taṃ paviseyya,
analyzed: vā ubbhajitvā vā paviseyya vā nikkhameyya vā ukkāsikam vajjetvā tam paviseyya

original: tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: tassa dukkaṭam siyāti yojanā

original: 60. Nitthunanto vaccaṃ kareyya dantakaṭṭhañca khādanto, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Vaccapassāvadoṇīnaṃ bahi vaccādikaṃ vaccapassāvaṃ kareyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: nitthunantaḥ vaccam kareyya dantakaṭṭham ca khādantaḥ tassa dukkaṭam siyāti attho vacca passāva doṇīnam bahi vacca ādikam vacca passāvam kareyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā

original: 61. Kharena cāvalekheyyāti phālitakaṭṭhena vā pharusena vā gaṇṭhikena vā pūtikaṭṭhena
analyzed: kharena ca avalekheyya ati phālita kaṭṭhena vā pharusena vā gaṇṭhikena vā pūti kaṭṭhena

original: vā susirena vā avalekheyyāti attho. Kaṭṭhanti avalekhanakaṭṭhaṃ. Kūpaketi vaccakūpake.
analyzed: vā susirena vā avalekheyya ati attho kaṭṭham ti avalekhana kaṭṭham kūpaka iti vacca kūpake

original: Ūhatañcāti gūthamakkhitañca. Na dhoveyyāti attanā vā na dhoveyya parena vā na dhovāpeyya.
analyzed: ūhatam ca ati gūtha makkhitam ca na dhoveyya ati attanā vā na dhoveyya parena vā na

original: Uklāpañcāti kacavarañca. Na sodhayena sammajjeyya.
analyzed: na sammajjeyya

original: 62. Capucapūti saddaṃ katvā udakakiccaṃ karontassa ācamantassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: saddam katvā udaka kiccam karontassa ācamantassa dukkaṭam siyāti attho

original: Anajjhiṭṭhovāti anāṇattoyeva. Therenāti saṅghattherena. Pātimokkhanti pātimokkhuddesaṃ.
analyzed: an ajjhiṭṭhaḥ uvā ati therena ati saṅgha ttherena pātimokkham ti pātimokkha uddesam

original: Uddise uddiseyya, dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: uddise uddiseyya dukkaṭam siyā

original: 63. Anāpucchāya pañhassa kathane, anāpucchāya pañhassa vissajjane, anāpucchāya sajjhāyakaraṇe,
analyzed: an āpucchāya pañhassa kathane an āpucchāya pañhassa vissajjane an āpucchāya sajjhāya karaṇe

original: anāpucchāya padīpajālane, anāpucchāya padīpavijjhāpaneti imesu catūsu paccayesu tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: an āpucchāya padīpa jālane an āpucchāya padīpa vijjhāpane ti imesu catūsu paccayesu tassa dukkaṭam siyā

original: 64. Anāpucchā vātapānakavāṭāni vivareyya vā thakeyya vā, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: an āpucchā vāta pāna kavāṭāni vivareyya vā thakeyya vā tassa dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandho

original: Vandanādinti ettha ādi-saddo vandāpanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Yo bhikkhu naggo vandanaṃ kareyya,
analyzed: vandana ādin ti ettha ādi saddaḥ vandāpanam saṅgaṇhāti yaḥ bhikkhu naggaḥ vandanam kareyya

original: vandāpanaṃ kareyya, gamanaṃ kareyya, bhojanaṃ kareyya, pivanaṃ kareyya, khādanaṃ
analyzed: vandāpanam kareyya gamanam kareyya bhojanam kareyya pivanam kareyya khādanam

original: kareyya, gahaṇaṃ kareyya, dānaṃ kareyya, tassa sabbattha dukkaṭanti sambandho.
analyzed: kareyya gahaṇam kareyya dānam kareyya tassa sabbattha dukkaṭa nti sambandho

original: 65. Tipaṭicchannakaṃ vināti “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tisso paṭicchādiyo jantāgharappaṭicchādiṃ
analyzed: ti paṭicchannakam vinā iti anujānāmi bhikkhave tissaḥ paṭicchādiyaḥ jantā ghara paṭicchādim

original: udakappaṭicchādiṃ vatthappaṭicchādi”nti evaṃ vuttā tisso paṭicchādiyo samāhaṭāti
analyzed: udaka ppaṭicchādim vattha ppaṭicchādim ti evam vuttā tissaḥ paṭicchādiyaḥ samāhaṭā ti

original: “tipaṭicchādī”ti vuttaṃ. Tipaṭicchannakaṃ ṭhapetvā parikammaṃ sayaṃ kareyya, paraṃ
analyzed: ti paṭicchādi iti vuttam ti paṭicchannakam ṭhapetvā parikammam sayam kareyya param

original: kārāpeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Yo bhikkhu nahāyaṃ nahāyanto kuṭṭe vā thambhe
analyzed: tassa dukkaṭam siyāti atthaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu nahāyam nahāyantaḥ kuṭṭe vā thambhe

original: vā tarumhi vā kāyaṃ upaghaṃseyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: vā tarumhi vā kāyam upaghaṃseyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā

original: 66. Yo bhikkhu nahāyanto kuruvindakasuttena kāyaṃ ghaṃseyya, kāyato kāyena aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu nahāyantaḥ kuruvindakasuttena kāyam ghaṃseyya kāyataḥ kāyena aññamaññam

original: ghaṃseyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho. Yo agilāno saupāhano bahārāme bahiārāme
analyzed: tassa dukkaṭam siyāti sambandhaḥ yaḥ a gilānaḥ sa upāhanaḥ baha ārāme bahi ārāme

original: careyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: careyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandho

original: 67. Sabbanīlādikampi cāti ettha ādi-saddo lohitodātapītakaṇhamañjeṭṭhamahāraṅgamahānāmaraṅgarattādayo
analyzed: sabba nīla ādikam pi ca ati ettha ādi saddaḥ lohita udāta pīta kaṇha mañjeṭṭha mahāraṅga mahānāma raṅgaratta ādayaḥ

original: upāhanāyo saṅgaṇhāti. Yo bhikkhu sabbanīlasabbalohitādikaṃ upāhanaṃ dhāreti, tassa
analyzed: upāhanāyaḥ saṅgaṇhāti yaḥ bhikkhu sabba nīla sabba lohita ādikam upāhanam dhāreti tassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho. Yo bhikkhu ratto rattacitto tadahujātāyapi itthiyā nimittaṃ
analyzed: dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandhaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu rattaḥ ratta citto tad ahu jātāya api itthiyā nimittam

original: passeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Yo bhikkhu bhikkhadāyiyā bhikkhadāyikāya itthiyā mukhaṃ
analyzed: passeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā yaḥ bhikkhu bhikkha dāyiyā bhikkha dāyikāya itthiyā mukham

original: passeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: passeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā

original: 68-9. Yo bhikkhu ujjhānasaññī hutvā aññassa bhikkhuno pattaṃ vā passeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu ujjhāna saññī hutvā aññassa bhikkhuno pattam vā passeyya tassa dukkaṭam

original: siyā. Ādāsādimhi udakapatte attano mukhaṃ passeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Uccāsanamahāsane
analyzed: siyā ādāsa ādimhi udaka patte attanaḥ mukham passeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā ucca āsana mahāsane

original: nisajjādiṃ nisīdanasayanādiṃ karontassa bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Ukkhittānupasampannanānāsaṃvāsakādīnaṃ
analyzed: nisajja ādim nisīdana sayana ādim karontassa bhikkhuno dukkaṭam siyā ukkhitta an upasampanna nānā saṃvāsaka ādīnam

original: vandanepi dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho. Tattha ukkhittoti āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako,
analyzed: vandane pi dukkaṭam siyāti sambandho tattha ukkhittaḥ ti āpattiyāḥ adassane ukkhittako

original: āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakoti tividhopi
analyzed: āpattiyāḥ appaṭikamme ukkhittako pāpikāya diṭṭhiyāḥ appaṭinissagge ukkhittako ti tividhaḥ api

original: idhādhippeto. Anupasampannoti iminā bhikkhunisāmaṇerasāmaṇerisikkhamānapaṇḍakaitthisikkhāpaccakkhātakā
analyzed: idha adhippetaḥ anupasampannaḥ ti iminā

original: gahitā. Nānāsaṃvāsakāti laddhinānāsaṃvāsakā gahitā. Ādi-saddena chinnamūlakā gahitā.
analyzed: gahitā nānā saṃvāsakā ati laddhi nānā saṃvāsakā gahitā ādi saddena chinna mūlakā gahitā

original: 70-71. Yo dīghāsane paṇḍakitthīhi paṇḍakena vā itthiyā vā ubhatobyañjanena vā ekato
analyzed: yaḥ dīghāsane paṇḍaka itthīhi paṇḍakena vā itthiyā vā ubhatobyañjanena vā ekatas

original: nisīdeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Adīghe āsaneti rasse āsane. Yo bhikkhu rassāsane
analyzed: nisīdeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā adīghe āsane iti rasse āsane yaḥ bhikkhu rassāsane

original: mañce vā pīṭhe vā asamānāsanikena ekato sayeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Phalapupphādikanti
analyzed: mañce vā pīṭhe vā asamānāsanikena ekatas sayeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyāti phala puppha ādikanti

original: ettha ādi-saddena veḷucuṇṇadantakaṭṭhamattikādayo saṅgahitā. Kulasaṅgahatthāya phalapupphādikaṃ
analyzed: ettha ādi saddena veḷu cuṇṇa danta kaṭṭha mattikā ādayaḥ saṅgahitā kula saṅgaha tthāya phala puppha ādikam

original: dadato dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: dadataḥ dukkaṭam siyāti sambandhaḥ

original: 72-3. Yo bhikkhu ganthimādiṃ sayaṃ kareyya, paraṃ kārāpeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu ganthim ādim sayam kareyya param kārāpeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā

original: Yo bhikkhu jinena vāritapaccaye paribhuñjeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Abyatto bālo
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu jinena vārita paccaye paribhuñjeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā abyattaḥ bālo

original: yo bhikkhu ācariyupajjhāye anissāya nissayaṃ aggahetvā vaseyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu ācariya upajjhāye a nissāya nissayam aggahetvā vaseyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā

original: Yo bhikkhu anuññātehi mātāpituādīhi puggalehi aññassa puggalassa bhesajjaṃ kareyya
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu anuññātehi mātā pitu ādīhi puggalehi aññassa puggalassa bhesajjam kareyya

original: vā vadeyya vā, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Sāpattiko yo bhikkhu uposathappavāraṇaṃ kareyya,
analyzed: vā vadeyya vā tassa dukkaṭam siyā sa āpattikaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu uposatha pavāraṇam kareyya

original: tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho. Tattha jinena bhagavatā vāritā jinavāritā, jinavāritā
analyzed: tassa dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandho tattha jinena bhagavatā vāritā jina vāritā jina vāritā

original: ca te paccayā ceti jinavāritapaccayā, te jinavāritapaccaye. Dvemātikāappaguṇatāya abyatto.
analyzed: ca te paccayā ca iti jina vārita paccayā te jina vārita paccaye dvi imātikā appaguṇa tāya abyattaḥ

original: 74. Yo bhikkhu ābhogaṃ vā niyogaṃ vā vajjetvā dvārabandhādike ṭhāne parivattakavāṭakaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu ābhogam vā niyogam vā vajjetvā dvāra bandha ādike ṭhāne parivattaka vāṭakam

original: apidhāya divā sayeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho. Dvārabandhādiketi yena kenaci
analyzed: apidhāya divā sayeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā ati sambandhaḥ dvāra bandha ādikā iti yena kenaci

original: parikkhitte abbhokāsepi rukkhamūlepi antamaso iminā lakkhaṇena yuttaākāsaṅgaṇepi.
analyzed: parikkhitte abbhokāse api rukkha mūle api antamasaḥ iminā lakkhaṇena yutta ākāsaṅgaṇe pi

original: Apidhāyāti apidahitvā. Vinābhoganti “esa dvāraṃ jaggissatī”ti ābhogaṃ ṭhapetvāti
analyzed: apidhāya ati apidahitvā vinā ābhogam ti esa dvāram jaggissati iti ābhogam ṭhapetvā ati

original: attho. Niyoganti avasaṭṭhānaṃ, attano avasaṃ bahusādhāraṇaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā. “Savaso”ti
analyzed: atthaḥ niyoganti avasa ṭṭhānam attanaḥ avasam bahu sādhāraṇa ṭṭhānam ṭhapetvā savasaḥ ti

original: vā pāṭho, savaso hutvāti attho. Divāti divākāle.
analyzed: vā pāṭhaḥ savasaḥ hutvā iti atthaḥ divā ti divākāle

original: 75. Dhaññanti sāli vīhi yavo godhumo kaṅgu varako kudrūsakoti sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ.
analyzed: dhaññanti sāli vīhi yavaḥ godhumaḥ kaṅgu varako kudrūsakaḥ iti sattavidham dhaññam

original: Itthirūpanti dārulohamayādiitthirūpaṃ. Ratananti muttādidasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ. Āvudhanti
analyzed: dāru loha maya ādi itthi rūpam mutta ādi dasavidham

original: sattitomarādisabbāvudhabhaṇḍaṃ. Itthipasādhananti itthiyā sīsādialaṅkāraṃ. Tūriyabhaṇḍanti
analyzed: satti tomara ādi sabba avudha bhaṇḍam itthiyā sīsa ādi alaṅkāram tūriya bhaṇḍanti

original: dhamanasaṅkhādisabbaṃ tūriyabhaṇḍaṃ. Phalarukkheti phalitarukkhe. Pubbaṇṇādikanti
analyzed: dhamana saṅkha ādi sabbam tūriya bhaṇḍam phala rukkha iti phalita rukkhe pubbaṇṇa ādikan ti

original: muggamāsādikaṃ. Ādi-saddena vākurakuminādayo gahitā. Etesu yaṃ kiñci āmaseyya, tassa
analyzed: mugga māsa ādikam ādi saddena vākura kumina ādayaḥ gahitāḥ etesu yam kiñci tassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: dukkaṭam siyāti attho

original: 76. Sasitthodakatelehīti yo pana madhusitthakatelena vā udakamissakatelena vā yena
analyzed: sa sittha udaka telehi iti yaḥ pana madhu sitthaka telena vā udaka missaka telena vā yena

original: kenaci cikkhallena vā. Phaṇahatthaphaṇehi vāti dantamayādiphaṇena vā phaṇakiccasādhakehi
analyzed: kenacid cikkhallena vā phaṇa hattha phaṇehi vāti danta maya ādi phaṇena vā phaṇa kicca sādhakehi

original: hatthaṅgulīhi vā kocchena vā kesamosaṇṭhane dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Ekasmiṃ bhājane
analyzed: hattha aṅgulīhi vā kocchena vā kesa mosaṇṭhane dukkaṭam siyāti ekasmim bhājane

original: bhojananimitte dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: bhojana nimitte dukkaṭam siyāti

original: 77. Dve bhikkhū ekattharaṇā sayeyyūṃ, dve bhikkhū ekapāvuraṇā sayeyyuṃ, dve bhikkhū
analyzed: dve bhikkhū eka attharaṇā sayeyyūm dve bhikkhū eka pāvuraṇā sayeyyum dve bhikkhū

original: ekamañcake sayeyyuṃ, tesaṃ dukkaṭāni hontīti sambandho. Pamāṇato adhikaṃ vā ūnaṃ
analyzed: eka mañcake sayeyyum tesam dukkaṭāni honti iti sambandho pamāṇataḥ adhikam vā ūnam

original: vā dantakaṭṭhaṃ khādeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā. Tattha adhikanti aṭṭhaṅgulato
analyzed: vā dantakaṭṭham khādeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā ti yojanā tattha adhikam ti aṭṭhaṅgulato

original: adhikaṃ. Ūnanti caturaṅgulato ūnaṃ.
analyzed: adhikam ūnanti catur aṅgulataḥ ūnam

original: 78. Yo bhikkhu naccañca gītañca vāditañca yojeti vā yojāpeti vā, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu naccañca gītañca vāditañca yojeti vā yojāpeti vā tassa dukkaṭam siyā

original: Tesaṃ naccānaṃ dassanaṃ, tesaṃ gītānaṃ savanaṃ, tesaṃ vāditānaṃ savanañca karontassa
analyzed: tesam naccānam dassanam tesam gītānam savanam tesam vāditānam savanañca karontassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: dukkaṭam siyāti attho

original: 79. Vīhādiropimeti vīhiādīnaṃ ruhanaṭṭhāne. Bahipākārakuṭṭaketi pākārakuṭṭānaṃ bahi.
analyzed: vīha ādi ropima iti vīhi ādīnam ruhana ṭṭhāne bahi pākārakuṭṭaka iti pākārakuṭṭānam bahi

original: Vaccādichaḍḍanādimhīti vaccapassāvasaṅkāracalakādīnaṃ chaḍḍanavissajjanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ
analyzed: vacca ādi chaḍḍana ādimhi iti vacca passāva saṅkāra calaka ādīnam chaḍḍana vissajjana paccayā dukkaṭam

original: siyāti attho. Dīghakesādidhāraṇeti dīghakesadhāraṇe dīghanakhadhāraṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: siyā ti attho dīgha kesa ādi dhāraṇā iti dīgha kesa dhāraṇe dīgha nakha dhāraṇe dukkaṭam siyā ti attho

original: 80. Nakhamaṭṭhakaraṇādimhīti ettha ādi-saddena rajanakaraṇaṃ gahitaṃ. Sambādhe lomahāraṇeti
analyzed: nakha maṭṭha karaṇa ādimhi iti ettha ādi saddena rajana karaṇam gahitam sambādhe loma hāraṇā iti

original: sambādhe upakacchakamuttakaraṇaṭṭhāne lomuddharaṇe. Saupāhano bhikkhu parikammakataṃ
analyzed: sambādhe upakacchaka mutta karaṇa ṭṭhāne loma uddharaṇe sa upāhanaḥ bhikkhu parikammakatam

original: bhūmiṃ akkameyyāti sambandho.
analyzed: bhūmim akkameyya iti sambandhaḥ

original: 81. Adhotaallapādehīti yo bhikkhu adhotapādehi vā allapādehi vā saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā akkameyya, parikammakataṃ bhittiṃ vā kāyato āmasantassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: adhotaallapādehi iti yaḥ bhikkhu adhotapādehi vā allapādehi vā saṅghikam mañcam vā pīṭham vā akkameyya parikamma katam bhittim vā kāyataḥ āmasantassa dukkaṭam siyāti attho

original: 82-3. Saṅghāṭiyāpi pallattheti adhiṭṭhitacīvarena vihāre vā antaraghare vā pallatthikaṃ
analyzed: saṅghāṭiyā api pallatthā iti adhiṭṭhita cīvarena vihāre vā antaraghare vā pallatthikam

original: kareyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ. Dupparibhuñjeyya cīvaranti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ
analyzed: kareyya tassa dukkaṭam dupparibhuñjeyya cīvaranti tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññataram cīvaraṃ

original: dupparibhogena paribhuñjeyya. Akāyabandhanoti kāyabandhanavirahito bhikkhu gāmaṃ
analyzed: dupparibhogena paribhuñjeyya a kāya bandhanā ti kāya bandhana virahitaḥ bhikkhu gāmaṃ

original: vajeyya gaccheyya. Yo bhikkhu vaccakaṃ uccāraṃ katvāna udake sante nācameyya udakasuddhiṃ
analyzed: vajeyya gaccheyya yaḥ bhikkhu vaccakam uccāram katvāna udake sante na ācameyya udaka suddhim

original: na kareyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Samādeyya akappiyeti bhikkhuṃ vā sāmaṇerādike
analyzed: na kareyya tassa dukkaṭam siyāti attho samādeyya a kappiyā iti bhikkhum vā sāmaṇera ādike

original: sesasahadhammike vā akappiye niyojeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Sabhāgāpattiyā
analyzed: sesa sahadhammike vā akappiye niyojeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyāti attho sa bhāga āpattiyā

original: desanārocanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Sabhāgāti ettha vatthusabhāgatāva idhādhippetā, na āpattisabhāgatā.
analyzed: desanā rocana paccayā dukkaṭam siyāti attho sabhāgā ti ettha vatthu sabhāga tā va idha adhippetā na āpatti sabhāga tā

original: 84. Na vase vassanti yo bhikkhu vassaṃ na vaseyya na upagaccheyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ
analyzed: na vase vassanti yaḥ bhikkhu vassam na vaseyya na upagaccheyya tassa dukkaṭaṃ

original: siyā. Visaṃvāde suddhacitteti ettha sampadānatthe bhummavacanaṃ, paṭissavaṃ visaṃvādentassa
analyzed: siyā visaṃvāde suddha citta iti ettha sampadāna atthe bhumma vacanam paṭissavam visaṃvādentassa

original: suddhacittassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Vassaṃ vasitvā ananuññātakiccato ananuññātakiccena
analyzed: suddha cittassa dukkaṭam siyāti atthaḥ vassam vasitvā ananuññāta kiccataḥ ananuññāta kiccena

original: bhikkhuno gamane dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: bhikkhuno gamane dukkaṭam siyā ti yojanā

original: 85. Āpadaṃ vajjetvā tarussa uddhaṃ porisamhā abhiruhaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: āpadam vajjetvā tarussa uddham porisamhā abhiruhaṇe dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandho

original: Āpadanti antarāyaṃ. Tarussāti rukkhassa. Porisamhāti ekaporisappamāṇā majjhimassa
analyzed: āpadanti antarāyam tarussa ati rukkhassa eka porisa ppamāṇā majjhimassa

original: purisassa pañcahatthā. Aparissāvano yo bhikkhu addhānaṃ gaccheyya, yo ca bhikkhu
analyzed: purisassa pañca hatthā a parissāvanaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu addhānam gaccheyya yaḥ ca bhikkhu

original: taṃ parissāvanaṃ yācato na dadeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā. Addhānanti addhayojanameva antimamaddhānaṃ.
analyzed: tam parissāvanam yācataḥ na dadeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyāti yojanā addhānam ti addha yojanam eva antimam addhānam

original: 86. Attano ghātane dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho. Yo bhikkhu itthirūpādirūpaṃ kareyya
analyzed: attanaḥ ghātane dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandhaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu itthi rūpa ādi rūpam kareyya

original: vā kārāpeyya vā, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Mālādikaṃ vicittaṃ ṭhapetvā jātakādivatthuṃ
analyzed: vā kārāpeyya vā tassa dukkaṭam siyā mālā ādikam vicittam ṭhapetvā jātaka ādi vatthum

original: sayaṃ kareyya, dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: sayam kareyya dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandhaḥ

original: 87. Bhuñjantamuṭṭhapeti yo bhikkhu bhuñjantaṃ uṭṭhāpeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Bhattasālādīsu vuḍḍhānaṃ okāsaṃ adatvā nisīdato dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: bhuñjantam uṭṭhapeti yaḥ bhikkhu bhuñjantam uṭṭhāpeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā bhatta sāla ādīsu vuḍḍhānam okāsam a datvā nisīdataḥ dukkaṭam siyā iti yojanā

original: 88. Yānānīti vayhaṃ ratho sakaṭaṃ sandamānikādīni. Kallakoti agilāno. Agilāno yo
analyzed: yānāni iti vayham rathaḥ sakaṭam sandamānikā ādīni a gilānaḥ a gilānaḥ

original: bhikkhu yānāni abhiruheyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Vade davanti keḷiṃ vadeyya,
analyzed: bhikkhu yānāni abhiruheyya tassa dukkaṭam siyāti attho vade davanti keḷim vadeyya

original: ratanattayaṃ ārabbha keḷiṃ vadeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Aññaparisāya upalālane dukkaṭaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ratanattayam ārabbha keḷim vadeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyāti attho añña parisāya upalālane dukkaṭam hoti

original: 89. Kāyādinti ettha ādi-saddo ūrunimittaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Kāyaṃ vā ūruṃ vā nimittaṃ vā
analyzed: kāya ādin ti ettha ādi saddaḥ ūru nimittam saṅgaṇhāti kāyam vā ūrum vā nimittam vā

original: vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ na dassaye na dasseyyāti attho. Lokāyataṃ tiracchānādivijjaṃ
analyzed: vivaritvā bhikkhunīnam na dassaye na dasseyya ati atthaḥ lokāyatam tiracchānādi vijjam

original: na ca sayaṃ vāceyya, parañca na vācāpeyya. Palitaṃ gaṇheyya vā gaṇhāpeyya vā, tassa
analyzed: na ca sayam vāceyya param ca na vācāpeyya palitam gaṇheyya vā gaṇhāpeyya vā tassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: dukkaṭam siyāti yojanā

original: 90-92. Yattha katthaci peḷāyaṃ pakkhipitvā bhattaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: yattha katthaci peḷāyam pakkhipitvā bhattam bhuñjantassa dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandhaḥ

original: Pattahatthako yo bhikkhu vātapānaṃ vā kavāṭaṃ vā paṇāme paṇāmeyya, sodakaṃ pattaṃ
analyzed: patta hatthakaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu vāta pānam vā kavāṭam vā paṇāme paṇāmeyya sa udakam pattam

original: uṇheyya uṇhe otāpeyya vā paṭisāmeyya vā, vodakaṃ pattaṃ atiuṇheyya atiṭhapeyya, tassa
analyzed: uṇheyya uṇhe otāpeyya vā paṭisāmeyya vā vā udakam pattam atiuṇheyya atiṭhapeyya tassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Yo bhikkhu pattaṃ bhūmiyaṃ vā aṅke vā mañce vā pīṭhe vā miḍḍhante
analyzed: dukkaṭam siyāti atthaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu pattam bhūmiyam vā aṅke vā mañce vā pīṭhe vā

original: vā paribhaṇḍante vā pāde vā chatte vā ṭhapeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: vā paribhaṇḍante vā pāde vā chatte vā ṭhapeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandho

original: Bhūmiyanti yena kenaci anatthatāya paṃsusakkharamissāya. Aṅketi dvinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ majjhe.
analyzed: bhūmiyanti yena kenacid anattha tāya paṃsu sakkhara missāya aṅke ti dvinnam ūrūnam majjhe

original: Miḍḍhanteti miḍḍhapariyante. Paribhaṇḍanteti bāhirapasse katāya tanukamiḍḍhiyā ante.
analyzed: miḍḍhanta iti miḍḍha pariyante paribhaṇḍanta iti bāhira passe katāya tanuka miḍḍhiyāḥ ante

original: Yo bhikkhu calakādiṃ vā patte ṭhapeyya, patte vā hatthadhovane hatthassa dhovanappaccayā
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu calaka ādim vā patte ṭhapeyya patte vā hattha dhovane hatthassa dhovana ppaccayā

original: tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: tassa dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandho

original: 93. Ucchiṭṭhaṃ mukhadhovanaṃ udakampi pattena nīharantassa bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
analyzed: ucchiṭṭham mukha dhovanam udakam pi pattena nīharantassa bhikkhuno dukkaṭam siyā

analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu akappiyam pattam paribhuñjeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyāti attho tattha akappiyam

original: pattanti dārumayapattādiṃ.
analyzed: dāru maya patta ādim

original: 94. Yo bhikkhu khipite “jīvā”ti vade vadeyya, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti attho. Yo bhikkhu
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu khipite jīvāti vade vadeyya tassa dukkaṭam siyāti atthaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu

original: parimaṇḍalakādimhi pañcasattati sekhiye anādaro hutvā na sikkhati, tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti sambandho.
analyzed: parimaṇḍalaka ādimhi anādaraḥ hutvā na sikkhati tassa dukkaṭam siyā ti sambandho

original: 95. Yo bhikkhu bhaṇḍāgāre payuto mātuyā pituno ca bhaṇḍakaṃ gopeyya, assa bhikkhuno
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu bhaṇḍāgāre payutaḥ mātuyā pituno ca bhaṇḍakam gopeyya assa bhikkhuno

original: pācittiyaṃ siyāti sambandho. Tattha payutoti bhaṇḍāgāre byāpāravasena yuttappayutto.
analyzed: pācittiyam siyā ti sambandhaḥ tattha payutaḥ ti bhaṇḍāgāre byāpāra vasena yutta ppayuttaḥ

original: Gopayeti gopeyya. Yo bhikkhu davāya hīnena jātiādinā uttamampi vadeyya, dubbhāsitaṃ
analyzed: gopaya iti gopeyya yaḥ bhikkhu davāya hīnena jāti ādinā uttamam pi vadeyya dubbhāsitam

original: siyāti sambandho. Tattha hīnehi vā ukkaṭṭhehi vā jātiādīhi evaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ vā hīnaṃ
analyzed: siyā ti sambandhaḥ tattha hīnehi vā ukkaṭṭhehi vā jāti ādīhi evam ukkaṭṭham vā hīnam

analyzed: vā caṇḍāla usi iti ādinā nayena ujum vā santi idha ekacce nayena

original: vadeyya, dubbhāsitaṃ siyāti.
analyzed: vadeyya dubbhāsitam siyāti

original: Pakiṇṇakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 6. Vattādikaṇḍaniddesavaṇṇanā
96. Idāni vattaṃ dassetuṃ “upajjhācariyavatta”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha upajjhāyavattañca
analyzed: idāni vattam dassetum upajjhā cariya vattan ti vuttam tattha upajjhāya vattañca

original: kātabbanti sambandho. Gamikāgantukanti gamikaṃ āgantukanti chedo, gamikavattaṃ āgantukavattañcāti attho.
analyzed: kātabbam ti sambandhaḥ gamika āgantukanti gamikam āgantukanti chedaḥ gamika vattam āgantuka vattam ca ati attho

original: 97. Dātukāmo hatthapāse ṭhito kiñci gahitabbaṃ ekena purisena gahitabbaṃ ukkhipanakkhamaṃ
analyzed: dātu kāmaḥ hattha pāse ṭhitaḥ kiñci gahitabbam ekena purisena gahitabbam ukkhipana khamam

original: vatthuṃ tidhā tīsu pakāresu ekenākārena dadeyya, gahetukāmo bhikkhu dvidhā dvīsu
analyzed: vatthum tidhā tīsu pakāresu ekena ākārena dadeyya gahetu kāmaḥ bhikkhu dvidhā dvīsu

original: ekena gaṇheyya, ayaṃ pañcaṅgo paṭiggahoti attho.
analyzed: ekena gaṇheyya ayam pañcaṅgo paṭiggaho ti attho

analyzed: dūre ṭhitam cīvaram ṭhapita ukāsam sallakkhetvā etat ti vattabbam hattha pāse

original: ṭhitaṃ hatthena āmasitvā “ima”nti vattabbaṃ. “Etaṃ adhiṭṭhāmi, imaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti
analyzed: ṭhitam hatthena āmasitvā iman ti vattabbam etam adhiṭṭhāmi imam adhiṭṭhāmi iti

original: imesaṃ padānaṃ majjhe saṅghāṭiādīsu paccekaṃ yojetvā ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭheyya. Kathaṃ?
analyzed: imesam padānam majjhe saṅghāṭi ādīsu paccekam yojetvā ti cīvaram adhiṭṭheyya katham

original: “Etaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmi, imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti adhiṭṭheyya. Evaṃ sesesu
analyzed: etam saṅghāṭim adhiṭṭhāmi imam saṅghāṭim adhiṭṭhāmi iti adhiṭṭheyya evam sesesu

original: ca cīvaresu. Yathā cīvarādiṃ vidhānaṃ evaṃ pattepi adhiṭṭheyya paccuddhareyyāti attho.
analyzed: ca cīvaresu yathā cīvara ādim vidhānam evam patte pi adhiṭṭheyya paccuddhareyya ati atthaḥ

original: 101. Sañcarittaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā garukā ca pārājikā ca sacittakāti sambandho. Antimāti
analyzed: sañcarittam ṭhapetvā sesā garukā ca pārājikā ca sa cittakā ati sambandhaḥ antimā ati

analyzed: pārājikā acchinna sikkhāpadam pariṇata sikkhāpadam ca ati imam dvayam ṭhapetvā sesam

original: nissaggiyaṃ acittakanti attho.
analyzed: nissaggiyam acittakam ti attho

original: 102-3. Gāmappavesananteteti gāmappavesanaṃ iti ete. Pācittīsu ete padasodhammādayo gāmappavesanantā sattarasa sikkhāpadā acittakā.
analyzed: gāma pavesanantā ita iti gāma ppavesanam iti ete pācittīsu ete sattarasa sikkhāpadāḥ acittakā

original: 104-5. Pakiṇṇakesu uddissakataṃ ṭhapetvā aññamaṃsakaṃ sesamaṃsaṃ acittakanti attho.
analyzed: pakiṇṇakesu uddissakatam ṭhapetvā añña maṃsakam sesa maṃsam acittakam ti attho

original: Ettha pakiṇṇakesu aññamaṃsādikaṃ pattahattho kavāṭakantaṃ terasavidhaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ettha pakiṇṇakesu añña maṃsa ādikam patta hatthaḥ kavāṭa kantam terasavidham idam sikkhāpadaṃ

original: acittakaṃ, sesaṃ sabbaṃ sacittakanti attho.
analyzed: acittakam sesam sabbam sa cittakam ti attho

original: 106. Ācariyā vītikkamanacittena sacittakaṃ acittakanti vadanti, paññattijānanena
analyzed: ācariyāḥ vītikkamana cittena sa cittakam acittakam ti vadanti paññatti jānanena

analyzed: cittena tathā sa cittakam acittakam ti ācariyāḥ vadanti iti attho tathā saddena sa cittakam

original: acittaka”nti idaṃ gahitaṃ.
analyzed: acittakam ti idam gahitam

original: 107-9. Pubbakaraṇādikanti ettha ādi-saddo pubbakiccaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha –
analyzed: pubba karaṇa ādikam ti ettha ādi saddaḥ pubba kiccam saṅgaṇhāti tattha

original: “Sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca;
analyzed: sammajjanī ca udakam āsanena ca

original: Uposathassa etāni, pubbakaraṇanti vuccati.
analyzed: uposathassa etāni pubbakaraṇanti vuccati

analyzed: bhikkhu gaṇanā ca ovādaḥ

original: Uposathassa etāni, pubbakiccanti vuccatī”ti. –
analyzed: uposathassa etāni pubba kiccanti vuccati iti

original: Evaṃ pubbakaraṇādikaṃ navadhā dīpitaṃ sabbaṃ uposathappavāraṇaṃ piyasīlinā kātabbanti attho.
analyzed: evam pubba karaṇa ādikam navadhā dīpitam sabbam uposatha ppavāraṇam piya sīlinā kātabbanti attho

original: 112. Yathākkamanti etthāyamadhippāyo – gaṇo pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kareyya, puggalo adhiṭṭhānauposathaṃ kareyya, saṅgho suttuddesauposathaṃ kareyyāti.

original: 113. Cātuddaso pannaraso, sāmaggī dinato tidhāti cātuddaso uposatho, pannaraso uposatho,
analyzed: cātuddasaḥ pannarasaḥ sāmaggī dinataḥ tidhā ati cātuddasaḥ uposatho pannarasaḥ uposatho

original: sāmaggīuposathoti dinato tidhā honti. Dinato puggalato kattabbākārato te uposathā
analyzed: sāmaggī uposathaḥ ti dinataḥ tidhā honti dinataḥ puggalato kattabba ākārato te uposathāḥ

original: nava iti īritāti attho.
analyzed: nava iti īritā ati

original: 114. Tevācī dvekavācīti tevācikā pavāraṇā, dvevācikā pavāraṇā, ekavācikā pavāraṇā iti nava pavāraṇā vuttā.
analyzed: tevācī dvekavācī iti tevācikā pavāraṇā dvevācikā pavāraṇā ekavācikā pavāraṇā iti nava pavāraṇāḥ vuttā

original: 115. Tassāti phaggunamāsassa. Tato sesanti āsāḷhiantimapakkhamhā yāva kattikapuṇṇamā vassakālanti attho. Ettha hi ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare catuvīsatiuposathā honti.
analyzed: tassa ti phagguna māsassa tatas sesa nti āsāḷhi antima pakkhamhā yāva kattika puṇṇamā vassa kālanti attho ettha hi ekasmin saṃvacchare catuvīsati uposathāḥ honti

original: 116. Etesūti etesu tīsu catūsu ekekasmiṃ utumhi tatiyapakkhā sattamapakkhā. Cātuddasāti cha cātuddasāti attho. Sesāni uttānatthānevāti.
analyzed: etesu iti etesu tīsu catūsu ekekasmin utumhi tatiya pakkhā sattama pakkhā cātuddasā ati cha cātuddasā ati attho sesāni uttāna tthānā eva ati

original: Vattādikaṇḍaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā samāraddhā, mūlasikkhatthavaṇṇanā;
analyzed: ettāvatā samāraddhā mūla sikkhattha vaṇṇanā

original: Niṭṭhitā yā samāsena, aḍḍhamāsassa accaye.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā yā samāsena aḍḍhamāsassa accaye

original: Adhunūpasampannānaṃ, hitatthāya samāsato;
analyzed: adhunā upasampannānam hita atthāya samāsatas

original: Imaṃ atthaṃ vaṇṇayatā, yaṃ puññaṃdhigataṃ mayā.
analyzed: imam attham vaṇṇayatā yam puññaṃdhi gatam mayā

original: Tena puññenayaṃ loko, sukhāya paṭipattiyā;
analyzed: tena puññena ayam lokaḥ sukhāya paṭipattiyā

original: Pāpuṇātu visuddhāya, nibbānaṃ ajaraṃ padaṃ.
analyzed: pāpuṇātu visuddhāya nibbānam ajaram padam

original: Nānātarugaṇākiṇṇe, nānākusalakāmino;
analyzed: nānā taru gaṇa ākiṇṇe nānā kusala kāminaḥ

original: Ramme yuddhānapatino, vihāre vasatā satā.
analyzed: ramme yuddhānapatinaḥ vihāre vasatā satā

original: Sāsane siddhipattassa, siddhinā ñāṇasiddhinā;
analyzed: sāsane siddhi pattassa siddhinā ñāṇa siddhinā

original: Paṇḍitena katā esā, mūlasikkhatthavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: paṇḍitena katā esā mūla sikkhattha vaṇṇanā

original: Mūlasikkhā-ṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: mūla sikkhāṭīkā samattā
